NK054(yi)001:1427: gdul bya la yon tan tshad dpag tu med pa'am /
NK054(yi)001:1428: bdag gzhan gyi dgos pa bskong ba'i che ba'i yon tan tshad med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1429: gzhal yas khang thugs ye shes rang snang ba'i dbang
NK054(yi)001:1430: gis mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rang byung
NK054(yi)001:1432: rtog pa med kyang dgos 'dod rang bzhin gyis skong
NK054(yi)001:1433: ba'i che ba'i yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub
NK054(yi)001:1434: la / de yang sku gsung thugs gyi sgo nas
NK054(yi)001:1435: snang ba'i rtags ni don rang byung gi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:1436: la / yin la / rtags las kyang dngos rig
NK054(yi)001:1437: pa rang snang ba'i rang byung gi ye shes rin
NK054(yi)001:1438: po che sna tshogs su snang ba las /
NK054(yi)001:1439: gzhal yas khang gi mtshan nyid thams cad grub ste rtsig pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1441: d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams thugs
NK054(yi)001:1442: ye shes rang snang ba rang bzhin gyis 'bar ba'i
NK054(yi)001:1443: rtags su / gzhal yas khang gi rin po che rnams 'od zer 'bar ba dang bcas la /
NK054(yi)001:1444: las su gdul bya la rang bzhin thugs rje 'bar ba'i rtags kyang gzung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:1446: rang byung gi ye shes gdul bya rnams kyis gzhal du med la /
NK054(yi)001:1447: thams cad mkhyen pas kyang 'di lta bu'i zhes pa dmigs pa dang bral ba'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1448: chos kyi dbyings kyi khyab tshad du gsal bas gzhal du med pas yas zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:1449: khang ni bzhugs gnas tshogs pa ste phun sum tshogs pa 'dzom pa'i gnas su /
NK054(yi)001:1451: rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1452: de ltar thugs ye shes gzhal yas khang du byung
NK054(yi)001:1453: ba de yang rgya khyon tshad gzung du med de
NK054(yi)001:1454: / rang byung gi ye shes kyis 'di mkhyen 'di mi mkhyen med do //
NK054(yi)001:1455: yang na che chung tshad med pa ni ye shes
NK054(yi)001:1456: kyi snang ba yin pa'i dbang gis gzhal yas khang
NK054(yi)001:1457: stong gsum gcig tu rgyal ba yungs 'bru tsam zhig
NK054(yi)001:1458: bzhugs kyang stong zhing ma rgyas pa lta bu med
NK054(yi)001:1459: / gzhal yas yungs 'bru tsam zhig gi nang du
NK054(yi)001:1460: rgyal ba ri rab tsam zhig bzhugs kyang dog cing
NK054(yi)001:1462: ye shes kyi snang ba la phyogs su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1463: yon tan dpag tu med pa rgyas pa'i phyir zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1464: dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:1465: shes la thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dag snang
NK054(yi)001:1466: gi ngos la sku rigs rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi
NK054(yi)001:1468: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs te yon
NK054(yi)001:1469: tan brgya bzhi bcu'i tshogs rnas ngo bo blos dpag
NK054(yi)001:1470: tu med de / ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:1471: rnam grangs blos dpag tu med de bsam gyis mi khyab /
NK054(yi)001:1472: skad cig kyang mi 'gag par thams cad du snang bas kyang blos dpag tu med la /
NK054(yi)001:1473: spyir mi 'gag pa'i chos thams cad snang ba'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pas so //
NK054(yi)001:1474: rgyas pa'i ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi
NK054(yi)001:1475: rgyal po dgos 'dod skong ba'i ngo bo nyid du
NK054(yi)001:1476: bzhugs pa bzhin / rig pa rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:1477: shes ye nas rgyas pa'i bdag nyid rtogs pas rgyas
NK054(yi)001:1480: gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs gru bzhir byung ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:1481: gru bzhi ni rgyas pa'i dbyibs yin pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa mthar phyin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1482: rtogs pa rang byung gi ye shes mthar phyin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1483: che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa mthar phyin pa'i phyir dbyibs gru bzhi ste /
NK054(yi)001:1485: thams cad mkhyen pa 'du shes zad pas rig pa phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang bral yang /
NK054(yi)001:1486: gdul bya'i snang bas gru bzhir byung ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1487: 'di la gong du rgya phyogs bcur ma chad ces pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1488: 'di nyid du gru bzhi smos pa dang 'gal lo zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:1489: rgya phyogs bcung ma chad pa ni rang bzhin gyi
NK054(yi)001:1490: snang ba ye shes kho na'i cha nas brjod la
NK054(yi)001:1491: / gru bzhi ni gdul bya'i snang ba'i ngos nas so //
NK054(yi)001:1492: yang na don mi 'gal te chos nyid kyi snang
NK054(yi)001:1493: ba rgya ma chad pa las yon tan rgyas pa'o
NK054(yi)001:1494: // rtags mi 'gal te pany+tsa re kh+aa rgya ma cad pa la dbyibs gru bzhir gyur pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1495: glo 'bur ni lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1496: mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i thugs rang byung
NK054(yi)001:1497: gi ye shes la dbye ba mi mnga' ba la
NK054(yi)001:1498: / me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes
NK054(yi)001:1499: bzhi rang byung gi ye shes las lhag pa lta
NK054(yi)001:1500: / bu ste / bkra gsal la rtog pa med
NK054(yi)001:1501: pa mi 'gags pa lta bu'i rtags su me long
NK054(yi)001:1502: / bu ste / ye shes / rgyu 'bras snang
NK054(yi)001:1503: stong dag ma dag rtog pa gang yang mi mnga'
NK054(yi)001:1504: ba'i rtags su mnyam pa nyid /
NK054(yi)001:1505: rang byung gi ye shes la chos spyi dang rang
NK054(yi)001:1506: gi mtshan nyid ma 'chol bar mkhyen pa nyid kyis
NK054(yi)001:1507: mtha'i skyon gyis ma gos pa so sor rtogs pa
NK054(yi)001:1508: / gzhan gyi don thams cad lhun gyis grub pas /
NK054(yi)001:1509: rang don mur grub pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te /
NK054(yi)001:1510: rang byung ye shes las ye shes chen po bzhi
NK054(yi)001:1511: lhag pa'i rtags su gzhal yas khang gi 'og gzhi
NK054(yi)001:1512: gru chad kyi phyogs bzhir ye shes nyid rin po
NK054(yi)001:1513: cher snang ba'i glo 'bur bzhis brgyan te /
NK054(yi)001:1514: mdzes pa ni dper na gser gyi mig tu g.yu
NK054(yi)001:1515: bcugs na so so na gcig gis gcig gi ya
NK054(yi)001:1517: rang byung gi ye shes phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang
NK054(yi)001:1518: bral ba nyid ye shes bzhi po'i las kyis spa
NK054(yi)001:1519: bskyed pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes kyis
NK054(yi)001:1520: ye shes bzhi po mthar ma song bar dbyings su
NK054(yi)001:1521: lhun gyis grub pa nyid phan tshun gcig gi spa
NK054(yi)001:1522: gcig gis bskyed pa dang 'dra bar rtags glo 'bur
NK054(yi)001:1523: bskyed pa dang / bzhis mdzes pa'o // rtse mo'i don ni //
NK054(yi)001:1524: phyogs bcu dus bzhi zhes pa la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:1525: de la gzhal yas khang gi rtse mo ni steng gi bum pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1526: gzhal yas khang gi phyi bum pa zlum po'i yar gyi rtse mo ni tshad gzung du med de /
NK054(yi)001:1527: rang byung gi ye shes 'di tsam zhes tshad gzung du med pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1528: gzhal yas kyi rtse mo sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang mi rtogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1529: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor brtags pas /
NK054(yi)001:1530: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par song yang /
NK054(yi)001:1531: dbu'i gtsug tor gyi rtse mo ma mthong ba bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:1532: phyogs ni bcu ste steng 'og phyogs mtshams bcu re
NK054(yi)001:1533: re la'ang phyogs bcu de re re la'ang phyogs bcu
NK054(yi)001:1534: ste thug pa med pa'i gnas bstan to //
NK054(yi)001:1536: rgyu tshogs zin don spyad kyang zin nas 'das pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1537: sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jigs yan chad nas /
NK054(yi)001:1538: dus thog ma med pa la thug gi bar ro //
NK054(yi)001:1540: rgyu tshogs zin 'bras bu spyad bdo ba sh+aakya thub pa lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:1542: rgyu tshogs 'bras bu ma spyad pa byams pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:1543: dus bzhi'i dbang du ma rgyu tshogs 'on kyang tshogs pa la bar chad med pa lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:1545: rab gsal la sogs te sangs rgyas stong dang /
NK054(yi)001:1546: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus so //
NK054(yi)001:1547: dus na phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i gdul bya'i don la snang ba'i /
NK054(yi)001:1548: spangs mkhyen lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsang sngags nang pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1550: rgyu'i theg pa'i sgo nas snang ba gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa dkyil 'khor thams cad de /
NK054(yi)001:1551: sangs rgyas gcig ye shes su lhun gyis grub na /
NK054(yi)001:1552: thams cad grub pa'i de lta bu'i rang byung gi ye shes ni mtha' gang du'ang mi gnas /
NK054(yi)001:1553: gang la'ang mi brten pas so so ma yin zhes te /
NK054(yi)001:1554: mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po phyogs 'dzin thams
NK054(yi)001:1555: cad dang bral bas dbyer med pa la gnyis pa
NK054(yi)001:1556: mi mnga' zhing de nyid du 'dzin pa'ang med pa
NK054(yi)001:1557: ni tha snyad du ngo bo nyid gcig pa zhes
NK054(yi)001:1558: bya ste / rang byung gi ye shes la du ma mi mnga' bas 'khyil zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:1559: rang bzhin gyi snang ba yin la //
NK054(yi)001:1560: rtags bum pa zlum por 'khyil ba ni gdul bya'i snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1561: rgyan la ye shes lnga'i bye brag sbyir bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1562: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes pa la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:1563: rang byung gi ye shes ye shes bzhir shar la /
NK054(yi)001:1564: de dag kyang bzhi bzhir shar te /
NK054(yi)001:1565: ngo bo bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni rang byung
NK054(yi)001:1566: gi ye shes snang stong gi mtha' thams cad dang
NK054(yi)001:1567: bral bas bsam pa'i yul las 'das pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1568: rnam grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bshad pa
NK054(yi)001:1569: bzhin gdul bya'i ngos nas rtsis las 'das pa dang
NK054(yi)001:1570: / mdzad pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni gdul
NK054(yi)001:1571: bya rnams gang la gang 'dul de la der ston
NK054(yi)001:1572: du skad cig la 'char skad cig la don rdzogs
NK054(yi)001:1573: pa'i rang byung gi ye shes ni rtog pa med
NK054(yi)001:1574: kyang dgos 'dod skong ba rin po che dang 'dra
NK054(yi)001:1575: / la / de lta bu'i ye shes nyid rin
NK054(yi)001:1576: po che'i tshogs su snang nas gzhal yas khang du
NK054(yi)001:1577: / la / grub pa ste / dbyibs ni phyi dbyibs gru bzhi dang /
NK054(yi)001:1582: gtsang khang la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i snang bas rang
NK054(yi)001:1583: byung gi ye shes cir yang 'char ba'i dbyibs dang
NK054(yi)001:1585: gzhal yas khang gi rin po che las grub pa'i
NK054(yi)001:1586: kha dog stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rtags
NK054(yi)001:1588: shar me long lta bu'i ye shes mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1589: shel ke ke ru las grub pa dkar po lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:1590: lhor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1591: gser ram pu sha r+aa ga las grub pa ser po lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:1592: nub so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mtha' gnyis dbang
NK054(yi)001:1593: du sdud cing mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba'i
NK054(yi)001:1594: rtags su pad+ma r+aa ga las grub pa dmar po
NK054(yi)001:1595: / byang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes gdul bya'i don las sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1596: ljang gu tshon lnga gcig tu 'dres pa'i kha dog
NK054(yi)001:1597: lta bu ste +ain+d+ra n+ai la ljang gu las grub
NK054(yi)001:1598: pa'o // sogs pa zhes pa bsdu ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:1599: gzhal yas khang la rang bzhin gyi ye shes phyogs
NK054(yi)001:1600: kun tu 'phro ba'i rtags 'od zer kha dog sna
NK054(yi)001:1602: rang byung gi ye shes gdul bya la cir yang
NK054(yi)001:1603: 'char ba'i rtags su lha dang lha mo'i sprul pa
NK054(yi)001:1605: rnam pa tha dad pa'i zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1607: sprul pa'i bye brag kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa /
NK054(yi)001:1608: dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa'i nang tshan gyi bye brag rnams khyad par du gyur pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1610: 'od zer dang sprul pa'i 'phro 'du rnams rang byung
NK054(yi)001:1611: ye shes rang snang ba'i dbang gis tha mal pa'i
NK054(yi)001:1613: so so nas gsal bas gang gis kyang spyad du med 'od dang gzi byin dang bcas te /
NK054(yi)001:1614: blta ba po'i mig gi dbang po mig zi langs nas bltar mi tshugs pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:1615: ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1616: gzhal yas khang gi rgyan ston te /
NK054(yi)001:1617: rang byung gi ye shes rtog pa med kyang dgos 'dod skong ba rin po che dang 'dra la /
NK054(yi)001:1618: de nyid rtags rin po che'i rgyan du byung ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:1619: spyir gzhal yas khang du snang ba yang ston pa'i thugs rig pa snang /
NK054(yi)001:1620: rgyan du snang ba yang ston pa'i thugs ye shes snang /
NK054(yi)001:1621: ye shes la ye shes su brgyan par snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:1622: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i rang byung
NK054(yi)001:1623: gi ye shes ngo bo nyid kyi rang byung gi
NK054(yi)001:1624: ye shes chen po gdul bya'i ngo la che ba'i
NK054(yi)001:1625: yon tan sna tshogs mnga' ba'am /
NK054(yi)001:1626: yang na thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la phreng ba
NK054(yi)001:1627: bsdebs pa ltar rgyun mi chad pa'i rtags su mdzad
NK054(yi)001:1628: pa'i phrin las chos nyid las ma g.yos pa dang
NK054(yi)001:1629: 'dra bar / phrin las bzhi phreng ba phreng thag
NK054(yi)001:1630: gi rgyud ma chad pa 'dra ba lta bur rin
NK054(yi)001:1631: po che'i rgyal po'i phreng bas gzhal yas khang la
NK054(yi)001:1634: ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab pa nyid rang byung
NK054(yi)001:1635: gi ye shes su dbyer med pa'i rtags su rin
NK054(yi)001:1636: po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi thag pa gcig
NK054(yi)001:1637: tu bsgril nas chun por byas pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1638: gzhan yas khang gi bad na d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed du brgyan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1639: de yang 'phyang dbus na yod pa ni d+r+wa ba /
NK054(yi)001:1640: 'phyang mtha' na yod nas 'phyang ba ni d+r+wa phyed do //
NK054(yi)001:1641: yang na gsang sngags kyi sgo nas bden pa dbyer med rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis /
NK054(yi)001:1642: gdul bya rnams 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i don no //
NK054(yi)001:1643: shar bu'i rgyan sna tshogs dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1644: gzhal yas khang gi bad sna la ba so'i rgyan
NK054(yi)001:1645: shar bu bsgrig pas brgyan pa ni thams cad cang
NK054(yi)001:1646: mkhyen pas 'gro don mdzad pa'i phrin las la /
NK054(yi)001:1647: spyir mthar thug pa med pa'i gdul bya thams cad
NK054(yi)001:1648: la de re re'i rgyud las kyang rnam par rtog
NK054(yi)001:1650: gang la gang 'dul de la der ston du mdzad pa lhun grub tu shar ba'i barda'o //
NK054(yi)001:1651: sna tshogs ni gdul bya na sna tshogs pa phrin las sna tshogs su shar /
NK054(yi)001:1652: skad cig la lhun grub tu snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1653: kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul dag pa'i ngos nas sna tshogs su 'char ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:1654: gzugs sna tshogs dang zhes pa la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:1655: dngos su snang ba ste sna tshogs ni yo ga phyi pa bzhin du mi phye bar /
NK054(yi)001:1656: bem po dang rig pa can bzang po dang ngan pa che chung gi bye brag thams cad bsdu'o //
NK054(yi)001:1657: de dag kun tu bzang po'i ngo bor gsal ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:1658: dngos po de dag thams cad kun tu bzang po'i rig pa las ma g.yos /
NK054(yi)001:1659: rig pa rdzas de dag tu ma 'gag par snang
NK054(yi)001:1660: dbyer med pa byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub
NK054(yi)001:1661: par rang snang ba mchod pa ye gnas kyi ngo
NK054(yi)001:1665: reg bya sna tshogs rnams kyang gong gis 'gre /
NK054(yi)001:1666: thams cad mchod par lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1667: yang na dag snang gi gzugs sna tshogs gzugs kyi lha mo /
NK054(yi)001:1668: sgra sna tshogs sgra'i lha mo /
NK054(yi)001:1669: dri sna tshogs dri'i lha mo /
NK054(yi)001:1670: ro sna tshogs ro'i lha mo kha dog sna tshogs
NK054(yi)001:1671: pa so so'i mchod pa rnams phyag na bsnams pas
NK054(yi)001:1672: / gzhal yas khang gi phyi nang khyab pa sde ye shes rang snang ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs so //
NK054(yi)001:1673: phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1674: gzhal yas khang gi phyogs mtshams steng 'og phyogs bcur bar snang gi sprin bzhin gtibs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1675: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:1676: yungs 'bru tsam gyi khyon la mchod pa'i tshogs spungs kyang dog cing 'dzer ba med /
NK054(yi)001:1678: gcig gis gcig bsgrib pa med par gsal ba'i tshad ni /
NK054(yi)001:1679: rim pa brgya spungs kyang phar ngos dang tshur ngos la gsal mi gsal med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1680: rgyan de dag rang byung la zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1681: rgyan de dag nam mkha' la sprin bzhin rgyu rkyen dang bral bar rang snang ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:1682: ye shes kho na'i phyir ro //
NK054(yi)001:1683: ma bsgrib par gsal ba zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1684: gzhal yang khang dang rgyan rnams gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi phyir /
NK054(yi)001:1685: gcig gi gcig mi bsgrib par so so na gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1687: rang byung ye shes nyid rang la rang brgyan pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1688: rang rig pa ma 'gag par rang snang ba nyid
NK054(yi)001:1689: chos kyi dbyings stong pa'i phyogs su ma song ba
NK054(yi)001:1690: chos nyid kyi rgyan gsal la ma 'gag pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:1691: na / chos nyid du lhun gyis grub pas dngos
NK054(yi)001:1692: por ma song de chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos
NK054(yi)001:1693: na / / des na snang stong gnyis gcig gi
NK054(yi)001:1694: rgyan du snang ba ni ma 'dres yongs rdzogs kyi
NK054(yi)001:1695: na / / rgyan no // bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa /
NK054(yi)001:1696: ngo bo bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni ma 'dres
NK054(yi)001:1697: yongs rdzogs snang stong gang gi phyogs su ma song
NK054(yi)001:1698: ba ni bsam pa las 'das pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1699: rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni gong du smos pa'i rgyan rnams /
NK054(yi)001:1700: gnam rgyan sa rgyan bar rgyan mchod pa'i lha mo
NK054(yi)001:1701: 'od zer gyi 'phro 'du rnams ye shes dang rang
NK054(yi)001:1702: snang bas gdul bya bsngo bgrangs las 'das pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1703: klubs pa ni ye shes rang snang ba'i dbang gis
NK054(yi)001:1704: rgyan gyi bye brag rnams ji ltar spungs kyang mi
NK054(yi)001:1706: yid du 'ong ba dang dga' ba bskyed pa lta bu ste /
NK054(yi)001:1708: spags pa tshad dpag tu med pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1709: spags pa ni gzhal yas khang gi 'og gzhi ste /
NK054(yi)001:1710: spyi'i 'og gzhi las gzhal yas khang 'phags pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:1711: de las lha snam dang de las gru chad dang /
NK054(yi)001:1712: de las rdo rje'i gdung zlum dang /
NK054(yi)001:1713: de las 'khor lo 'phags pa ste rim pa lnga ni /
NK054(yi)001:1714: theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la //
NK054(yi)001:1715: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK054(yi)001:1720: byang chub sems dpal la sbyangs nas 'di nyid du 'jug pa'i don no //
NK054(yi)001:1721: 'og gzhi las spags pa bzhin du steng na yang bya skyibs de ltar bgrang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:1722: tshad dpag tu med pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1723: gzhal yas khang gi rgya dang mtho dman gyi tshad gnyis te /
NK054(yi)001:1724: rgya che chung gi tshad dpag tu med pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1725: gzhal yang khang thugs rig pa rang snang ba'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam ste /
NK054(yi)001:1726: chos kyi dbyings la mtha' med pas gzhal yas kyang de nyid de sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1727: mtho dman tshad med pa ni ston pa'i dgongs pa
NK054(yi)001:1728: thugs rig pa nyid sa bcu pa'i yang spyod yul
NK054(yi)001:1729: ma yin te / gang gis kyang ma reg pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1730: gzhal yas khang gi bum pa'i rtse mo gdul bya gang gis kyang mi mthong ste /
NK054(yi)001:1731: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor brtags pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:1732: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
NK054(yi)001:1733: par song yang dbu'i gtsug tor dma' bar ma gyur
NK054(yi)001:1734: te / ma mthong ba bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:1735: des na rang rig pa rang snang ba'i gzhal yas
NK054(yi)001:1736: khang gi rtse mo sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi rang
NK054(yi)001:1737: snang min pa gdul byas mi reg pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1738: sangs rgyas kyis kyang rig pa bdag nyid chen po'i ngang du lhun gyis grub pas /
NK054(yi)001:1739: yul yul can gyi phra ba'ang ma dmigs so //
NK054(yi)001:1741: rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1742: gzhal yas khang la gdul bya rnam thar bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug ste /
NK054(yi)001:1743: 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i rtags su sgo bzhi'i sgo khyud dang bcas par byung ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:1744: de yang mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas rnam thar gsum yin pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1745: spros pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid med pa shas che ba lta bu yin la /
NK054(yi)001:1746: gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'am /
NK054(yi)001:1747: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa zhes pa bstan pas bzhi ste /
NK054(yi)001:1748: de la yang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:1749: sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyi gzhung gi stong pa phyogs chad lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:1750: ngo bo gang du'ang ma grub la mtshan nyid cir yang mi 'gag par 'char ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1751: thabs la mkhas pa na mtshan nyid mi 'gags par
NK054(yi)001:1752: 'char ba nyid na 'dzin pa'i 'du shes phra rags
NK054(yi)001:1753: ma grub pa dngos po'i mthas ma gos te /
NK054(yi)001:1754: chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa nyid na mtshan
NK054(yi)001:1755: ma med pa'i mthas ma gos te rang snang gi
NK054(yi)001:1756: 'gags par 'char ba ni thabs la mkhas pa zhes
NK054(yi)001:1757: bya'o // 'dir de dag kyang ldan la /
NK054(yi)001:1758: sgra mthun don dpags kyi ngos nas rang byung ye shes 'ba' zhig la sgo bzhi brtsi ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:1759: 'khor 'das thams cad ston pa'i dgongs pa rang byung ye shes su dbyer med la /
NK054(yi)001:1760: de nyid la snang stong la sogs pa phyogs 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:1761: gyi mtha' thams cad ma spangs rang bral ba ni
NK054(yi)001:1763: ye shes de nyid la dag pa'am gsal ba'i yon
NK054(yi)001:1764: tan gyi chos kyis bzhag pa rdul phra rab tsam
NK054(yi)001:1765: yang med de / dmigs pa phra ba'ang mi gnas pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1766: dgongs pa nyid la 'bras bu yon tan gyi chos
NK054(yi)001:1767: thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yul du smon pa
NK054(yi)001:1768: med pa'o // smon bya'i chos ma dmigs pa'i rig
NK054(yi)001:1769: pa rang byung gi ye shes dag ma dag gi
NK054(yi)001:1770: gdul bya thams cad la rgyud chad med par 'char
NK054(yi)001:1773: de ltar sgo bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i don la /
NK054(yi)001:1774: gdul bya rnams theg pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas 'jug pa ni gdul bya'i snang ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:1775: cig car 'jug pa la'ang g.yo thob brtan pa'i rig
NK054(yi)001:1776: pas nyams su myong pa'i rtags su sgo bzhi sgo
NK054(yi)001:1777: khyud dang bcas par byung ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1778: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1779: rta babs kyi don te rnam thar brgyad kyang /
NK054(yi)001:1780: thun mong gi rnam par thar pa brgyad la nyan thos kyi bzhi /
NK054(yi)001:1782: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu dang drug /
NK054(yi)001:1785: 'og ma 'og ma mthar te gong ma gong mar phyin pas rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya /
NK054(yi)001:1786: yang na lung a nu yo ga man chad kyi theg pa brgyad la sbyangs nas ab bo //
NK054(yi)001:1787: de bzhin n du byas pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1788: de'i yon tan gyi gzugs brnyan rang snang ba sgo thog nas rta babs them skas brgyad pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1789: zhabs dang ma chags zar tshag /
NK054(yi)001:1791: sna tshogs khyung mgo rim par 'khrigs //
NK054(yi)001:1792: zhes pa zhabs su pha gu'i rtsig pa ste rta rkang zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:1793: gnyis pa la pad+ma'i phreng ba /
NK054(yi)001:1794: gsum pa rin po che'i sgrom bu /
NK054(yi)001:1796: lnga pa rin po che'i snang 'phyongs /
NK054(yi)001:1797: drug pa rin po che'i chun 'phyongs //
NK054(yi)001:1798: bdun pa ba so'i shar bu /
NK054(yi)001:1799: brgyad pa khyung mgo ste sgo'i ya phub na yang yod do //
NK054(yi)001:1800: ye shes rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1801: phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang nang du gyur pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1802: ston pa'i thugs rang byung gi ye shes gdul bya'i 'du shes kyi rgyud las grol te /
NK054(yi)001:1803: 'khor 'das thams cad rang rig par lhun gyis grub pa las /
NK054(yi)001:1804: de las ma gtogs pa'i chos can gyi dngos po
NK054(yi)001:1805: rdul phra rab tsam yang med par thams cad bdag
NK054(yi)001:1806: nyid chen por lhun gyi grub pa'i don gyis phyi
NK054(yi)001:1807: nang du 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:1808: gzhal yas khang phyi nang med par gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1809: de'i don gyis yul sems 'khor 'das snod bcud thams
NK054(yi)001:1810: cad rig par lhun gyis grub pas kun tu nang
NK054(yi)001:1812: dper na rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i skyes bu gcig
NK054(yi)001:1813: gis gzhal yas kyi sgo them nang la rkang pa
NK054(yi)001:1814: g.yon pa gtad nas g.yas pa rgyab tu snyab e
NK054(yi)001:1815: nus byas kyang zur tsam yang rgyab tu mi phyin
NK054(yi)001:1816: / ma rtog pa'i skyes bu gcig gis nang du
NK054(yi)001:1817: gtad nas rgyab tu g.yas e nus byas kyang zur
NK054(yi)001:1818: tsam yang nang du mi phyin pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:1819: na zhes pa gnas sam gzhi'i don te /
NK054(yi)001:1821: sa'i khyad par bkod pa'i ngos nas gdan khri bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1822: mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang zhes pa la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:1824: nang rtags phyi ru 'byung ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:1825: gdul bya rtags las rgyal ba gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:1826: nang rtags phyi ru byung ba la'ang rang rig pa'i rtsal gdul bya la mngon du snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:1827: thugs ni mi 'jigs bzhi yis bdud bzhi bcom //
NK054(yi)001:1829: thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rang byung gi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:1830: chos thams cad bdag nyid chen por rtogs pas gang
NK054(yi)001:1831: la'ang bag tsha ba med pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1832: 'khor lo'i dbus su seng ge brgyad kyi khri byung /
NK054(yi)001:1833: thugs rang byung gi ye shes stobs bcu dang ldan
NK054(yi)001:1834: pa'i rtags su shar du 'degs stobs che ba glang
NK054(yi)001:1835: po che brgyad / yon tan rdzu 'phrul che zhing
NK054(yi)001:1836: 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du shar ba'i rtags
NK054(yi)001:1838: gsung dbang bcu mngon du byas pa'i rtags su nub tu rma bya brgyad /
NK054(yi)001:1839: phrin las bzhi thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i don
NK054(yi)001:1840: la shar ba'i rtags su byang du shang shang te'u
NK054(yi)001:1841: brgyad / de rnams bsdoms pa las sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:1842: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
NK054(yi)001:1843: yod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
NK054(yi)001:1844: brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir brtan par byas la
NK054(yi)001:1845: / theg pa brgyad las bgrod nas 'byung ba'i phyir
NK054(yi)001:1846: sems can rnams brgyad brgyad de de ni mtshan gyi
NK054(yi)001:1847: / dbang ngo // yang nang rtags phyi ru shar
NK054(yi)001:1848: ba gcig la seng ges ni gzhan la bag tsha
NK054(yi)001:1849: ba dang 'jigs pa med cing skad bsgrags pas /
NK054(yi)001:1850: seng ge'i rigs rnams ni ngam pa'am dpa' bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:1851: stag la sogs pa'i gcan gzan rnams ni gab cing bros /
NK054(yi)001:1852: wa dang sprel sogs pa'i gcan gzan phra mo rnams ni dmyal thag bcad /
NK054(yi)001:1853: de dang 'dra bar ston pas mnyam pa nyid gnyis
NK054(yi)001:1854: su med par rtogs pa'i thugs rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:1855: shes kyis skye 'gag med pa'i don bsgrags pas /
NK054(yi)001:1856: wa sprel dang 'dra ba'i phyi rol pa dang bdud
NK054(yi)001:1857: dang lta ba log pa'i tshogs thams cad ni brlagsa
NK054(yi)001:1859: nyan thos la sogs pa theg pa 'og ma rnams
NK054(yi)001:1860: ni gcan zan phra mo dang 'dra bar gab par
NK054(yi)001:1861: byed / 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
NK054(yi)001:1863: gsang sngags kyi skyes bu rnams ni dad pa skye
NK054(yi)001:1864: la ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar dgongs pa mchog tu
NK054(yi)001:1865: gyur pa ste / de'i phyir dbus su seng ge'i khri'o //
NK054(yi)001:1868: sgos su glang po tha mal pa glang smyug glang
NK054(yi)001:1869: rnam rim pa bzhin du 'og ma khal dang bcas
NK054(yi)001:1870: pa bcu gong ma'i khal gcig tu rdzogs pa dang
NK054(yi)001:1871: 'dra bar / 'dir nyan thos theg pa rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub sems dpar rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:1872: de rgyu 'bras dang bcas pa gsang sngags phyi pa'i ngang du rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:1873: de rgyu 'bras dang bcas pa nang pa gnyis su rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:1874: de rgyu 'bras dang bcas pa rdzogs pa chen por rdzogs pa'i rtags su glang po che'i khri'o //
NK054(yi)001:1878: 'gro shugs che bas ni gad pa dang gong bu
NK054(yi)001:1879: la sogs pa rnams la mchongs pas brgal bas phar
NK054(yi)001:1880: kar phyin / skad ring ba de gnas gang yin pa der skyol bar byed /
NK054(yi)001:1881: dar drags te mgyogs pa'i dud 'gro gzhan dang mi 'dra bar mgyogs /
NK054(yi)001:1882: de bzhin du ston pa'i thugs rig pa'i ye shes mngon du snang bar byed pa'i thabs mchog gis /
NK054(yi)001:1883: 'og ma rnams kyis spang bar byed pa'i chos gnyen
NK054(yi)001:1884: po rgyu 'bras la spyad kyang rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:1885: shes su gsal bas skyon gyis mi gos te /
NK054(yi)001:1886: ma 'gag pa bsod nams kyi tshogs /
NK054(yi)001:1887: mi 'dzin pa ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur bas 'khor ba spangs pa med par rang dag /
NK054(yi)001:1888: skad ring de ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs kyi
NK054(yi)001:1889: bar du 'gro don mdzad pa la skyo dub med
NK054(yi)001:1890: / nye bar rnal 'byor pas nyams su blangs na
NK054(yi)001:1891: 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor
NK054(yi)001:1892: / chud mi za / shugs che ste tshe gcig
NK054(yi)001:1893: gis sangs rgyas kyi sa la sbyor bar byed do
NK054(yi)001:1894: / chud mi za / // des na rta'i gdan no //
NK054(yi)001:1896: rma bya yid 'ong skad snyan zas su dug chen za ba bzhin zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1897: btsan dug zog pa spu sdug mdog gsal skad snyan pa bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:1898: thugs rang byung gi ye shes su lhun gyis grub na dug gsum dang dug lnga ma spangs par /
NK054(yi)001:1900: dug lnga ye shes lnga 'bras bu rang snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:1901: de'i rtags su rma bya'i gdan no //
NK054(yi)001:1903: stod byar 'dug pas nam mkha' la longs spyod /
NK054(yi)001:1904: smad mir 'dug pas sa gzhir longs spyod /
NK054(yi)001:1905: de bzhin thugs rang byung gi ye shes 'khor 'das
NK054(yi)001:1906: mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'i rang snang
NK054(yi)001:1907: ba'i mdzad spyod kyis dpe sa gzhi la longs spyod
NK054(yi)001:1908: pa bzhin / 'gro ba gang la gang 'dul lhun grub tu mdzad pa yang /
NK054(yi)001:1909: dpe nam mkha' la longs spyod pa bzhin dgongs pa
NK054(yi)001:1910: chos nyid la 'gyur ba med pas gdul bya'i skyon
NK054(yi)001:1911: gyis mi gos pa'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyir shang
NK054(yi)001:1913: gdul bya rtags las rgyal ba'i rtags ni /
NK054(yi)001:1914: sems dpa' dman pa'i lus khri la zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1915: dag pa'i sa gsum la gnas pa'i sems dpa' rnams /
NK054(yi)001:1916: lus kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gdan bya /
NK054(yi)001:1917: ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rna bas chos nyan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1918: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1919: gnyis su med par rtogs pa rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:1920: shes mtha' thams cad dang bral ba nyid cir yang
NK054(yi)001:1922: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:1923: mtshan nyid gnyis bsdoms pa lta bu ste dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni /
NK054(yi)001:1924: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba stong pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:1925: yul du byed pa'ang mi mnga' ba las chos thams
NK054(yi)001:1926: cad rang snang ba la ni gsal ba zhes bya
NK054(yi)001:1927: ste / de gnyis mtshon pa'i tshogs la snga phyi byung yang /
NK054(yi)001:1928: ngo bo skad cig la dbyer med pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:1929: don mtshon dka' ba nyid la ma skyes pa'i cha
NK054(yi)001:1930: la rang snang ba'i rtags su spros pa dang bral
NK054(yi)001:1931: ba zla ba zlum pos mtshon la /
NK054(yi)001:1932: ma 'gag par rang snang bas gdul bya'i dgos pa rdzogs pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1933: gsal bsregs thun mong ba thabs nyi ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:1934: dkyil 'khor ni rgyas pa zlum pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1935: de gnyis bsregs pa che bas nyi ma thabs kyi rang bzhin steng du 'dod /
NK054(yi)001:1936: de la slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes /
NK054(yi)001:1937: zla ba steng du 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs bkod pa la /
NK054(yi)001:1938: rdo rje'i rtse mo'i rtags thig le chen po dang de'i sa bon ni klad pa'i byang sems te /
NK054(yi)001:1939: de ni rtogs na mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi byed pa po /
NK054(yi)001:1940: ma rtogs na 'khor ba'i chos thams cad kyi byed pa po yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:1941: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyang yin /
NK054(yi)001:1942: rang byung ye shes dus gsum du mi 'gyur bas rdo rje'i rigs kyang yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:1943: dbus gtso bo'i gdan la zla ba dbus su gnas so zhes smos so //
NK054(yi)001:1944: gos pa med pa pad+ma zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1945: rig pa rang byung gi ye shes phyi nang gi chos thams cad snang yang /
NK054(yi)001:1946: snang bya snang byed ma grub pas dngos po'i mthas ma gos /
NK054(yi)001:1947: mi 'gags par rang snang bar cir yang 'char bas
NK054(yi)001:1948: dngos po med pa'i mthas ma gos pa'i don no
NK054(yi)001:1949: // de'i rtags su pad+mara snang ste pad+ma 'dam las skyes kyang 'dam gyi nyes pa mi gos /
NK054(yi)001:1950: 'dam na gnas pa'i dus su kha dog gsal ba dang 'dra bar /
NK054(yi)001:1951: khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas nyid na rang byung gi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1952: sna tshogs pad+ma chen po rgyu'am rin po che las grub par gsungs /
NK054(yi)001:1953: de nyid nyi zla'i gdan gyi zhabs te sum brtsegs so //
NK054(yi)001:1954: rin po che'i gdan la zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:1955: gdan de'i zhabs su rat+na'i khri ste /
NK054(yi)001:1957: phyogs bzhir khri rkang bzhi dang brgyad de ston pa'i
NK054(yi)001:1958: thugs rang byung gi ye shes thams dang shes rab
NK054(yi)001:1960: gdul bya'i ngo la yon tan gyi rtsal dgos 'dod
NK054(yi)001:1961: lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su rin po che'i khri
NK054(yi)001:1962: ste / theg pa brgyad kyi rtags su ka ba
NK054(yi)001:1963: brgyad la ka ba re re la'ang 'phags pa'i nor
NK054(yi)001:1964: bdun lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su /
NK054(yi)001:1965: zad pa med pa'i mdzod mig bdun bdun no //
NK054(yi)001:1966: de la yang slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rjes /
NK054(yi)001:1967: ka ba bkyag pa'i gdung ma re re la mdzod mig bdun bdun zhes 'dod /
NK054(yi)001:1968: de ltar yin na gdung ma rnams li'i bzo'i gdung ma ltar 'thad /
NK054(yi)001:1969: gdan de rnams kyi gnas lugs ni 'dir chos 'chad pa'i dus kho na yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:1970: kun bzang yab yum dbus su bzhugs pa'i spyan snga na mi bskyod pa bzhugs pas /
NK054(yi)001:1972: des na kun tu bzang po yab yum rigs lnga dang drug la lnga brtsegs /
NK054(yi)001:1973: sems dpa' rnams la pad zla'i gdan sum brtsegs la /
NK054(yi)001:1974: khams lugs kyi rat+na'i khri rkyang ba re re yod par bzhed /
NK054(yi)001:1975: sgo ba khro bo la nyi ma rkyang pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:1976: thub pa drug ni 'dir med de /
NK054(yi)001:1977: gleng gzhi 'di ni sa bcu pa yan chad kyi yul yin te /
NK054(yi)001:1978: dgu pas kyang mi mthong bas /
NK054(yi)001:1979: thub pa drug gi gdul bya 'gro drug yin la /
NK054(yi)001:1980: dper na me long gzugs brnyan gyi rgyud blta mkhan bzhin shar te /
NK054(yi)001:1981: blta mi med pa'i gzugs brnyan mi 'char ba bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:1982: 'gro drug med pas thub pa drug mi snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:1983: 'on kyang lung bstan brgyud pa'i bstan pa le'u gsum
NK054(yi)001:1984: pa'i dbu na gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa dang
NK054(yi)001:1986: nyid las mi gzhan pa rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i 'khor ni /
NK054(yi)001:1987: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK054(yi)001:1988: gong du khas blang pa'i 'phro ni 'di yin te /
NK054(yi)001:1989: spyi thun mong gi theg pa'i skad du na zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga dang /
NK054(yi)001:1990: zag bcas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga chos mthun pa tsam du yod kyang /
NK054(yi)001:1991: 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa dang ma bral bas 'dir
NK054(yi)001:1992: ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la 'khor 'das dbyer
NK054(yi)001:1993: med pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i cha nas gzhal bas
NK054(yi)001:1994: / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs pa yin te /
NK054(yi)001:1995: chos gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i gleng gzhi la
NK054(yi)001:1996: ni 'khor ba ma dag pa'i cha gcig logs su
NK054(yi)001:1998: sangs rgyas dag po 'khor ba'i mthas ma gos pa gcig des bstan pa rnams gsungs pa yin la /
NK054(yi)001:1999: 'dir ni gleng gzhi 'dzom pa'i dus su mun pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2000: dkyil 'khor du nyi ma shar mun pa snang bar
NK054(yi)001:2001: gsal ba bzhin / khams gsum gyi rtog tshogs bzhi
NK054(yi)001:2002: bcu rtsa gnyis rang byung ye shes su dag nas
NK054(yi)001:2003: gsal ba bzhin / / rtog pa nyid spangs pa
NK054(yi)001:2004: med par 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyu mtshan
NK054(yi)001:2006: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi 'bru gnon ni /
NK054(yi)001:2007: ston pa'i rang bzhin spyir bstan pa'i skabs su bstan pa dang mthun /
NK054(yi)001:2008: rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2009: rnam par shes pa ni tshogs brgyad de /
NK054(yi)001:2011: yid kyi shes pa dang drug /
NK054(yi)001:2012: nyon mongs can gyi yid dang bdun /
NK054(yi)001:2013: kun gzhi'i rnam shes dang brgyad de /
NK054(yi)001:2014: slob dpon pad+mas mchis phur tshar gcig gsungs pa'i dus
NK054(yi)001:2015: su tshogs brgyad kyi 'khor dang ldan pa rgyal po
NK054(yi)001:2016: zhes bya / zhes pa de tsam bas ma gsungs
NK054(yi)001:2017: pa sman lung du tshar gcig gsungs pa'i dus su
NK054(yi)001:2019: rnam par shes pa'i yul tha dad du shes pa la bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2020: mig gis gzugs sdug mi sdug gi bye brag rnams shes /
NK054(yi)001:2021: rna bas sgra snyan mi snyan shes /
NK054(yi)001:2024: lus kyis reg bya shes pa ni sgo lnga'i shes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2025: drug po 'gag pa'i de ma thag pa'i yid kyi shes pa ni gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2026: yul bzang ngan bar ma gsum la dug gsum bsags pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
NK054(yi)001:2027: kun gzhi las don yul dang /
NK054(yi)001:2029: bar gyi rnam par shes pa'i rgyun rnams su shes
NK054(yi)001:2030: pas yul tha dad pa'i bye brag rnams su 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:2031: pa ste / des na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2032: rgyal po ni gsum ste ma rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor dang ldan pa'i phyi yang rgyal po ste /
NK054(yi)001:2033: ku na gzhi la tshogs brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2034: rnam shes tshogs brgyad de nyid ye shes lhun gyis grub pas tshogs brgyad ma 'gag pa nyid na /
NK054(yi)001:2035: mig gis gzugs mthong sems nyid du rang snang mnyam pa nyid du gsal /
NK054(yi)001:2036: de ltar yul lnga'i chos rtogs pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshe /
NK054(yi)001:2037: yid kyi shes pa gsal cha snang stong dbyer med
NK054(yi)001:2038: pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du lhun gyis grub
NK054(yi)001:2039: / des bdag 'dzin gtan nas dag pas chags sdang
NK054(yi)001:2040: bskyed pa'i dug gsum gtan nas ma dmigs nyon mongs
NK054(yi)001:2041: can gyi yid gzhi nas dag ste /
NK054(yi)001:2043: des kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'khrul pa bskyed par byed
NK054(yi)001:2044: pa'i ngo bo dag pas chu rnyog ma dag pa
NK054(yi)001:2045: dang 'dra bar / rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi mngon du gyur /
NK054(yi)001:2046: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rang snang sems
NK054(yi)001:2047: kyi chos nyid rang mal du phyin pa'i dus su
NK054(yi)001:2048: / spros bral rnam dag 'ba' zhig gi phyogs la zhen pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:2049: 'du shes zad pa'i rang rig pa mngon du gyur pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:2050: rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid gsal la ma 'gag pa
NK054(yi)001:2051: yin pas tshogs brgyad ngo bo ma dmigs pas ni
NK054(yi)001:2053: rnam pa ma 'gag pas ni stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal te /
NK054(yi)001:2054: mtha' gnyis las rgyal bas rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:2055: yang na dbang du byed pas rgyal po zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2056: rgyal po chen po'i mnga' ris na ci tshogs pa
NK054(yi)001:2057: thams cad rgyal po'i dbang yin pas gar bsgyur bsgyur
NK054(yi)001:2058: dbang yod / dper na rgyal pos nyes pa gcig
NK054(yi)001:2059: byas kyang chad pas gcad mkhan med pa bzhin du
NK054(yi)001:2060: dbang yod / / tshogs brgyad sems kyi chos nyid
NK054(yi)001:2061: du lhun gyis grub pa las tshogs brgyad ma 'gag
NK054(yi)001:2062: par snang yang byang chub sems las ma g.yos shing
NK054(yi)001:2063: dbang yod / / / rig pa rang nyid la rang nyid snang bas /
NK054(yi)001:2064: dngos po'i mtha' dbang du bsdus /
NK054(yi)001:2065: rig pa dngos po thams cad dang bral ba nyid cir yang 'char ba la /
NK054(yi)001:2066: bya byed dam rgyu 'bras sam ched rtsol thams cad
NK054(yi)001:2067: dang bral bar rang snang bas dngos po med pa
NK054(yi)001:2069: mtha' gnyis las rgyal bas rgyal po zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2070: zag bcas kyi dus su rnam shes tshogs brgyad gzhi dag nas /
NK054(yi)001:2071: rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi mngon du gyur /
NK054(yi)001:2072: chos thams cad kyi de nyid la rtsal rdzogs nas 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:2073: mun pa snang bar gyur pa dang 'dra bar zag
NK054(yi)001:2074: med kyi phung po lnga las lhag pa shes rab
NK054(yi)001:2075: kyi phung po zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2076: zag bcas ni 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid yin pas zag
NK054(yi)001:2077: bcas las lhag pa'i zag med ni shes rab kyi
NK054(yi)001:2078: phung po ste / zag bcas kyi skabs su yang rnam shes phung pos ma bsdus pa med par /
NK054(yi)001:2079: zag med kyi dus su 'khor 'das yul sems rgyu
NK054(yi)001:2080: 'bras thams cad 'dus ma byas pa spros pa'i mtshan
NK054(yi)001:2081: ma thams cad dang bral ba mngon du gyur te
NK054(yi)001:2083: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rnal ma don gyi kun gzhir rtogs pas /
NK054(yi)001:2084: dper na nam mkhas nam mkha' mi sems kyang nam mkha' las 'da' ba med pa bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:2085: 'bras bu chos sku lhun gyis grub pa ni shes
NK054(yi)001:2086: pa rnams kyi nang na rab bam mchog tu gyur
NK054(yi)001:2087: pa de las logs su med pas lhag pa shes
NK054(yi)001:2089: rnam shes phung po shes rab dang sbyar ba'i rgyu mtshan ci zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:2090: rnam par shes pa la brten te shes rab skye /
NK054(yi)001:2091: des na gzugs kyi phung po'i don rtogs par byed
NK054(yi)001:2092: pa yang rnam shes la brten dgos pa'i phyir ro
NK054(yi)001:2093: // rnam shes tshogs brgyad rang thad du snang ba ni 'khor ba yin la /
NK054(yi)001:2094: tshogs brgyad gzhi dag pa lhag pa'i shes rab tu
NK054(yi)001:2095: lhun gyis grub pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa
NK054(yi)001:2096: sangs rgyas te / des na 'khor 'das gnyis kyang rtogs ma rtogs tsam zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:2097: de lta bu'i don mthar phyin pa'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid gzhan don du snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:2099: lngar byung lngar snang lngar 'dul sgrol /
NK054(yi)001:2100: ces pa phung po lnga gnas dag pas rigs lnga'i skur snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:2101: phung po lnga'i nang nas rnam shes phung po ni phung po bzhi po'i rtsa ba yin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:2102: rdo rje'i rigs mi bskyod pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:2104: sku mdun dang rgyab med pa zhes pa nas /
NK054(yi)001:2105: sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan par bklags la /
NK054(yi)001:2106: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po ste /
NK054(yi)001:2107: mi bskyod pa'i sku mtshan gyi me tog la dpe byad kyi 'bras bu chags par snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:2108: sku mdog ni thugs 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su sngon po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2109: mtshan ni thugs chos kyi sku la mtha' gnyis kyis mi bskyod pas mtshan de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:2110: thugs mtshan du snang ba'i dus na ni rang byung gi ye shes /
NK054(yi)001:2111: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2112: gsung yig 'brur snang ba'i dus na h'u ngam tha log por snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:2113: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2114: spyi'i rnam bzhag thams cad rnam shes kyi gong du bshad zin /
NK054(yi)001:2116: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshad zin pa mthun /
NK054(yi)001:2118: rtsa ba sems nyid spros pa'i mtshan ma dang bral
NK054(yi)001:2119: ba mi 'gags pa gzugs kyi phung por snang la
NK054(yi)001:2120: / de ma rtogs pa'i dus na /
NK054(yi)001:2122: gzugs chen po bco lnga ste /
NK054(yi)001:2123: rgyu'i gzugs sa chu me rlung bzhi snod bcud thams cad kyi rgyu yin pas so //
NK054(yi)001:2124: dngos su yod cing 'jig pa thams cad bcas pas gzugs so //
NK054(yi)001:2126: mig gi dbang po la sogs pa lnga /
NK054(yi)001:2127: de'i yul gzugs la sogs pa lnga dang bcu'o //
NK054(yi)001:2128: rnam par rigs byed ma yin pa'i gzugs ni skyer yod /
NK054(yi)001:2130: bstan du med pa so sor thar pa'i sdom pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:2131: de dag rnam grangs dang bcas pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:2132: 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyir na rgyal po ste log rtog gi ngo bo'o //
NK054(yi)001:2133: don rtogs pa'i ngos nas rgyal po ni gnyis te /
NK054(yi)001:2134: mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba dang dbang du byed pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2135: mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba ni rig pa byang chub
NK054(yi)001:2136: kyi sems mnyam pa nyid snang stong gi mtha' dang
NK054(yi)001:2137: bral ba mi 'gags pa gzugs chen bco lngar snang
NK054(yi)001:2138: bas stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal /
NK054(yi)001:2139: snang tsam nyid na chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pas dngos po'i mthar las rgyal /
NK054(yi)001:2140: dbang du byed pas rgyal ba ni sems kyi chos
NK054(yi)001:2141: nyid chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mi
NK054(yi)001:2142: 'gags pa la gzugs chen bco lnga ltar snang yang
NK054(yi)001:2144: sems nyid kyi ngang du lhun gyis grub cing mi
NK054(yi)001:2145: dmigs pa ni rang dbang bsgyur ba'i dbang du byed
NK054(yi)001:2146: pa ste / mtha' thams cad dang bral ba nyid stong pa'i mthar mthong ste /
NK054(yi)001:2147: rig pa rang snang mi 'gags pa'i chos lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:2148: grub pa ni stong pa dbang bsgyur te mthar thug
NK054(yi)001:2150: gzugs kyi phung po de ltar lhun gyis grub pa nyid mngon du snang ba mthar phyin pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:2151: zag med na lhag pa tshul khrims kyi phung po ste /
NK054(yi)001:2152: zag bcas kyi tshul khrims ni gzugs la brten te skye /
NK054(yi)001:2153: zag med tshul khrims kyis gzhi med skye 'gags dang
NK054(yi)001:2154: bcas pa nyid phung po sems kyi ngang nyid du
NK054(yi)001:2155: lhun gyis grub na mthar phyin pa 'bras bu chos
NK054(yi)001:2156: sku'i ngang la nyams pa gzhi dag nyams mnyams kyi
NK054(yi)001:2158: tha mal las lhag pas lhag pa tshul khrims kyi phung po ces bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2159: gzugs kyi phung po dang sbyar ba'i gtan tshigs ni /
NK054(yi)001:2160: gzugs kyi phung po la tshul khrims kyi gzhi dang gnas yod /
NK054(yi)001:2161: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po yod /
NK054(yi)001:2162: rtogs pas gzugs rang byung gi ye shes su dag
NK054(yi)001:2163: na gzugs dang tshul khrims dang nyams ma nyams thams
NK054(yi)001:2164: cad sems nyid du gsal ba ni ched du bsrung
NK054(yi)001:2165: mtshams ma dmigs kyang nyams pa phra ba'ang med pa
NK054(yi)001:2166: ni lhag pa tshul khrims kyi phung po'i ngo bo'o
NK054(yi)001:2167: // de lta bu'i don lhun gyis grub pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:2168: gzhan snang gi mdzad pa mi 'gags par shar ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK054(yi)001:2169: sku mdun dang rgyab med pa nas dbu gsum dang ldan pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid can /
NK054(yi)001:2170: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar
NK054(yi)001:2171: po mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar bar snang ste
NK054(yi)001:2172: / me long lta bu'i ye shes sku'i rigs rang
NK054(yi)001:2173: byung gi ye shes gsal la mi 'gags pa'i bdag
NK054(yi)001:2174: nyid la ni rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ste
NK054(yi)001:2175: / / ye shes de nyid la mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral bas sku mdog dkar po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2176: thugs mtshan du snang na 'khor lo ste /
NK054(yi)001:2177: gdul bya'i rgyud la sku'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:2179: sku'i sa bon +amo'am ta log pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2180: de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2182: tshor ba ni bde sdug btang snyoms gsum ste /
NK054(yi)001:2183: yul bzang ba la 'dod chags pa bde ba /
NK054(yi)001:2184: zhan pa la zhe sdang ba sdug bsngal /
NK054(yi)001:2185: bar pa la chags sdang gang yang mi skye ba btang snyoms /
NK054(yi)001:2186: de yang dbang po drug gi sgo nas yul drug
NK054(yi)001:2187: la brtsi bas yul gyi sgo nas de skye bas
NK054(yi)001:2189: de ni rtog pa 'khor dang ldan pas rgyal po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2190: tha mal pa 'khor ba'i sar de nyid la theg
NK054(yi)001:2191: pa 'di nyid kyi sgo nas sems nyid mnyam pa
NK054(yi)001:2193: tshor ba drug gsum bco brgyad du ma 'gag par
NK054(yi)001:2194: snang tsam nyid na sems nyid lhun gyis grub pas
NK054(yi)001:2196: sems nyid mtha' thams cad dang bral ba mi 'gags
NK054(yi)001:2197: pa las tshor ba'i tshogs su snang bas stong pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2198: mtha' las rgyas / de'i don des dbang du byed
NK054(yi)001:2199: pas rgyal po ste tshor ba mi 'gag par rang
NK054(yi)001:2200: snang yang sems nyid du lhun gyis grub pas 'khor
NK054(yi)001:2201: ba'i phyogs su song ba med de mya ngan las
NK054(yi)001:2203: 'on kyang stong pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs
NK054(yi)001:2204: su song ba med de mya ngan las 'das pa
NK054(yi)001:2205: la dbang bsgyur / de lta bu'i don rtogs pa
NK054(yi)001:2206: mthar phyin lam gyi rtsol ba zad pa'i dus na
NK054(yi)001:2207: la dbang bsgyur / / tshor ba'i phung po gnas
NK054(yi)001:2208: su dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshor ba
NK054(yi)001:2209: zhes bya ste 'bras bu chos sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:2210: mun par snang bar gyur pa bzhin zag pa med
NK054(yi)001:2211: pa'i phung po lnga la ni lhag pa ting nge
NK054(yi)001:2212: 'dzin gyi phung po dang sbyar te /
NK054(yi)001:2213: tshor ba rnam gsum nyid sems nyid du lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:2214: grub pas yul dang yul can ma dmigs pa'i phyir
NK054(yi)001:2215: ched du gnyer ba rdul phra rab tsam med kyang
NK054(yi)001:2216: / nam mkha' nam mkha' las mi 'da' ba dgongs
NK054(yi)001:2217: pa dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pa la ni
NK054(yi)001:2219: 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshor ba zhes kyang brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:2220: de lta bu'i don las rang snang ba gdul bya'i ngor shar ba'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:2221: sku mdun dang rgyab med pa nas dbu gsum dang
NK054(yi)001:2222: ldan pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid rnams rdzogs pa'i rin
NK054(yi)001:2224: sku mdog ser po mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan par snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:2225: de yang mtshan gyi don ni mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK054(yi)001:2226: ye shes phyogs thams cad dang bral bas rtog pa
NK054(yi)001:2227: med pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i che yon rgyun
NK054(yi)001:2229: sku mdog ser po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
NK054(yi)001:2230: shes la yon tan gyis rgyas pa'i rtags su ser
NK054(yi)001:2231: po rgyas pa'i kha dog go //
NK054(yi)001:2232: phyag mtshan na rin po cher snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:2233: rin chen rigs rtog pa med cing dgos 'dod skong ba'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:2234: yig 'bru na ni s+w+aa'am da log por snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:2235: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2236: 'du shes ni rgya che chung tshad med pa gsum ste /
NK054(yi)001:2237: yul la ched du dmigs shing 'dzin te mi gtong ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2238: de la rgya chung ba ni 'dod khams pa'i yul dang dbang po'i 'du shes so //
NK054(yi)001:2239: rgya che ba ni de bas phra ba'i gzugs khams
NK054(yi)001:2240: pa'i rtog dpyod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi
NK054(yi)001:2241: gtong ba'o // tshad med pa ni gzugs med skye
NK054(yi)001:2242: mched mu bzhi'i snyam tsam phra ba la 'dzin pa'o
NK054(yi)001:2243: gtong ba'o // // de dag tha mal pa'i dus
NK054(yi)001:2244: su khams gsum gyi 'du shes phra rags mang po'i
NK054(yi)001:2245: 'khor dang ldan pas rgyal po zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:2246: de lam gyi rtsol ba'i rtog pa gnas su dag
NK054(yi)001:2247: pa'i dus su 'du shes rgya che chung 'gag par
NK054(yi)001:2249: skye ba med pa sems kyi chos nyid du rtogs
NK054(yi)001:2250: pa'i dus na khams gsum mi 'gags par snang ba
NK054(yi)001:2251: nyid thabs sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:2252: grub pa'o // shes rab lhun gyis grub pa'i dus na ma 'gag pas stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal /
NK054(yi)001:2253: ma dmigs pas dngos po'i mtha' las rgyal zhing rtogs pa'i don gyis rgyal po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2254: dbang bsgyur bas rgyal ba ni sems nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi don lhun gyis grub pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:2255: sems kyi don mthong rig pa rang zin pas ji
NK054(yi)001:2256: ltar dbang bsgyur yang ched zhen nam phyogs zhen phra
NK054(yi)001:2258: rang snang mi 'gags ngo bo mi g.yos mtshon pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2259: tha snyad de dag la'ang sems rton 'acha 'a ba
NK054(yi)001:2260: med pa ni dbang du byed pa'i phyir rgyal po
NK054(yi)001:2261: zhes bya'o // don de nyid la zag med kyi
NK054(yi)001:2262: phung po lnga dang sbyar na lhag pa ye shes
NK054(yi)001:2263: kyi phung po zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2264: tha mal pa'i 'du shes rnams sems nyid du gsal
NK054(yi)001:2265: ba'i rang bzhin ye nas yin pa lam pas rtogs
NK054(yi)001:2266: goms mngon du gyur pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:2267: 'du shes snang stong dbyer med pa sems su dag
NK054(yi)001:2268: pas phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang stong
NK054(yi)001:2269: dbyer med pa mnyam pa nyid du gsal /
NK054(yi)001:2270: phyogs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral tsa /
NK054(yi)001:2271: chu rnyog ma dag pa mthar phyin na gzugs brnyan gsal ba mthar phyin pa dang 'dra bar /
NK054(yi)001:2272: sems kyi sgrib byed chu'i rnyog ma dang 'dra bar
NK054(yi)001:2273: dag pa mthar phyin na rang byung gi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:2275: mkhyen pa rnam gnyis me long dang gzugs brnyan ltar
NK054(yi)001:2276: skad cig ma gcig la rdzogs te bsam gyis mi
NK054(yi)001:2277: khyab pa'i 'du shes kyang brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:2278: don de nyid rgyu las ma byung lam las ched
NK054(yi)001:2279: du ma byas ye nas yin pa'i don mngon du
NK054(yi)001:2280: gyur pa la ni ye shes zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2281: tha mal pa las lhag pas lhag pa ye shes kyi phung po zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2282: mthar thug pa'i chos sku'i ngo bo'o //
NK054(yi)001:2283: de nyid gdul bya'i ngo la skur snang ba'i dus na /
NK054(yi)001:2284: sku mdun dang rgyab med ces pa nas /
NK054(yi)001:2285: dbu gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan dang
NK054(yi)001:2286: ldan pa 'du shes rang byung gi ye shes su
NK054(yi)001:2287: gsal bas rgyal po zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2288: snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'bar ba dmar po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2289: de yang tha mal pa'i 'du shes yul la so
NK054(yi)001:2290: sor 'dzin pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes
NK054(yi)001:2291: su dag ste / chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dbyer med du mkhyen pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2292: ye shes de las mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdus pas sku mdog dmar po /
NK054(yi)001:2293: phyag mtshan du snang na pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad do //
NK054(yi)001:2295: de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed rgyal po dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2296: 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig las drug rtsa ba'i nyon mongs /
NK054(yi)001:2297: nyi shu nye ba'i nyon mongs /
NK054(yi)001:2300: lnga yul so sor nges pa /
NK054(yi)001:2301: bzhi gzhan du 'gyur ba dang lnga bcu rtsa gcig ni /
NK054(yi)001:2302: dge mi dge lung ma bstan gsum du 'dus pas 'khor 'grub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
NK054(yi)001:2303: de'i mtshan nyid ci lta bu zhe na 'du byed
NK054(yi)001:2304: kyi phung po nyid sems nyid rang snang ba'i rtog
NK054(yi)001:2305: pa gcig tu zad pas gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste
NK054(yi)001:2306: / snang tsam nyid na snang ba med pa mthar
NK054(yi)001:2307: phyin pa nyid yin pa'i don rtogs bsgoms mngon du
NK054(yi)001:2308: gyur pa'i dus su 'du byed kyi rtog pa'i 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:2309: pa zad pas dngos po'i mtha' las rgyal /
NK054(yi)001:2310: 'on kyang stong pa phyogs gcig pa lta bu ma
NK054(yi)001:2311: yin te 'du byed mi 'gags par rang snang bas
NK054(yi)001:2312: med pa'i mtha' las rgyal bas rgyal po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2313: zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang du byed pas rgyal po ni /
NK054(yi)001:2314: mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i dus su spros bral zhi ba'am /
NK054(yi)001:2315: thim pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:2316: thams cad kyi bdag nyid du lhun gyis grub pas
NK054(yi)001:2317: sems nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la 'du byed
NK054(yi)001:2318: lnga bcu'i tshogs snang yang thams cad la dbang bsgyur
NK054(yi)001:2319: ba'i dbang gis snang bya snang byed med par mnyam
NK054(yi)001:2320: pa nyid du gsal bas phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang
NK054(yi)001:2321: bral ba ni snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2322: sems nyid gang du'ang ma grub pa nyid cir yang
NK054(yi)001:2323: snang bas stong pa phyogs gcig tu song ba med
NK054(yi)001:2324: pa nyid stong pa la dbang bsgyu ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:2325: mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdu pa'am zil gyis gnon pas na rgyal po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2326: don de lta bu mthar phyin 'du byed kyi rgyal
NK054(yi)001:2327: po mngon du gyur pa'i dus su zag pa med
NK054(yi)001:2328: pa'i phung po lnga las ni /
NK054(yi)001:2329: lhag pa'i ye shes rnam par grol ba'i phung po zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:2330: spros pa dang bral ba'i sems nyid 'du byed kyi
NK054(yi)001:2331: tshogs ltar snang yang nyid las ma g.yos te dbyer
NK054(yi)001:2332: med pa'i don rtog pa mngon du gyur pa'i gnas
NK054(yi)001:2333: skabs na / 'du byed kyi ngo bo 'khor 'das
NK054(yi)001:2334: kyi chos thams cad sems chos nyid rang gsal dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2335: dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i ngang du lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:2336: grub pas 'du byed sems kyi rtog pa yin pa
NK054(yi)001:2337: skabs na / las rang grol / chos can gzung
NK054(yi)001:2338: 'dzin gyi yul thams cad rang grol ba ni rang
NK054(yi)001:2339: byung gi ye shes te lhag pa'i ye shes rnam
NK054(yi)001:2340: par grol ba'i phung po zhes bya ste chos sku
NK054(yi)001:2341: skabs na / las rang grol / kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:2342: de gdul bya'i ngo la skur snang ba'i dus na
NK054(yi)001:2343: sku mdun dang rgyab med pa nas /
NK054(yi)001:2344: dbu gsum dang ldan pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid can 'du byed kyi rgyal po don yod grub pa /
NK054(yi)001:2345: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa sku mdog ljang gu'o //
NK054(yi)001:2346: don yod grub pa ni 'du byed kyi phung po
NK054(yi)001:2347: 'khor ba 'grub par byed pa don log pa can
NK054(yi)001:2348: yin pa las / de dag pa'i rang byung gi
NK054(yi)001:2349: ye shes ched du byas pa med par rang gzhan
NK054(yi)001:2350: gyi don thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2351: sku mdog ljang ba ni las sna tshogs la 'jug pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2352: phyag mtshan na ral gri'am sna tshogs rdo rje ste
NK054(yi)001:2353: ral gri so gnyis byas pas phyogs gnyis gcod pa
NK054(yi)001:2354: bzhin du bdag gzhan gyi don dus gcig tu 'grub
NK054(yi)001:2355: pa'o // sna tshogs rdo rje ni gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs kyi las phrin las bzhi 'char ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2356: yig 'bru na ha dang na log po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2357: gsang ba rgya mtsho yum lnga ni /
NK054(yi)001:2358: btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang zhes pa la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:2359: yum lnga ni phung po lnga dang chos mthan par 'byung ba lnga ste /
NK054(yi)001:2360: btsun mo ni rig pa dang dbyer med par dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2361: dang mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid de bskyed pa'i phyir
NK054(yi)001:2363: 'byung ba lngas phung po lnga sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:2364: phyi nang gi chos thams cad rang snang bar bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:2365: mi phyed pa'i phyir yang btsun mo ste /
NK054(yi)001:2366: yul gyi chos thasama cad 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bor bzhugs pas mi phyed /
NK054(yi)001:2367: nang gi phung po lnga yang 'byung ba lnga dang mi phyed pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pas so //
NK054(yi)001:2368: dam pa ni khyad par mi sgra ste spros pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2369: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba chos kyi dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2370: 'byung ba lngas phyi nang gi chos thams cad snang
NK054(yi)001:2371: ba'i ngo bo'o // dbyings kyi sgra'i rgyu mtshan rnams
NK054(yi)001:2372: mtshan nyid du 'chad par 'gyur bas shes par bya'o
NK054(yi)001:2373: ba'i ngo bo'o // // sra ba zhes pas ste /
NK054(yi)001:2374: phyi nang gnyis kyi sa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa thams cad rnam pa ma 'gags pa ltar snang /
NK054(yi)001:2375: ngo bo ma dmigs dbyings su lhun gyis grub pas sra ba zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2376: de'ang 'byung ba lnga'i rig pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni /
NK054(yi)001:2377: yab phung po bshad pa'i khongs su gtogs la /
NK054(yi)001:2378: 'dir ni mtshan nyid 'dzin pa tsam yin te /
NK054(yi)001:2379: snang ba'i dbyings dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2380: snang ba ni nam mkha' ste mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral /
NK054(yi)001:2381: gang yang ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid la chos
NK054(yi)001:2382: thams cad ma 'gag par rang snang ba'i phyir gsal
NK054(yi)001:2383: zhing mi bsgrib pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2384: 'di dag la ni dag bya dag byed med kyang
NK054(yi)001:2385: rang bzhin mngon du gyur pa tsam la bya ste
NK054(yi)001:2386: / dbyings zhes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings te /
NK054(yi)001:2387: de la mtshan nyid lnga'i dang po de nyid gsal la mu mtha' med pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:2388: mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid cir yang 'char ba'i ngo nyid du bzhugs pa ni gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2390: chos thams cad la khyab bya khyab byed med par
NK054(yi)001:2391: 'char te nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mtha' med do
NK054(yi)001:2392: // gnyen pos mi shigs pa ni dngos po thams
NK054(yi)001:2393: cad dang bral bas nam mkha' gzhig cing gzhom du
NK054(yi)001:2395: cir yang ma 'gag pa ni rtogs ma rtogs kyis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad du snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2396: mtha' thams cad ngang gis bsregs pa ni chos kyi
NK054(yi)001:2397: dbyings dngos po gang yang ma grub pa'i nga la
NK054(yi)001:2399: rgyu 'bras dang rtag chad la sogs pa thams cad
NK054(yi)001:2400: chos kyi dbyings su dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2401: mtshan nyid 'di 'drar brjod du med pa ni dag
NK054(yi)001:2402: ma dag la sogs pa mtshan nyid gzhi ma grub
NK054(yi)001:2403: pas brjod pa dang bral ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:2404: don de nyid kyang stong pa'i bem po phyogs gcig
NK054(yi)001:2405: la lta bu ma yin par rig pa ma 'gag
NK054(yi)001:2406: pa nyid ngo bo gang du'ang ma grub pa'am 'byung
NK054(yi)001:2407: ba lnga'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ltar snang bas /
NK054(yi)001:2408: de nyid nam mkhar snang ba nyid kun tu bzang po ste mi bskyod pa'i yum /
NK054(yi)001:2409: ma rtogs pa'i dus su rnam par shes pa'i yul
NK054(yi)001:2410: nam mkha' lta bu bas rdo rje'i yum kun tu
NK054(yi)001:2411: bzang mo'o // sra ba'i dbyings dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2412: sems mnyam pa nyid mi 'gags pa'i ngang las phyi
NK054(yi)001:2413: nang gi sra ba sa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ltar
NK054(yi)001:2414: snang / snang tsam nyid na snang stong dbyer med
NK054(yi)001:2415: pa mnyam pa nyid dbyings kyi chos lnga bshad pa
NK054(yi)001:2416: snang / rnams rdzogs te / de nyid mtshan nyid
NK054(yi)001:2417: thams cad dang bral ba rang rig par gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:2418: ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi yum bud+d+ha spyan te
NK054(yi)001:2419: snang / rnams rdzogs te / / sa gnas su
NK054(yi)001:2420: dag pa dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i ngos
NK054(yi)001:2423: sems mnyam pa nyid mi 'gags pa las gang du'ang
NK054(yi)001:2424: drang du btub pas chu la mnyen pa zhes bya
NK054(yi)001:2425: ste / phyi nang gi mnyen pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:2426: pa rnams snang stong dbyer med pa mnyam pa'i dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2427: dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan pa'i rtogs pa mthar phyin
NK054(yi)001:2428: pa skur snang ba'i dus na yum m+aa ma k+ai
NK054(yi)001:2429: ste / zhes bya ste / chus thams cad bskyed
NK054(yi)001:2430: pas na yum dang 'dra bas na m+aa ma k+ai
NK054(yi)001:2431: ste / zhes bya ste / zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2432: ye shes kyi skabs na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
NK054(yi)001:2433: shes kyang bud+d+ha'i yon tan thams cad bskyed pa'i bdag
NK054(yi)001:2434: ste / zhes bya ste / zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2435: nyid pas / 'bras bu'i gnas skabs na yab yum
NK054(yi)001:2436: ste / zhes bya ste / zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2437: nyid pas / du sbyor ro // dro ba'i dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2438: ste / zhes bya ste / zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2439: nyid pas / du sbyor ro // dang zhes pa
NK054(yi)001:2441: sems mnyam pa nyid mi 'gags pa'i ngang las phyi nang gi drod me lta bur snang la /
NK054(yi)001:2442: de nyid snang stong dbyer med pa mnyam pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:2443: kyi dbyings dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rtogs pa mthar
NK054(yi)001:2444: phyin pa'i rig pa skur snang ba'i dus na na
NK054(yi)001:2446: snang ba mtha' yas kyi yum yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2447: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis mtha' gnyis kyi
NK054(yi)001:2448: skyon mes bsregs pa dang 'dra bar mi gnas par
NK054(yi)001:2449: mdzad do // dkar ba ni skyon dang bral bas na bza' dkar mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:2451: bskyod pa ni rlung ste phyi dang nang gi g.yo
NK054(yi)001:2452: ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa snang stong dbyer med pa
NK054(yi)001:2453: mnyam pa'i d+ha t+w+ai su grub pa'i mtshan nyid d+ha
NK054(yi)001:2454: t+w+aa'i dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan pa rtogs pa mthar
NK054(yi)001:2455: phyin pa'i rig pa dkyil 'khor gyi ngang du nyid
NK054(yi)001:2456: skur snang ba'i dus na yum dam tshig sgrol ma
NK054(yi)001:2457: ste / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis gdul
NK054(yi)001:2458: bya rnams gong nas gong du spyod cing sgrol bar
NK054(yi)001:2459: byed pa dang de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir dam
NK054(yi)001:2461: ye shes bya ba grub pa'i ye shes /
NK054(yi)001:2462: sku na don yod grub pa /
NK054(yi)001:2463: gdul bya'i bya ba thams cad skad cig la lhun gyis grub pa dang yab yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:2465: 'jig rten gyi khams na mtha' med /
NK054(yi)001:2466: de na phung po thams cad lnga la sogs pa'i rtog tshogs su ma gyur pa med /
NK054(yi)001:2467: rtog tshogs gcig dag na kun dag ste /
NK054(yi)001:2468: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtog tshogs thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:2469: ye shes na ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
NK054(yi)001:2470: sku na yab yum gyi sku 'ba' zhig tu lhun gyis grub pas so //
NK054(yi)001:2471: btsun mo'i tshogs dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2472: phung po dang 'byung ba dag pa'i rigs lnga yab
NK054(yi)001:2473: yum gyi tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi dbyings kyi mtha' dang
NK054(yi)001:2475: da rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor la gnyis kyi /
NK054(yi)001:2476: rgyal sras sems dpa'i 'khor la gnyis las sems dpa' lcam dral bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:2477: de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa /
NK054(yi)001:2478: de yang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang gtso 'khor so so na yod pa ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:2479: ston pa kun tu bzang po la lhun gyis rdzogs par bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:2481: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs na kun tu bzang po gang yin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:2482: sems can gyi gnas skabs na yid kyi shes pa
NK054(yi)001:2483: chos thams cad la 'jug cing gcod pa nyid dbyer
NK054(yi)001:2484: med de / yid gnas su dag pa kun tu bzang po yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2485: yid rang snang ba'i dal khams dang skye mched gnas su dag pa sems dpa' dang sems ma /
NK054(yi)001:2486: khro bo dang khro mo'i dkyil 'khor te ston pa
NK054(yi)001:2487: las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa zhes
NK054(yi)001:2488: bya'o // yang na 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad
NK054(yi)001:2489: mnyam pa nyid dbyer med pa thugs rang byung gi
NK054(yi)001:2490: ye shes las ye shes lngar byung ba'i rtags su
NK054(yi)001:2491: bya'o // / rigs lnga'i skur gyur pa yang 'khor ba'i chos las logs na med de /
NK054(yi)001:2492: sems can gyi gnas skabs na phung po lnga rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i ngang du rdzogs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2493: chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba med kyang gzigs mkhan ye shes kyi ngos nas /
NK054(yi)001:2494: yum lnga'i skur byung ba yang 'byung ba lnga nyid der snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:2495: sems can gyi dus na'ang 'byung ba dang phung po
NK054(yi)001:2496: dbyer med pa bzhin rtogs pa'i ye shes dang dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2497: dbyer med / chu dang gsher ba bzhin skur snang ba'i dus na yab yum dbyer med do //
NK054(yi)001:2498: de dbyer med pa las snang ba'i rtogs pa rang
NK054(yi)001:2499: byung gi ye shes kyi ngang la khams dang skye
NK054(yi)001:2500: mched snang ba'i sems dpa' sems ma /
NK054(yi)001:2501: khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin pas de rang las mi gzhan te /
NK054(yi)001:2502: rang las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:2503: de yang chad ston pa'i khyad par dang /
NK054(yi)001:2504: nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor thun mong du bstan
NK054(yi)001:2505: nas bar cis kyang ma chod par rig pa khyad
NK054(yi)001:2506: par can gyi 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ston pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2507: rjes thog ste / de nas zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:2508: byang chub ni go 'phang chen po ste /
NK054(yi)001:2509: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rig pa byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub ste /
NK054(yi)001:2510: byang ba ni spang ba'i cha ched byas kyi sgrib pa phra ba'i phra ba'ang dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2511: chub pa ni mkhyen pa'i cha ste /
NK054(yi)001:2512: mkhyen pa rnam gnyis dbyer med tha gru rgyas pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2514: lam pa las mthar thug ste bdag gzhan gyi ched
NK054(yi)001:2515: du bya ba thams cad dang bral bas don gnyis
NK054(yi)001:2516: rang snang du lhun gyis grub pa mthar phyin pa
NK054(yi)001:2519: thams cad kyi bdag nyid dbyer med pa gang gi'ang ngo bo ma dmigs te /
NK054(yi)001:2520: 'du shes thams cad dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
NK054(yi)001:2522: byang chub chen po de nyid rang snang ba'i sku sa'i snying po /
NK054(yi)001:2525: phyag na rdo rje bzhi dang /
NK054(yi)001:2526: mig gi rnam shes la sogs pa bzhi dbyer med pas na chen po'o //
NK054(yi)001:2527: yang na ston pa'i thugs ye shes nyid sems dpar
NK054(yi)001:2528: byung thugs rang byung ye shes nyid snang bas chen
NK054(yi)001:2529: po'o // yang na da lta 'gro ba'i don du
NK054(yi)001:2530: bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul ltar snang yang
NK054(yi)001:2531: po'o // / ngo bo mthar phyin pa yin pas
NK054(yi)001:2532: kyang lam pa las spags pas na chen po zhes
NK054(yi)001:2533: po'o // / bya'o // rdo rje ni yid kyi
NK054(yi)001:2534: rang bzhin rdo rje ltar dus gsum du 'dus ma
NK054(yi)001:2535: byas pa dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba rdo rje
NK054(yi)001:2536: po'o // / bya'o // lta bu / yid rang
NK054(yi)001:2537: byung gi ye shes gsal la ma 'gag pa chos
NK054(yi)001:2538: thams cad rig pa'i ye shes kyi ngang du 'joms
NK054(yi)001:2540: de gnyis dbyer mi phyed pa ste rig pa'i ye
NK054(yi)001:2541: shes stong zhing bdag med pa ni chos kyi dbyings
NK054(yi)001:2542: / de nyid gsal la mi 'gags pa ni rang byung gi ye shes /
NK054(yi)001:2543: de gnyis nam mkha' dag pa dang nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du dbyer mi phyed pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:2544: mi phyed pa'i phyir na rdo rje ste chos thams
NK054(yi)001:2545: cad rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum gyi ngag du
NK054(yi)001:2546: rang gsal ba bzhi'am rgyu'am rtsa ba lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:2547: yang na chos thams cad snang ba sku /
NK054(yi)001:2549: dran rig thugs su sangs rgyas te de gsum yang
NK054(yi)001:2550: dbyer med pa 'dus ma byas pa la yang rdo
NK054(yi)001:2551: rje zhes bya ste rdo rje'i bshad pa gnyis so
NK054(yi)001:2552: // bshad pa de gnyis las gong ma 'byar ba
NK054(yi)001:2553: yin yang 'og ma rdzogs pa chen po la nye
NK054(yi)001:2554: // / gong ma'i gsum po de nyid ma 'gag
NK054(yi)001:2555: par snang ba mthong ba mig gi rnam par shes
NK054(yi)001:2557: snang tsam nyid na yid kyi rang bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:2558: rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum dbyer med pa'i sku
NK054(yi)001:2559: gsung thugs dbyer med pa 'dus ma byas kyi ngag
NK054(yi)001:2561: gnyis su med par rtogs pa de kho na gnas su dag pa yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2562: de ltar gnas su dag pa'am gnyis su med par
NK054(yi)001:2563: rtogs pa'i rang byung gi ye shes de kho na
NK054(yi)001:2564: sa'i snying po'i rang bzhin yin la /
NK054(yi)001:2565: skur snang ba'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sa'i
NK054(yi)001:2566: snying po'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras par snang
NK054(yi)001:2567: ste / mtshan gyi rnam grangs su byang chub chen po ni 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i ngo bo /
NK054(yi)001:2568: rdo rje ni 'khor 'das dbyer med pa /
NK054(yi)001:2569: chos thams cad kyi gazhi'am rtsa bar mthun no //
NK054(yi)001:2570: mthong ba ni mig gi rnam shes 'khor ba'i chos te /
NK054(yi)001:2571: 'bras bu'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi skabs su 'khor
NK054(yi)001:2572: ba ma dag pa gcig mya ngan las 'das pa
NK054(yi)001:2573: dag pa gcig do bsdos nas kha gnyis su yod
NK054(yi)001:2575: ma rtogs na 'khor ba kho nar ma gtogs pa mya ngan las 'das pa mi snang la /
NK054(yi)001:2576: rtogs na sangs rgyas kho na las 'khor ba phra ba'ang mi dmigs pas /
NK054(yi)001:2577: des na 'khor ba'i chos la gzhal ba nyid kyis
NK054(yi)001:2578: 'bras bu sangs rgyas snang bas de'i ngos rtog pa
NK054(yi)001:2580: de dag pa'i 'bras bu sku gsum dang /
NK054(yi)001:2581: ye shes lhun gyis grub pas 'khor ba ma dmigs pa lta bur bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:2582: bshad pa dang 'chad pa'i rtogs pa thams cad la khyab bo //
NK054(yi)001:2583: byang chub chen po rdo rje thob pa dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2584: byang chub chen po gong du bshad par mthun /
NK054(yi)001:2585: yid rdo rje rnams gsum dbyer med pa nyid chos kyi dbyings sam /
NK054(yi)001:2586: gsal la mi 'gags pa'i ngos nas ye shes sam
NK054(yi)001:2587: dbyer med pa de nyid mi 'gags par gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:2588: thos pa rna ba'i rnam shes ltar yang snang /
NK054(yi)001:2589: snang tsam nyid na rdo rje lta bu'i ngang las
NK054(yi)001:2590: ma g.yos te chos kyi dbyings su lhun gyis grub
NK054(yi)001:2591: ste / dbyer med pa gnyis su med pa'i bdag
NK054(yi)001:2592: nyid gsal la mi 'gag pa rna ba'i rnam par
NK054(yi)001:2593: shes pa gnas su dag ces kyang bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2594: thos bya thos byed snyan mi snyan gyi myong byed thams cad 'du shes yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2595: rna ba'i rnam shes 'du shes dag pa rang byung ye shes mngon du gsal te /
NK054(yi)001:2596: de nyid skur snang ba'i dus la dkyus kyi byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bsnol te /
NK054(yi)001:2597: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mtshan gyi me tog gis spras pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2598: byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'bru bshad gong du bshad zin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2599: 'dir thos pa dag bya'i ngos nas rdo rje yan chad mthun pa las /
NK054(yi)001:2600: snom pa sna'i rnam shes gnas su dag pa nam mkha'i snying po dang sbyar /
NK054(yi)001:2601: myong ba lce'i rnam shes phyag na rdo rje dang sbyar ro //
NK054(yi)001:2602: de bzhi'i yum bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:2603: btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang zhes pa la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:2604: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs na gzugs sgra dri ro'i lha mo bzhi dang /
NK054(yi)001:2605: sems can gyi gnas skabs na gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam shes kyi yul bzhi dbyer med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:2607: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i rnam shes kyi yul
NK054(yi)001:2608: bzhi la dmigs par bya ba'am spyad par bya ba'i
NK054(yi)001:2610: de yang dmigs pa ni mig gi rnam shes kyis gzugs la dmigs te /
NK054(yi)001:2611: sgra dri gang la'ang mi dmigs pas /
NK054(yi)001:2612: gzugs kyis mig gi rnam shes 'dren par byed pas yab yum dang 'dra bas btsun mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:2614: mig gi rnam shes kyis gzugs yul gzugs kho na
NK054(yi)001:2615: la yang bzang ngan bar pa gsum bye brag nyams
NK054(yi)001:2616: su myong ste / sgra la sogs te gzhan ma yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2617: mi phyed pa'i don gyi btsun mo ste yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:2618: sgra dri ro gsum po la'ang des 'gre bas btsun mo bzhi'o //
NK054(yi)001:2619: rigs lnga la dam pa smos /
NK054(yi)001:2620: 'dir dam pa ma smos pa ni rigs lnga gtso
NK054(yi)001:2621: bo yin pas yum yang gtso bo ste dam pa
NK054(yi)001:2622: / 'dir ni mthar phyin 'bras bu'i skabs su yang 'khor lta bu yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:2623: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam pa ma smos /
NK054(yi)001:2624: rtog pa'i skabs su yang khams dang skye mched nyid lag yin pas so //
NK054(yi)001:2625: mthong bar bya ba dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2626: gong gi yab kyi skabs su bstan pa'i rdo rje rnam gsum nyid mi 'gags pa las /
NK054(yi)001:2627: mig gi rnam shes kyis mthong bar bya ba'i yul gzugs ltar yang snang /
NK054(yi)001:2628: snang tsam nyid na rdo rje ltar 'dus ma byas pa'i ngang las ma g.yos te /
NK054(yi)001:2629: snang stong dbyer med pa mnyam pa nyid lhun gyis grub par rtogs pa de kho na /
NK054(yi)001:2630: mig gis yul gzugs gnas su dag ces bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2631: de ltar dag pa gnyis su med par rtogs pa
NK054(yi)001:2632: de nyid lha mo l+aa s+ye ma'i rang bzhin yang
NK054(yi)001:2633: yin la / skur snang ba'i dus na yang l+aa
NK054(yi)001:2634: s+ye ma'i sku mtshan dpe dang ldan par snang ngo
NK054(yi)001:2635: yin la / // mnyan par bya ba dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2636: btsun mo bzhi ka la 'gro bar mthun /
NK054(yi)001:2637: yid rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum mi 'gags pa nyid mnyan pa sgra ltar yang snang /
NK054(yi)001:2638: snang tsam nyid na rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum gyi ngang las ma g.yos /
NK054(yi)001:2639: snang stong gnyis su med par rtogs pa de kho na sgra gnas su dag pa yin /
NK054(yi)001:2640: de ltar gnas su dag pa'am gnyis su med par
NK054(yi)001:2641: rtogs pa de nyid dbyangs mkhan ma'i rang bzhin yin
NK054(yi)001:2642: la / skur snang ba'i dus na dbyangs ma'i sku
NK054(yi)001:2643: mtshan dpe byad kyis spras pa ste spyan ras gzigs
NK054(yi)001:2644: la / kyi yum mo // bsnam par bya ba dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2645: rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum mi 'gags pa'i ngang
NK054(yi)001:2646: las sna'i rnam shes kyis bsnam par bya ba'i yul
NK054(yi)001:2647: snom pa lta bur yang snang /
NK054(yi)001:2648: snang tsam nyid na rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum gyi ngang las ma g.yos /
NK054(yi)001:2649: snang stong dbyer med pa ma mnyam nyid gnas su dag pa zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:2650: de nyid skur snang ba'i dus na rtogs pa mthar
NK054(yi)001:2651: phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las dri'i lha mo mtshan
NK054(yi)001:2652: dpe dang ldan par snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:2653: yul dang dbang por sbyor na nam mkha'i snying po'i yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:2654: myong bar bya ba'i tshogs dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:2655: gong gi rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum mi 'gags
NK054(yi)001:2656: pa'i rtsal las lce'i rnam shes kyis myong bar bya
NK054(yi)001:2657: ba'i yul ro'i tshogs su snang la /
NK054(yi)001:2658: snang tsam nyid na yid rdo rje lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos te /
NK054(yi)001:2659: ro gnas su dag pa snang stong gnyis su med par rtogs pa de kho na /
NK054(yi)001:2660: lha mo g+airti ma'i rang bzhin yin la /
NK054(yi)001:2661: lha mo g+ai rti ma'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras par snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:2663: gong gi yab bshad pa'i rjes su bsnyeg go //
NK054(yi)001:2665: mtshams kyi sems dpa' bzhi bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:2666: byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang zhes pa la sogs ste /
NK054(yi)001:2667: byang chub chen po gong du bshad par mthun te 'agre'o //
NK054(yi)001:2668: tha mal pa'i dbang po bzhi dang /
NK054(yi)001:2669: mthar phyin pa'i byams pa la sogs pa'i sems dpa' bzhi dbye med par bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:2670: des na rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum mi 'gags
NK054(yi)001:2671: pa'i rtsal las mthong byed yul mthong bar byed pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2672: yid kyi dbang po ltar yang snang la /
NK054(yi)001:2673: snang tsam nyid na yid kyi rang bzhiin rdo rje ltar 'dus ma byas pa las ma g.yos te /
NK054(yi)001:2674: de ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyis su
NK054(yi)001:2675: med pa de kho na mig gi dbang po gnas
NK054(yi)001:2677: rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid byams pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
NK054(yi)001:2678: skur snang ba'i dus na byams pa'i sku mtshan dpe can du snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:2679: mtshan gyi rnam grangs su byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed ces kyang bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:2682: yid rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum dbyer med pa
NK054(yi)001:2683: nyid mi 'gags pa'i rtsal rang snang ba thos par
NK054(yi)001:2684: byed pa rna ba'i dbang po ltar snang /
NK054(yi)001:2685: snang tsam nyid na rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum las ma g.yos te /
NK054(yi)001:2686: gnyis su med par rtogs pa rang byung gi ye shes de kho na /
NK054(yi)001:2687: rna ba'i dbang po gnas su dag pa'ang de yin /
NK054(yi)001:2688: de nyid sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rang bzhin yang de yin la /
NK054(yi)001:2689: skur snang ba'i dus na sgrib pa rnams sel gyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad can du snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:2690: mtshan gyi rnam grangs su byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed ces bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:2692: rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum dbyer med pa'i rang
NK054(yi)001:2693: byung gi ye shes gsal la mi 'gags pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:2694: yul la snom par byed pa'i sna'i dbang po ltar
NK054(yi)001:2695: yang snang / snang tsam nyid na yid kyi rang
NK054(yi)001:2696: bzhin rdo rje lta bu rnam gsum dbyer med pa'i
NK054(yi)001:2698: rtogs pa de kho na snang ba dbang po gnas su dag pa'ang yin /
NK054(yi)001:2699: de nyid byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:2700: skur snang ba'i dus na kun tu bzang po'i sku mtshan dpes spras par snang ngo //
