NK054(yi)001:9517: sku'i dkyil 'khor zhe gnyis su snang ba de nyid na /
NK054(yi)001:9520: don gnyis mdzad pa'i phriin las kun sgyu ma ltar
NK054(yi)001:9521: snang stong dmigs pa med pa so so la dmigs
NK054(yi)001:9522: su med kyang gdul bya'i ngor mdzad pa tha dad
NK054(yi)001:9523: pa lta bu snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:9524: dmigs su med pas bsam yas zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:9525: yang na thabs ni ngo bo gang du yang ma
NK054(yi)001:9526: grub par rig pa rang snang ba la ni thabs
NK054(yi)001:9528: bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na rang rig pa nyid a
NK054(yi)001:9529: thung snang ba ni thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin
NK054(yi)001:9530: pas rtsa ba'i thabs zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:9531: yi ge de las 'byung ba ri rab dang bcas pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9532: bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par snang
NK054(yi)001:9533: ba ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'i gzhi yin
NK054(yi)001:9534: pas / der so so'i yi ge las gnas su cho ga rdzogs pas dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:9535: lha rnams rig pa rang snang bas snang stong gi
NK054(yi)001:9536: phyogs 'dzin dang bral ba ni thabs bsam yas pas
NK054(yi)001:9537: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:9538: tha dad min la tha dad pa'i //
NK054(yi)001:9540: lha dang gzhal yas khang gdan khri dang bcas pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9542: rang rig pa nyid snang bas don dam par de
NK054(yi)001:9543: bzhin nyid rang rig par gcig pa ni tha dad
NK054(yi)001:9544: min zhes bya'o // tha dad pa'i //
NK054(yi)001:9546: lha dang gzhal yas khang gdan khri dang bcas pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9548: rang rig pa nyid snang bas don dam par de
NK054(yi)001:9549: bzhin nyid rang rig par gcig pa ni tha dad
NK054(yi)001:9550: min zhes bya'o // tha dad pa'i zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:9551: dman don du kun rdzob tu ye shes rang snang
NK054(yi)001:9552: ba las so sor 'dzin pa ni dman pa'i ngor
NK054(yi)001:9553: te / nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi //
NK054(yi)001:9554: zhes pa nang gi bzhugs pa'i lha rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:9555: bzhugs gnas ni 'byung ba phung po rnam shes /
NK054(yi)001:9556: gzhal yas khang ste dngos po'i phyi nang gnyis kyang bsdu'o /
NK054(yi)001:9557: des na gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad ni /
NK054(yi)001:9558: dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol //
NK054(yi)001:9559: zhes pa dkyil 'khor ni lha zhe gnyis kyi tshogs so //
NK054(yi)001:9560: des na chos thams cad kyang gzung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:9561: bsam yas pa ni snod bcud thams cad rig pa rang snang ba'i dbang gis /
NK054(yi)001:9562: phyi nang nang med gtso bo dang 'khor so sor
NK054(yi)001:9563: dbye ba ma dmigs pas ye shes kyi ngang du
NK054(yi)001:9564: phyogs 'dzin mi mnga' ba la ni bsam yas zhes
NK054(yi)001:9565: bya'o // snod bcud dbyer med pa nyid ni rig pa'i ye shes te /
NK054(yi)001:9566: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsal ba la rig pa rang dbang bsgyur ba la ni rol zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:9567: 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog /
NK054(yi)001:9568: ces pa 'jigs pa med pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa'i ngo la /
NK054(yi)001:9569: khams gsum rang sar dag pa 'khor ba'i 'jig pa ngang gis ma grub /
NK054(yi)001:9570: rang rig pa'i rang byung chen po rang snang bas
NK054(yi)001:9571: ye shes rol pas lam 'og ma brtags pa la
NK054(yi)001:9573: rgyu rkyen gzhan dbang la re ba rnams 'dir rig
NK054(yi)001:9574: pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub pas de dag las
NK054(yi)001:9577: rang byung ye shes kyi ngang la spyod yul yongs
NK054(yi)001:9578: su dag pas ngan pa ma dmigs pas bzang zhes
NK054(yi)001:9579: bya ba ma dmigs kyang mtshon pa'i tha snyad tsam
NK054(yi)001:9580: mo // de la ni 'khor ba dang lam pa'i g.yang sa gnyis dang bral bas don grub /
NK054(yi)001:9582: ci bder mnos shig ces pa lta bu ste /
NK054(yi)001:9583: thams cad rig pas rgyas thebs /
NK054(yi)001:9584: rig pa'i ngang las mi 'ang'a bas phyag rgya de tsam du 'dzin pa'ang med pas mchog go //
NK054(yi)001:9585: ye shes rang snang gi dkyil 'khor du thams cad
NK054(yi)001:9586: ka dag pas blang ngor med par bstan pa ni
NK054(yi)001:9587: / gong de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9588: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:9590: gong du bstan pa'i rig pa rang snang ba'i snying rje chen po dang /
NK054(yi)001:9592: gzhal yas khang 'og gzhi dang bcas pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9593: nang gi lha gtso bo 'khor du bcas pa thams cad de /
NK054(yi)001:9595: ye shes rang snang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:9596: gdod ma nas sems kyi ye shes rang snang ba'i yi ge'i 'khor lo dang /
NK054(yi)001:9597: ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo phung khams skye mched khams gsum thams cad sems nyid rang snang ba'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:9598: cir yang snang ba'i ngo bo ni ming tshogs bzang
NK054(yi)001:9599: ngan mtho dman khams gsum gyi gzugs sna tshogs te
NK054(yi)001:9600: / de dag thams cad bsgyur bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:9601: sgyur byed kyi thabs ni gong du bstan pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin /
NK054(yi)001:9602: dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la rig pa dbang bsgyur te rtsal rdzogs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:9603: rig pa nyid dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu
NK054(yi)001:9604: rin po che dang 'dra bar rang dbang bsgyur te
NK054(yi)001:9605: / rtog pa'i chos rnams ye shes su gsal bas
NK054(yi)001:9606: ming gi tshogs lha dang ye shes su gsal ba'i
NK054(yi)001:9607: / rnam grangs dang / lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK054(yi)001:9608: ma 'gag pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gzugs su snang
NK054(yi)001:9610: de nyid yid bzhin du dbang bsgyur ba thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub snang ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:9611: chos thams cad spangs pa med par rang sa nyid
NK054(yi)001:9612: du su dang ye shes dngos grub kyi tshogs su
NK054(yi)001:9614: mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du //
NK054(yi)001:9616: dper na 'dzam bu'i gling mun pas 'thibs pa'i dus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la shar na /
NK054(yi)001:9617: mun pa thams cad bros pa yang med /
NK054(yi)001:9618: gcig tu 'dus nas gab pa lta bu yang med
NK054(yi)001:9619: par mun pa nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ji bzhin
NK054(yi)001:9620: du / khams gsum gyi chos mun pa dang 'dra
NK054(yi)001:9621: ba las yi ge'i rkyen gyis phyi nang gi chos
NK054(yi)001:9622: thams cad mun pa dang 'dra ba de /
NK054(yi)001:9623: sems nyid snang stong la dbang bsgyur ba'i rtsal rang
NK054(yi)001:9624: snang ba'i stobs kyis dbang bsgyur bas sku dang ye
NK054(yi)001:9626: des na mun pa dngos por ma grub pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:9627: snang ba dngos por ma grub par 'gyur ba yin
NK054(yi)001:9628: la / 'dir phung po khams dang skye mched dngos
NK054(yi)001:9629: po can zhig bsgyur ba yin pas dpe des mi
NK054(yi)001:9630: la / mtshon zhe na / gser 'gyur zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:9631: dper na lcags srang stong la gser 'gyur gyi rtsi
NK054(yi)001:9632: srang gang gtong na lcags srang stong de gser srang
NK054(yi)001:9634: phung po khams dang skye mched rigs pa rnams rig
NK054(yi)001:9635: pa la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
NK054(yi)001:9636: kyis sku dang ye shes su gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9637: dpe de'ang dngos por 'gyur ba'i dpe yin te /
NK054(yi)001:9638: 'dir sems nyid snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba
NK054(yi)001:9639: la dbang bsgyur ba'i stobs kyis rig pa la dbang
NK054(yi)001:9640: bsgyur ba yin pas spang blang med pa las /
NK054(yi)001:9641: dpe de la yang spang blang yod pas /
NK054(yi)001:9642: lcags dngos po can gser dngos po can nam zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:9644: dper na sman ga bur tsha nad can la sman /
NK054(yi)001:9645: grang nad can la gnod pa /
NK054(yi)001:9646: phan gnod gnyis dngos po gcig la tshang /
NK054(yi)001:9647: ga bur la so sor btsal gyis mi snyed /
NK054(yi)001:9648: dper de bzhin du sems nyid du snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba cir yang 'char ba las /
NK054(yi)001:9649: rkyen gyis bsgyur bas ma rtogs pa'i ngo la khams gsum 'khor bar snang /
NK054(yi)001:9650: rtogs na mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku dang ye
NK054(yi)001:9651: shes su gsal bas blang dor med pa sman gyi
NK054(yi)001:9652: dpe de la / gsung sgros gcig la /
NK054(yi)001:9653: dper na btsan dug srog gcod kyi ngo bo yin
NK054(yi)001:9654: pa la sman dang sngags kyis btabs na dug dag
NK054(yi)001:9655: nas 'chi med kyi sman du 'gyur ba ltar /
NK054(yi)001:9656: 'khor ba'i chos ngo bo nyid las /
NK054(yi)001:9657: sman sngags dang 'dra ba'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis rig pa dbang bsgyur nas /
NK054(yi)001:9658: 'chi med kyi sman du 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar /
NK054(yi)001:9659: khams gsum nyid sku dang ye shes su gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9660: goms nas dngos grub 'byung ba'i mdor bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:9661: 'og sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan nas //
NK054(yi)001:9662: zhes pa 'di man chad dkyus su ting nge 'dzin goms nas yi ge la lhar bsgyur bas goms /
NK054(yi)001:9663: de nas dngos grub rnams bsgrub par 'byung na /
NK054(yi)001:9665: sems las su rung nas lha bkod pa yang rung ste /
NK054(yi)001:9666: gang ltar na yang 'dra zhes gsungs so //
NK054(yi)001:9667: de la sems las su rung ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:9668: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin sems gnas pa tsam la yang mi bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:9669: sems gang du yang ma grub cir yang rang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i dbang gis /
NK054(yi)001:9670: sems rang thog tu phebs pa yang shin tu dka' ste /
NK054(yi)001:9671: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo la sgro 'dogs tha snyad phyogs 'dzin thams cad dang bral ba zhig dgos /
NK054(yi)001:9672: des na sems las su rung ba yin /
NK054(yi)001:9673: sems las su rung ba mthar phyin pa ni bud+d+ha yin /
NK054(yi)001:9674: de'i 'og ma rnams ni gcig las mang por byed pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9675: mang po gcig tu bsdu ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9676: stong gsum yungs 'brus chud pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9677: yungs 'brus stong gsum gang ba la sogs pa rnams te /
NK054(yi)001:9678: mnyam bzhag la gom pa mthar phyin tsa de rnams
NK054(yi)001:9679: las su rung ba ni sems las su rung ba'o
NK054(yi)001:9680: // slob dpon pad+ma'i ni de la dgongs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:9681: rnal 'byor pas thun re la ting nge 'dzin nyams
NK054(yi)001:9682: 'og tu chud pa tsam la ni las su rung
NK054(yi)001:9684: 'on kyang las su rung ba'i snang ba yin /
NK054(yi)001:9686: gong ma'i ting nge 'dzin phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:9687: lha gcig yan lag gi lha dang bcas pa dang
NK054(yi)001:9689: snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du'o //
NK054(yi)001:9691: rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
NK054(yi)001:9692: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags dang /
NK054(yi)001:9693: bskul ba las kyi sngags gsum dgos pa'i skabs de nyid du ma nor zhing ma 'chugs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9694: de las kyang phal cher bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags gtsor che ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9695: phyag rgya bzhi las sku phyag rgya chen po sku
NK054(yi)001:9696: mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:9697: yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa ni gsal ba ste brtan
NK054(yi)001:9698: pa zhes bya'o // dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur //
NK054(yi)001:9699: zhes pa mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub gnyis 'og tu smos pa rnams /
NK054(yi)001:9700: ya mtshan chen po zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:9701: rig pa chos nyid sgyu ma las dngos grub gnyis rang snang bas ya mtshan che la /
NK054(yi)001:9702: snang tsam nyid na rig pa sgyu mar lhun gyis grub pas kyang ya mtshan che /
NK054(yi)001:9703: de'i dus su 'khrul ba sgyu ma dngos grub sgyu mar lhun gyis grub /
NK054(yi)001:9704: dngos grub sgyu ma ye shes sgyu mar lhun gyis grub pa la ni ya mtshan zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:9705: dngos grub rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:9706: gong bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang //
NK054(yi)001:9707: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:9708: drug gi bye brag gang dang gang yin pa la /
NK054(yi)001:9709: nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang bkod /
NK054(yi)001:9710: gdan thog tu yi ge rnams bkod /
NK054(yi)001:9711: de las lhar gsal snang ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa dang 'od du zhu ste /
NK054(yi)001:9712: dug nyid bdud rtsi 'gyur ba bsgom na 'chi med kyi sman du 'gyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9713: thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa 'di rnams la
NK054(yi)001:9714: yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bkod pa gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:9715: mthar phyin pa las dngos grub bsgyur na yang 'gyur
NK054(yi)001:9717: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas //
NK054(yi)001:9719: ming tshig gzugs tshogs yid bzhin gyi //
NK054(yi)001:9720: zhes pas sku phyag rgya chen po las bsgyur bar gsal lo //
NK054(yi)001:9721: dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rim pa rnams ni gong du
NK054(yi)001:9722: bshad pa de bzhin du kun gyi thog mar shes
NK054(yi)001:9725: dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa'i lus la bsgoms nas de nyid du 'od du zhu ste /
NK054(yi)001:9726: tsha nad la bsil du bsgyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9727: grang nad la drod du bsgyur ba sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:9728: nad gang dang gang la phan pa'i sman du bsgyur
NK054(yi)001:9729: nas nad pa la bstim pa la nad so so'i
NK054(yi)001:9730: gnyen po'i sman du 'gyur bas 'byung ba dang zhes
NK054(yi)001:9732: 'chi ba'i ro lta bu'i steng gi nam mkha' la
NK054(yi)001:9733: dkyil 'khor sngar bzhin bsgoms nas shi ba'i rnam shes
NK054(yi)001:9734: kyang yang yang bkug ste dkyil 'khor la bstim /
NK054(yi)001:9735: dkyil 'khor 'od du zhu ste ro la bstims na sos par 'gyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9736: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing //
NK054(yi)001:9738: nad bzhi'i bye brag gang dang gang yin pa la /
NK054(yi)001:9739: rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor
NK054(yi)001:9740: bsgoms nas 'od du zhu ste nad gang yin pa
NK054(yi)001:9741: de'i gnyen por gyur ba bsgom na sos pa dang
NK054(yi)001:9742: / yang nad pa'i khong du dkyil 'khor bsgoms te gsal brtan gyi dus su 'od du zhu ste /
NK054(yi)001:9743: nad gang yin pa'i gnyen po'i sman du gyur te
NK054(yi)001:9744: thim par bsgoms na nad gang yin pa sel ba'o
NK054(yi)001:9746: nam mkha' la dkyil 'khor bsgom brtan pa dang 'od du zhu ste /
NK054(yi)001:9747: gzugs sgra la sogs pa lngar bsgoms na de bzhin du 'byung ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9748: gzhan yang bza' ba dang btung ba dang bgo ba
NK054(yi)001:9749: la sogs te 'dod pa thams cad du bsgom na
NK054(yi)001:9752: dmyal ba'i gnas su sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
NK054(yi)001:9753: drod tshad dang ldan nas 'od du zhu ste tsha
NK054(yi)001:9754: ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bsgom na tsha dmyal zhi
NK054(yi)001:9755: ba dang / grang ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bsgom na grang dmyal zhi bar 'gyur te /
NK054(yi)001:9756: lam pa yin pas bud+d+ha'i lhun grub kyi ye shes mngon du ma gyur ba'i dbang gis /
NK054(yi)001:9757: gnyis ka dus gcig mi 'grub ste re re bzhin du bsgom dgos so //
NK054(yi)001:9758: dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas 'od du zhu ste /
NK054(yi)001:9759: yi dwags kyi bkres skom zhi bar bsgoms nas bstims na de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
NK054(yi)001:9760: byol song gi gnas su dkyil 'khor bsgoms te 'od du bzhus nas bstim te /
NK054(yi)001:9761: blun rmugs la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bsgoms
NK054(yi)001:9762: na de dag 'dir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
NK054(yi)001:9763: byin brlabs yin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhi nas
NK054(yi)001:9764: mtho ris su skye ba mtshungs so //
NK054(yi)001:9766: ces pa ci yang ni dngos po thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:9767: gzhan du 'gyur ba ni chu las mer gyur /
NK054(yi)001:9768: me las chur gyur pa lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:9769: dngos po de nyid las de ma yin pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:9770: sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas 'od du zhu
NK054(yi)001:9771: chu la bstims nas mer gyur par bsgoms na mer
NK054(yi)001:9772: gyur pa gzhan gyis mthong ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9773: gong 'og gi dngos grub thams cad kyang gzhan snang kho na yin no //
NK054(yi)001:9774: de la sogs te sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas bstim pa ni mthun pa las /
NK054(yi)001:9776: mer 'gyur ba la sogs pa rnams te /
NK054(yi)001:9777: dper na thang shing gi nags tshal rin po che'i nags tshal du 'gyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9778: gzhan yang sol ba las ljon shing /
NK054(yi)001:9779: bye ma las gser la sogs pa thams cad bzung ste de dag 'grub bo //
NK054(yi)001:9780: nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing //
NK054(yi)001:9781: zhes pa nam mkha' la sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:9782: drod tshad du phyin nas 'od du zhu /
NK054(yi)001:9783: rdo rje'i brag gis nam mkha' gtams par bsgoms na /
NK054(yi)001:9784: bya yang mi thar rlung yang mi rgyu bar 'gyur ro //
NK054(yi)001:9785: yang dkyil 'khor 'od du zhu ste rdo rje'i bral tu bsgom na /
NK054(yi)001:9786: gang la bya ba thams cad rdul du brlag par 'gyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9788: zhes pa nam mkha' la sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:9789: 'od du zhu ste nam mkha' mes gang bar bsgom na /
NK054(yi)001:9790: nam mkha'i khams na ci gnas pa thams cad me 'bar nas 'tshig pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9791: ye shes kyi mes tha mal pa'i me yang 'tshig ste mi gnas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:9793: zhes pa nam mkha' la sgyu 'phrul bsgoms te 'od du zhu ste chur gyur bar bsgoms na /
NK054(yi)001:9794: nam mkha' chus gang ste 'bab pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9795: ser ba dang char pa la sogs pa 'ong ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9797: mes me 'tshig pa bzhin du ye shes kyi chus tha mal pa'i chu yang khyer ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9799: zhes pa sgyu 'phrul 'do du zhu ste rlung gi
NK054(yi)001:9800: dkyil 'khor du bsgoms nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams
NK054(yi)001:9801: cad khyer te 'thor bar bsgoms na /
NK054(yi)001:9802: 'ur mer thor zhig tu ras bal rlung gis gtor ba bzhin du gtor ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9803: thams cad stong zhing zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:9804: sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te 'od du zhu nas stong pa kho nar bsgoms te /
NK054(yi)001:9805: stong pa phyang chad pa byas na thams cad stong pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9807: stong pa'i ngang las bya la yang 'phur rtsal med nas ltung bar 'gyur te /
NK054(yi)001:9808: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bor 'gyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9810: sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te 'od du zhu
NK054(yi)001:9811: nas bud+d+ha'i ye shes 'gugs par bsgoms na der 'gyur
NK054(yi)001:9812: ba dang / la bzla ba'i tshig gis /
NK054(yi)001:9814: gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:9815: 'jig rten pa'i bsgrub bya gang dang gang dgug par 'dod na yang /
NK054(yi)001:9816: 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs can gyis 'gugs par bsgoms na de bzhin du 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
NK054(yi)001:9818: sgyu 'phrul gyi 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phang bar bsgoms nas /
NK054(yi)001:9819: bskrad pa'i las skad cig gis gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9821: sgyu 'phrul gyi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba gang bcings
NK054(yi)001:9822: te g.yo 'gul med par bsgoms na 'gul mi shes
NK054(yi)001:9824: 'gro ba gzhan mi ma yin dang 'byung ba'i rkyen gyis g.yo 'gul mi shes pa la /
NK054(yi)001:9825: sgyu 'phrul gyi 'od kyis reg na snga ma kho na bzhin du 'gyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:9827: thams cad sems kyi snang ba yin pas rig pa
NK054(yi)001:9828: rtsa 'byongs na thag nye ring ni med de shi
NK054(yi)001:9829: ba gso ba gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:9830: bsad pa ni drag po'i las te /
NK054(yi)001:9831: sgyu 'phrul gyi 'od kyis dngos po gang la reg
NK054(yi)001:9832: na lus sems tshar gcod par bsgoms na de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:9834: bdag las gzhan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams pham par 'dod na /
NK054(yi)001:9835: sgyu 'phrul gyi 'od zer gyis dmag dpung la sogs
NK054(yi)001:9836: par reg nas 'od kyi nus pas pha rol gyi
NK054(yi)001:9837: nus pa nyams par bsgoms na dmag pham par 'gyur
NK054(yi)001:9839: rang phyogs kyi dmag la sogs pa rgyal bar 'dod na /
NK054(yi)001:9840: sgyu 'phrul 'od du bzhus pa'i 'od kyis dmag la
NK054(yi)001:9841: sogs pa'i nus mthu 'phel bar bsgom na de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:9842: du'agyura te / 'di dag dngos su nus pa'i skyes bu des /
NK054(yi)001:9843: slob dpon pad+ma'i dgongs pa bzhin rig pa la dbang
NK054(yi)001:9844: bsgyur cir yang 'char ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor la
NK054(yi)001:9845: ma brten par rig pa'i ngang la de rnams 'grub
NK054(yi)001:9846: pa'ang sbyar ro // 'on kyang gong du yi ge'i 'khor lo byung /
NK054(yi)001:9847: yi ge la sems sbyang ba brtan /
NK054(yi)001:9848: sems btul ba'i thabs su mnyam bzhag bshad nas /
NK054(yi)001:9849: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo brtan par byas nas /
NK054(yi)001:9850: de'i yon tan rang snang ba skabs su thun mong gi dngos grub bo //
NK054(yi)001:9854: gong du 'grub pa'i rgyu bstan pa bzhin du tshogs
NK054(yi)001:9855: pa des ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa rnams mthar
NK054(yi)001:9856: phyin te / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs ni dngos po mtshon pa 'di zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:9857: de las dngos grub bshad pa rnams shar bas byed par 'gyur zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:9858: mchog gi dngos grub kyi mdor bstan ni /
NK054(yi)001:9859: gong sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK054(yi)001:9860: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:9861: sgyu 'phrul ni ma 'gags par snang ba thabs te /
NK054(yi)001:9863: phung po dang 'byung ba la sogs pa bzhi bcu
NK054(yi)001:9864: rtsa gnyis su khams gsum gyi chos thams cad ma
NK054(yi)001:9866: dkyil ni phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga /
NK054(yi)001:9867: 'khor ni de'i stobs kyis yan lag snang ba'i skye mched rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:9868: de nyid lam pas bshad pa bzhin lta ba rtogs /
NK054(yi)001:9869: ting nge 'dzin mnyam bzhag stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor goms /
NK054(yi)001:9870: gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor goms /
NK054(yi)001:9871: rgyu'i yi ge a la sems sbyang ba dang yig
NK054(yi)001:9872: 'bru gzhan la sems sbyang ba rnams kyang bshad pa
NK054(yi)001:9873: bzhin rdzogs / rgyu'i rtsa las snang ba'i 'og gzhi dang bzhugs gnas gdan dang bcas pa rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:9874: der yi ge'i phreng ba bkod nas lha'i dkyil 'khor
NK054(yi)001:9875: rig pa'i ngang la snang stong dbyer med pa la
NK054(yi)001:9876: ni / rten dang brten par bcas pa rnams ma
NK054(yi)001:9877: grub bzhin rang snang ba la ni sgyu 'phrul zhes
NK054(yi)001:9878: ni / bya la / 'khrul pa'i dus kyi snang ba dkyil 'khor du rdzogs pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:9879: spangs pa med par rigs lnga yab yum du snang ba ni dkyil /
NK054(yi)001:9880: phung po dang 'byung ba spangs pa med par sems dpa' dang sems mar gsal ba ni 'khor te /
NK054(yi)001:9881: rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lha bzhi cu rtsa gnyis su dag pa de /
NK054(yi)001:9882: rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya bsgom byed du yod pa ni lam pa'i spyod yul lo //
NK054(yi)001:9883: lam dma' ba'i dus su lha'i dkyil 'khor rig par
NK054(yi)001:9884: gsal ba yang rig pa gsal 'dzin pa dang bcas
NK054(yi)001:9885: pas / snang bya snang byed dam gsal bya gsal byed kyi 'du shes yod /
NK054(yi)001:9886: lha'i sku me mar gyi me lta bu la /
NK054(yi)001:9887: rig pa me mar gyi 'od lta bu 'dzin /
NK054(yi)001:9888: lam pa'i dgongs pa de bas kyang skyed du gyur
NK054(yi)001:9889: nas mtho ba'i dus su lha'i sku la gsal 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:9890: shas chung bas mnyam nyid rig pa'ang de ltar gyur
NK054(yi)001:9891: pa'i dbang gis gnyis ka gsal 'dzin chung bas de
NK054(yi)001:9892: nyid rnal 'byor pa'i rig par lhun gyis grub pas
NK054(yi)001:9893: mnyam pa nyid du gsal lo //
NK054(yi)001:9894: de'i dus su rnal 'byor pa la yul gyi snang ba 'gag ste lha'i snang bar lhun gyis grub /
NK054(yi)001:9895: yul ched du bltas kyang lhar snang ba kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:9896: d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas //
NK054(yi)001:9897: zhes pa lam mthar phyin pa'i skad cig ma gcig
NK054(yi)001:9898: la rang rig pa dngos po thams cad dang bral
NK054(yi)001:9899: ba bsam pa'i yul las 'das brjod pa'i yul las
NK054(yi)001:9900: 'das pa nyid gzhi ma rtogs pa'i dus su 'khor
NK054(yi)001:9901: ba'i chos mthar thug pa med pa la /
NK054(yi)001:9902: khyab bya khyab byed med pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa la /
NK054(yi)001:9903: gong du gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes smos pa de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:9904: lam gyi dus su de rtogs pa lta ba'i ngo bo yin pa la /
NK054(yi)001:9905: lam pa gzung 'dzin gyis sgrib pa chu'i rnyog ma
NK054(yi)001:9906: dang 'dra bar dngos po med pa chos thams cad
NK054(yi)001:9907: la khyab pa nyid shes bya'i ngo bo tsam du
NK054(yi)001:9908: dmigs la rang rig gsal 'dzin dang bcas pas lta
NK054(yi)001:9909: bar bzung ste dngos med rang gsal du 'dzin pa
NK054(yi)001:9910: dang / rtogs snyam gyi 'du shes rnams ni sgrib pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:9911: lta ba stobs su gyur nas sgro 'dogs je chod je chod 'bras bu la nye ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:9914: shong pa'i don gyis rig pa mtha' thams cad dang
NK054(yi)001:9915: bral ba nyid rtogs pa mthar phyin tsa khams gsum
NK054(yi)001:9916: gyi de kho na nyid mngon du gyur pas /
NK054(yi)001:9917: rig pa mtha' dang bral ba'i ngo bo rnal 'byor
NK054(yi)001:9918: gyur pa ni tshig gi tha snyad du lhag pa'i
NK054(yi)001:9919: chos sku zhes kyang brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:9920: de snang ba'i khams gsum gyi rdzogs pa thams cad
NK054(yi)001:9921: spangs pa med pa rang snang ba mi 'gag pa
NK054(yi)001:9922: skur rdzogs la / ma dmigs pa ye shes su rdzogs te /
NK054(yi)001:9923: de'i dus su d+r+wa ba'i ngo bo shes rab kyi
NK054(yi)001:9924: bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje mngon du
NK054(yi)001:9925: gyur pa'i dus su gzhi'i lta ba mngon du gyur
NK054(yi)001:9926: pa la ni mthar phyin pa'i d+r+wa bas mtshon pa'i
NK054(yi)001:9927: yang dag pa'i chos sku ste /
NK054(yi)001:9928: de'i dus su khams gsum gyi chos rdul phra rab tsam yang ma dmigs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:9929: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ma dmigs pa'i don mthar phyin pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:9930: khams gsum rang sa sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bar dbyer med
NK054(yi)001:9931: pa'i bar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor du rang rig pa'i
NK054(yi)001:9932: mngon sum du sku dang ye shes su rdzogs pa'i
NK054(yi)001:9933: dus su / khams gsum snang stong dbyer med pa
NK054(yi)001:9934: lha'i dkyil 'khor du rang rig pa'i ngang du gsal
NK054(yi)001:9935: ba la yul dang yul can med /
NK054(yi)001:9936: blta bya dang lta byed med /
NK054(yi)001:9937: 'bras bu mthar phyin par lta ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:9938: 'khor ba las 'das par lta ba'i 'du shes bral
NK054(yi)001:9939: ba la sku dang ye shes su rdzogs pa ni
NK054(yi)001:9940: / ma h+aa yo ga rang gzhung gi 'bras bu'i
NK054(yi)001:9941: tha snyad yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen zhes bya
NK054(yi)001:9942: ste 'bras bu mthar phyin pa kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:9944: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK054(yi)001:9946: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i chos thams cad sku dang ye
NK054(yi)001:9947: shes su rdzogs pa'i dgongs pa las me long g.ya'
NK054(yi)001:9948: dag nas gzugs brnyan 'char ba dang 'dra bar gdul
NK054(yi)001:9949: bya'i ngo la snang ba'i gzugs sku gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:9950: phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir 'gro don la gshegs shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'o /
NK054(yi)001:9952: rgyu 'bras dang gsang sngags phyi nang gi sangs rgyas
NK054(yi)001:9953: kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes pas
NK054(yi)001:9954: / thog mtha' med pa'i rtog pa thams cad sku dang ye shes su gsal bar 'gyur ro //
NK054(yi)001:9955: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
NK054(yi)001:9960: mchog 'grub pa'i 'bras bu rang gi ngo bo ni /
NK054(yi)001:9961: 'og dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i //
NK054(yi)001:9962: zhes pa dus gsum rgyal ba ni gdul bya'i ngo la snang ba'i bud+d+ha thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:9963: de'i thugs su chud pa'i ngo bo ni /
NK054(yi)001:9964: gong du bshad pa ltar khams gsum gyi chos thams cad sku dang ye shes su gsal ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:9965: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa'am /
NK054(yi)001:9966: ngo bo nyid de kho na nyid grub pa la zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:9967: chos thams cad sku dang ye shes su gsal ba dngos su /
NK054(yi)001:9968: de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bas na mchog go //
NK054(yi)001:9969: snying po ni mthar phyin pa'i yin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:9970: thams cad khyab pa'i don gyis snying po'o //
NK054(yi)001:9971: 'o na rang don grub nas gzhan don mi snang ngam zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:9972: ni'i sgras 'gag pa med par 'char ba mtshon te /
NK054(yi)001:9973: snying po ni zhes pa'i sgras gzhan don 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:9974: sku rigs rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /
NK054(yi)001:9975: gzhan don gyi dgos pa skong ba'i yon tan thams cad rang 'char ba rgyun chad med pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:9976: zad pa med pa dpe yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra'o //
NK054(yi)001:9977: gdul bya dbang po rab 'bring gi dgos pa skong
NK054(yi)001:9978: ba thams cad ma tshang ba med pa yod pa
NK054(yi)001:9979: ni rgyal po'i mdzad lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:9980: yon tan de dag dang 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:9981: yon tan gyi tshogs ji ltar 'char yang bud+d+ha'i dgongs
NK054(yi)001:9982: pa la 'grib pa'am chung ba'am nyung bar song ba
NK054(yi)001:9983: med pa / ye mi 'char na yang 'phel ba'i che bar song ba med de /
NK054(yi)001:9986: spro bsdu mi mnga' ba'i ngang la gdul bya'i bya ba lhun gyis grub pa ni 'byung ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:9987: don la ngo bo dang yon tan gyi rtsal thams
NK054(yi)001:9988: cad gang du yang ma grub la cir yang rang
NK054(yi)001:9989: snang ba'o // dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin //
NK054(yi)001:9990: zhes pa chos nyid dang yi ger rang snang ba
NK054(yi)001:9991: sems nyid las mi gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa
NK054(yi)001:9993: byin rlabs thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
NK054(yi)001:9994: gzhan don gyi snang ba thams cad dngos po ltar snang la /
NK054(yi)001:9995: de yang sprin ni 'thibs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:10000: zhes pa dngos grub gsum gdul bya'i snang ba mtho dman gyi bye brag sna tshogs pa /
NK054(yi)001:10001: gdul bya'i blo'i rnam pa dang mthun par 'byung zhing /
NK054(yi)001:10002: gdul bya'i blo'i rtog pa tha dad dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10004: ston pa kun tu bzang pos go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du'o //
NK054(yi)001:10005: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10006: de bzhin gshegs pa ni phun sum tshogs pa'i bud+d+ha rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:10007: sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu las /
NK054(yi)001:10008: yon tan gong du bshad pa sna tshogs su snang
NK054(yi)001:10009: ba rnams sems nyid du ma bltas par gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:10010: ni gzigs mo zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:10011: der ni 'bul bya dbul byed med par gzigs mos mnyes pa ni mchod pa'i tshogs te /
NK054(yi)001:10012: 'dir bsgrub pa tsam du ma zad /
NK054(yi)001:10013: gzhan yang chos thams cad kyang rig par lhun gyis grub par mnyes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10014: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK054(yi)001:10015: bskyed rim gyi yi ge'i rnal 'byor dang lha'i ting
NK054(yi)001:10016: nge 'dzin gnyis kyi sgo nas thabs dang shes rab
NK054(yi)001:10017: dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu las dngos
NK054(yi)001:10018: grub yon tan dang bcas pa ma lus pa 'byung
NK054(yi)001:10019: ba ste / le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10021: // da ni le'u drug pa la 'jug ste /
NK054(yi)001:10022: gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum las na lam gyi rgyud /
NK054(yi)001:10024: smad rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu ngo bo /
NK054(yi)001:10025: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:10026: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang du byas kyang de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:10027: de yang le'u'i mtshams thag sbrel na /
NK054(yi)001:10028: le'u dang po gnyis pa gsum pa gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:10029: bzhi pa yi ge 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo byung ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:10030: gsum par chos gtan la dbab pa'i skabs su /
NK054(yi)001:10031: rnam grangs brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams //
NK054(yi)001:10032: theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la //
NK054(yi)001:10033: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK054(yi)001:10034: gsang sngags su gtan la phebs /
NK054(yi)001:10035: de go phye ba'i 'khor la rdzod byed tshig gis mtshon dgos pas /
NK054(yi)001:10037: yi ge'i rtsa ba sgra dbyangs gnyis a la thug /
NK054(yi)001:10038: de'i phyir yi ge'i 'khor lo bstan pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:10039: mthar thug pa theg pa 'di nyid kyi bzhed kyis
NK054(yi)001:10040: khams gsum gyi chos rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK054(yi)001:10041: / theg pa 'og ma bzhin gnyen pos ma bcos
NK054(yi)001:10042: par rang sar dag pa sku dang ye shes su
NK054(yi)001:10044: yi ge dang rtog pa dang lha ye nas dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa /
NK054(yi)001:10045: lam pas yi ge la brten te yin tshul gyi
NK054(yi)001:10046: don 'bras bur lhun gyis grub pa mngon du bya
NK054(yi)001:10048: de'i phyir yi ge la sems sbyar ba yang gces so //
NK054(yi)001:10049: yi ge'i sgo nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir le'u lnga pa snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:10050: de yang yi ge la brten te mchog thun mong
NK054(yi)001:10051: gnyis las dbang po 'bring gi don du thun mong
NK054(yi)001:10053: dbang po rab kyi don du mchog gi dngos grub bsdus te cig car du bstan to //
NK054(yi)001:10054: de ltar dngos grub bsgrub pa la gong du /
NK054(yi)001:10055: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas //
NK054(yi)001:10056: zhes pas glang chen myos 'dra'i sems mnyam par bzhag pas btul ba ni de bzhin nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:10057: chos thams cad rig pa lhun gyis grub pa'i don
NK054(yi)001:10058: mngon du byas pa ni gnyis su med pa'i thugs
NK054(yi)001:10059: rje chen po ste kun tu snang gi ting nge
NK054(yi)001:10060: 'dzin no // jo bo sangs rgyas kyis ni thul
NK054(yi)001:10061: ba de rang de kun tu snang gi ting nge
NK054(yi)001:10062: 'dzin no // 'dzin yin gsung / de nas gzhi'i
NK054(yi)001:10063: thabs a dang gzhan ma la yang sems sbyang ba
NK054(yi)001:10064: le'u bzhi pa'i stod du bstan /
NK054(yi)001:10065: de nas dngos grub gang bsgrub kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10066: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gazhi'am rtsa ba /
NK054(yi)001:10067: 'og gzhi dang gzhal yas khang dang lha'i bzhugs gnas
NK054(yi)001:10068: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa sku mdog
NK054(yi)001:10069: phyag mtshan cha lugs ston pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10070: le'u drug pa gsungs pa lo rgyus ni /
NK054(yi)001:10071: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10073: tshig gi le'u lnga pa song ba'i de ma thag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10075: lnga par de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang gnyis bstan /
NK054(yi)001:10076: bzhi pa'i stod du rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa
NK054(yi)001:10077: de nas 'dir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs bstan
NK054(yi)001:10078: to // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i phyogs thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:10079: rang bzhin gyi tshig shugs kyis snod bcud kyi chos thams cad bsdus te /
NK054(yi)001:10080: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:10081: gcig dang du ma med pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10082: de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus
NK054(yi)001:10083: pa'i chos thams cad sems rig pa'i ngang las ma
NK054(yi)001:10084: g.yos kyang / rang gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyis cir
NK054(yi)001:10085: yang snang bas gcig pa'i mtha' dang bral te gcig
NK054(yi)001:10087: snang ba ma 'gags par gsal ba nyid sems rig
NK054(yi)001:10088: pa rang snang bas snang stong gi phyogs 'dzin thams
NK054(yi)001:10089: cad dang bral te du ma'i mtha' ma dmigs pas
NK054(yi)001:10091: de lta bu'i don ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i phyogs gcig pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:10092: sems nyid mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
NK054(yi)001:10093: pa mthar thug pa med pa'i rig pa la ni
NK054(yi)001:10094: 'khor ba ma dmigs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'ang
NK054(yi)001:10095: ma dmigs te / 'khor 'das dbyer med pa zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10096: 'dir dag snang gi ngo bo phun sum tshogs pa'i
NK054(yi)001:10097: gleng gzhi 'dzom pa las snang ba'i go phye ba'i
NK054(yi)001:10098: 'khor gyi don du bstan pa snang ba'ang ma h+aa
NK054(yi)001:10100: yin tshul bshad pa la kha gtad pa tsam gyis mi chog ste /
NK054(yi)001:10101: bdag nyid chen po zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10102: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gcig dang du ma med pa'i don te /
NK054(yi)001:10103: de nyid gang gis mngon du byas te mthar phyin pa ni kun tu bzang po ste /
NK054(yi)001:10104: gnyis pa'am gzhan pa mi mnga' bas ni bdag nyid
NK054(yi)001:10105: kyi don de tsam du 'dzin pa'ang med pa ni
NK054(yi)001:10108: kun tu bzang po'i rig pa rang snang ba'i bder gshegs yum dang bcas pa thams cad dam /
NK054(yi)001:10109: yang na thams cad kun tu bzang po'i rig par
NK054(yi)001:10110: mtshungs pa la yang mtshon tshig tu thams cad ces
NK054(yi)001:10111: bya ste / 'dul byed kyi ngo bo'o //
NK054(yi)001:10113: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la /
NK054(yi)001:10114: zhes pa drug ni phan tshun yan man drug gam /
NK054(yi)001:10115: yang na 'gro drug gi gnas so //
NK054(yi)001:10116: phyogs bcu ni re re la yang bcu bcu la sogs te /
NK054(yi)001:10117: yan lag dang nying lag mthar thug pa med pa chos kyi dbyings ji tsam pa de tsam mo //
NK054(yi)001:10118: de ni rgyal ba kun tu bzang po'i gdul zhing yin te /
NK054(yi)001:10119: chos kyi sku'i zhing khams zhes kyang smos so //
NK054(yi)001:10120: nyid kyi che ba'i zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10121: ston pa'i ngo bo dbyings ye shes dbyer med pa chos sku chen po ni nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:10122: de ni theg pa 'og ma rnams las che ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:10123: rgyu 'bras dang don rtags kyis ma gos pa'i chos
NK054(yi)001:10124: kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad kyi gdul bya rnams la
NK054(yi)001:10125: dbang po mtho dman gyi bye brag gis blo dang
NK054(yi)001:10126: mthun pa'i 'dul byed kyang skad cig la phyogs bcur
NK054(yi)001:10127: snang ba'o // dkyil 'khor 'byung bar zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10128: spyir na dkyil 'khor ni spyir gsang sngags phyi nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:10129: sgos su bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'byung bar bzhed pa
NK054(yi)001:10130: ni dgongs pa'i ngo bo ste chos kyi sku la
NK054(yi)001:10131: mi mnga' yang / mi 'gag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa yang bzhed ces bya la /
NK054(yi)001:10132: bzhed pa rang gi ngo bo ni gdul bya'i snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10133: yang na gdul bya rnams ston pa nyid kyi thugs
NK054(yi)001:10134: las mi gzhan pas na nyid kyi che ba ni
NK054(yi)001:10135: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa
NK054(yi)001:10136: gnyis sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo bor
NK054(yi)001:10137: bzhugs pa ni ye nas bzhugs pas che ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10138: don de rtogs shing mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'og
NK054(yi)001:10139: nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'og nas 'byung
NK054(yi)001:10140: ba ston pa'i skad cig ma snga ma la ni
NK054(yi)001:10142: gdul bya'i ched du brjod pa 'og nas 'byung ba 'di brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:10143: 'dir stod du lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnal 'byor
NK054(yi)001:10144: pa'i bsgom bya rdzogs pa chen po rtogs pa'i ngo
NK054(yi)001:10146: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas //
NK054(yi)001:10147: zhes pa nas 'byung bar bzhed na'i bar /
NK054(yi)001:10148: 'jig rten drug ni chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad kyi khams gsum pa thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:10150: phyogs dbus thams cad du rig pa snang ba nyid
NK054(yi)001:10151: kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya rig pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:10152: ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor du ye nas bdag la
NK054(yi)001:10153: ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi ngo bo yin
NK054(yi)001:10154: la / de nyid gdul bya la gsal bar bstan
NK054(yi)001:10155: pa'i dgongs pa mngon du bstan pa ni bzhed pa
NK054(yi)001:10158: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK054(yi)001:10161: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis las /
NK054(yi)001:10162: 'di blo rab kyi don la ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
NK054(yi)001:10163: ye shes kyi ngos nas phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga mtshon te /
NK054(yi)001:10164: lta ba yid yul du byas pa tsam gyi dbang du na rig pa shar /
NK054(yi)001:10168: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid byang chub sems su
NK054(yi)001:10169: rtogs pa'i rig pa rang shar ba la ni shar
NK054(yi)001:10171: 'jig rten na nyi ma shar phyogs la shar zhes bya ba dang mtshungs so //
NK054(yi)001:10172: de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i sems la nye bar bcad
NK054(yi)001:10173: na sems rang rig pa nyid phyogs dang dbus kyis
NK054(yi)001:10174: bsdus pa thams cad du rang snang bas /
NK054(yi)001:10175: phyogs dbus kyi chos thams cad rang rig pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:10176: du gsal ba la thams cad dbyer med par gsal
NK054(yi)001:10177: bas / snang ba dang stong pa chos can dang
NK054(yi)001:10178: chos nyid 'khor ba dang 'das pa gnyis su 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:10179: pa'i chos thams cad ma spangs ngang gis dag pas
NK054(yi)001:10180: gsal la mi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs
NK054(yi)001:10181: bas / te / gsal ba ni me long g.ya' dag pa mthar phyin pa lta bu la /
NK054(yi)001:10182: gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i rgyun gyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10183: don de nyid la gong du bshad pa'i mtha' thams cad rang dag gi ngo bo nyid la /
NK054(yi)001:10184: yul dang yul can gyi 'dzin pa phra ba'i phra
NK054(yi)001:10185: ba yang mi gnas pa ni mi rtog pa zhes
NK054(yi)001:10186: bya ste / dpe'i sgo nas mtshon dgos pas me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10187: phyogs kyi dbang du rang snang mi 'gag pa'i ngo
NK054(yi)001:10188: bo tsam gyi ngo nas shar phyogs zhes smos so
NK054(yi)001:10189: // yon tan rdzogs pas lho zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10190: don spyi yid kyi dbang du byas pa'i dbang du rig pa shar nas ma rig pa nub /
NK054(yi)001:10192: de gsum 'dzom na bud+d+ha'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa lho zhes brjod de /
NK054(yi)001:10193: de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i blo gting du song ba'i
NK054(yi)001:10194: ting nge 'dzin la sbyar na me long lta bu'i
NK054(yi)001:10195: ye shes mi 'gag pa'i ngang las mkhyen pa gnyis
NK054(yi)001:10196: shar te / ji lta ba mkhyen pa chos kyi dbyings las skad cig kyang mi g.yo /
NK054(yi)001:10197: ji snyed mkhyen pa ma 'dres pa'i ngos nas gdul
NK054(yi)001:10198: bya'i ngo la dus gsum du mdzad pa dus gcig
NK054(yi)001:10199: tu shar ba ni ji snyed mkhyen pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10200: de dus nyid na chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las
NK054(yi)001:10201: ma g.yos shing mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du lhun
NK054(yi)001:10202: gyis grub pas 'dzin pa thams cad dag pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:10203: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo ste /
NK054(yi)001:10204: rin po che dang 'dra bar yon tan gyi tshogs rang snang ba mi 'gag par shar ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:10205: lhun grub la mnga' mdzad pa la ni lho phyogs zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10206: de ltar yon tan rdzogs tsam so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis gdul bya'i rgyud dang /
NK054(yi)001:10209: mdzad pa'i phrin las thams cad skad cig ma la bsam yas pa mkhyen pa ni ye shes te /
NK054(yi)001:10210: de gang las byung na khams gsum gyi lhan cig
NK054(yi)001:10211: skyes pa'i ma rig pa dang kun tu brtags pa'i
NK054(yi)001:10212: ma rig pa gnyis chu'i rnyog ma dang 'dra ba
NK054(yi)001:10214: dag bya'i ngos nas ming btags pas ma rig pa nub ces bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10215: ye shes gsal ba'i bdag nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:10216: sgrib pa byang zhes pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te /
NK054(yi)001:10217: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la don
NK054(yi)001:10218: gnyis lhun gyis grub ste gzhan don thams cad bskyar
NK054(yi)001:10219: mi dgos par cig car du lhun gyis grub pas
NK054(yi)001:10220: dgos pa chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo bar rang
NK054(yi)001:10221: don rdzogs la / don des gdul bya'i skyon gyis mi gos te /
NK054(yi)001:10222: rang gzhan gyi bya ba skad cig ma la dus
NK054(yi)001:10223: gcig grub pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
NK054(yi)001:10225: dag par mthar phyin pa bya ba grub pa'i yon tan no //
NK054(yi)001:10226: ye shes bzhi'i ngang la yod med la sogs pa'i
NK054(yi)001:10227: spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba ni stong
NK054(yi)001:10228: pa chen po'i ye shes te /
NK054(yi)001:10229: don la gdams gzhi med kyang thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir dbus zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10230: dkyil 'khor yang rang byung gi ye shes ni dkyil la /
NK054(yi)001:10231: ye shes bzhi ni 'khor du tha snyad du brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:10233: 'dir ngo bo nyid kyi brtags pa ste ye shes lnga'i don rig pa la gsal nas /
NK054(yi)001:10234: bsgom bya sgom byed yul yul can ma dmigs pa
NK054(yi)001:10235: nam mkhas nam mkha' mi sems kyang nam mkha'i ngang
NK054(yi)001:10236: las mi 'da' ba bzhin du gsan pa ni rdzogs
NK054(yi)001:10237: pa chen po zhes kyang bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:10238: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK054(yi)001:10239: cad phyogs 'dzin dang bral par de nyid du chud
NK054(yi)001:10240: kyang de la der 'dzin phra ba yang mi mnga'
NK054(yi)001:10243: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK054(yi)001:10245: rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK054(yi)001:10246: zhes pa gong du bshad pa'i rdzogs pa chen po'i don de /
NK054(yi)001:10247: blo mchog gang gis rtogs pa ni don mngon du byas pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10248: rig pa gdengs su chud pa'i rnal 'byor bas /
NK054(yi)001:10250: phyi nang gi chos snang ba dang ma 'gag pa
NK054(yi)001:10251: thams cad dang dbang yul gyi dgos pa skong ba'i
NK054(yi)001:10252: chos thams cad / dkyil 'khor chen po zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10253: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi blar gyur pa'i ye shes
NK054(yi)001:10254: lnga'i dkyil 'khor las mi 'da' bas spyod pa ni
NK054(yi)001:10255: de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10256: rnal 'byor pa de la zhing khams dang spyod yul
NK054(yi)001:10257: thams cad phyogs 'dzin thams cad bral bas yongs su
NK054(yi)001:10259: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10260: de ni che ba ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa chen
NK054(yi)001:10261: po'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya dbang po rab kyi ngo
NK054(yi)001:10263: rten gzhal yas khang bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10264: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
NK054(yi)001:10266: mngon par rtogs pa man ngag gi rim pas ting nge 'dzin gsum gong du bstan pa bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:10267: rjes su gzhal yas khang 'og gzhi dang bzhugs gnas gnyis las /
NK054(yi)001:10268: dang po 'og gzhi ste rgyu' yi ge las 'phros pa'i e las nam mkha' dang /
NK054(yi)001:10271: lam las gser gyis gzhi dang /
NK054(yi)001:10272: ri rab bsgom pa rnams dbyibs dang kha dog dang /
NK054(yi)001:10274: don rtogs rnams gzhan du gsal ba bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:10275: rgyu'i yi ge las b+h+aum 'phros pa las ri rab
NK054(yi)001:10276: kyi kha la 'od du zhu ba las gzhal yas
NK054(yi)001:10278: gleng gzhi'i le'ura bstan pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:10279: gzhal yas khang gi 'og gzhi ni /
NK054(yi)001:10282: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye
NK054(yi)001:10283: shes spros pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bas zlum po'o
NK054(yi)001:10284: // 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su kha dog sngon po'o //
NK054(yi)001:10285: phyogs bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi byung ba ni chos
NK054(yi)001:10286: dbyings ye shes mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las me long
NK054(yi)001:10287: lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhir shar te
NK054(yi)001:10288: / de nyid che ba'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i rtags su kha dog ser po /
NK054(yi)001:10289: rtsibs mchan bzhi chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su sngon po /
NK054(yi)001:10290: de'i phyi rol rdo rje gdung zlum gyis bskor ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:10291: ye shes bzhi gdul bya'i ngo la bsam gyis mi
NK054(yi)001:10292: khyab par shar yang chos dbyings ye shes las ma
NK054(yi)001:10293: g.yos pa'i rtags su rdo rje sngon po'i phreng bas
NK054(yi)001:10294: bskor ba'o // de'i phyi rol na gru chad bzhi
NK054(yi)001:10295: ye shes chen po kun nas kun tu rgyas shing
NK054(yi)001:10296: chos thams cad de nyid du rdzogs pa'i rtags su
NK054(yi)001:10297: bskor ba'o // gru chad bzhi'o // de nyid ye
NK054(yi)001:10298: shes bzhir mtshon pa'i shar me long lta bu'i ye
NK054(yi)001:10299: shes mtha'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su dkar
NK054(yi)001:10300: bskor ba'o // gru chad bzhi'o // / lho mnyam
NK054(yi)001:10301: pa nyid kyi ye shes yon tan rdzogs pa'i rtags
NK054(yi)001:10302: su rgyas pa'i kha dog ser /
NK054(yi)001:10303: nub so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mtha' gnyis dbang
NK054(yi)001:10304: du sdud cing mtha' gnyis kyi skyon gyis ma gos
NK054(yi)001:10306: byang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes phrin las sna
NK054(yi)001:10307: tshogs la mnga' mdzad cing bdag gzhan gyi don cig
NK054(yi)001:10308: car du grub pa'i rtags su ljang gu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10309: gru chad kyi phyogs bzhi na glo 'bur bzhi yod de /
NK054(yi)001:10310: rang byung gi ye shes las phyogs bzhir glo 'bur bzhi byung ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:10311: me long lta bu la sogs pa bzhi 'byung ba'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10312: glo 'bur 'di la slo dpon bi ma la'i bzhed kyis steng na yar yang mkhar thabs su bzhed /
NK054(yi)001:10313: slob dpon pad+ma'i bzhed kyis mtho ba mi bzhed de /
NK054(yi)001:10314: mkhar thabs ni phyogs bzhi na lhag pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10315: zhes pa steng gru chad dang mnyam /
NK054(yi)001:10316: glo lhag pa ste steng na lha yang bkod de /
NK054(yi)001:10317: bra ma na sh+r+ain+tam gar+b+ha'i bsdus 'grel las kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10318: glo 'bur bzhi la nang gi sems dpa' bzhi zhes smos so //
NK054(yi)001:10320: gru chad kyi rgyab na 'khor bar lha snam yod pa la bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10321: gleng gzhi'i le'u na spags pa /
NK054(yi)001:10323: sa gzhi bas bar khyams kyis mtho /
NK054(yi)001:10324: de bas kyang gru chad kyis mtho /
NK054(yi)001:10328: slob dpon kha shas kyis sor bzhi tshad smos skad /
NK054(yi)001:10329: kha shas kyi mtho gang tsam /
NK054(yi)001:10330: kha shas kyis rgyab na bzhugs pa'i spyan dang /
NK054(yi)001:10331: nang na bzhugs pa'i thugs ka mnyam pa tsam gsungs so //
NK054(yi)001:10332: bla ma bde bar gshegs pas gang ltar yang khyad med /
NK054(yi)001:10333: sangs rgyas kyi ngos nas rang rig pa'i snang ba /
NK054(yi)001:10334: gdul bya'i ngos nas blo'i snang ba /
NK054(yi)001:10335: rnal 'byor pas rang gi blo gang 'thad bsgom pas chog gsungs so //
NK054(yi)001:10336: kun tu gru bzhi zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:10337: ye shes rang snang ba'i gzhal yas khang yin pa'i dbang gis /
NK054(yi)001:10338: rang byung gi ye shes la bdag gzhan gyi ngos
NK054(yi)001:10339: nas che ba'i yon tan rdzogs pa mthar phyin pa'i
NK054(yi)001:10340: rtags su / gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs rgyas pa'i gru bzhi'o //
NK054(yi)001:10342: thugs rang byung gi ye shes lhag pa'i chos sku
NK054(yi)001:10343: la lam pas 'jug pa'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo
NK054(yi)001:10344: bzhi nas 'jug pa'i phyir sgo bzhi ste /
NK054(yi)001:10345: shar stong pa nyid kyi sgo /
NK054(yi)001:10348: byang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sgo ste /
NK054(yi)001:10349: sgo khyud bar ma chad pa dang ldan no //
NK054(yi)001:10350: gzhal yas khang gi khog pa yang ye shes lnga las grub pa'i rtags kun 'od sna lnga /
NK054(yi)001:10351: de'i thog tu rang byung gi ye shes rin po chen snang ba'i phag rtsis /
NK054(yi)001:10352: de'i gong du bden pa gnyis dbyer mi phyed pa'i chun 'phyangs dang /
NK054(yi)001:10353: sprul pa'i 'phro ba rgyun mi chad pa'i phreng ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:10354: gdul bya'i rgyu kyi nyon mongs pa mi gnas par byed pa'i rnga yab dang /
NK054(yi)001:10355: thabs dang shes rab kyis gdul bya'i rgyud nyon mongs
NK054(yi)001:10356: pa sel bar byed pa'i nyi zla lding ba dang
NK054(yi)001:10357: / gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs kyi bye brag ma
NK054(yi)001:10358: 'dres par mkhyen pa'i bad kyi gdong la shar bu'i
NK054(yi)001:10359: / phreng ba dang / rang byung gi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:10360: la mi mthun pa gtan nas mi 'byung ba'i dar
NK054(yi)001:10362: rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin //
NK054(yi)001:10363: zhes pa rol mo ni lha mo'i tshogs lag cha dang bcas pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10364: gzugs kyi lha mos me long bsnams pa /
NK054(yi)001:10365: sgra'i lha mos pi wam bsnams pa /
NK054(yi)001:10366: dri'i lha mos spos me bsnams pa /
NK054(yi)001:10367: ro'i lha mos zhal zas bsnams pa /
NK054(yi)001:10368: reg bya'i lha mos na baza'i gong ba rdo rjes mtshan ma bsnams pa /
NK054(yi)001:10369: chos nyid lha mos phyag na chos 'byung gru gsum
NK054(yi)001:10370: bsnams pa la sogs pa sna tshogs pas gzhal yas
NK054(yi)001:10371: khang gi phyi nang kun na khyab ste /
NK054(yi)001:10372: long long phyed pa sprin dpung bzhin gtibs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10373: gzhal yas khang de yang phyi dbyibs ni nang dang mthun pa /
NK054(yi)001:10374: bya skyibs lnga dang ldan pa /
NK054(yi)001:10375: sgo thog bzhin rta babs bzhi'o //
NK054(yi)001:10376: rnam thar brgyad kyi them skas brgyad dang ldan pa /
NK054(yi)001:10377: sgo them gyi phyi nang yang theg pa brgyad nas
NK054(yi)001:10378: bgrod nas rang byung gi ye shes rdzogs pa chen
NK054(yi)001:10379: po'i don mngon du bya ba'i phyir nas them skas
NK054(yi)001:10380: bzhi la 'dzeg / nang du them skas bzhi la 'bab pa'i tshul du yod do //
NK054(yi)001:10381: rming gi rgyab na bden pa gnyis kyi rtags /
NK054(yi)001:10382: khri 'phang gnyis kyis gzhal yas khang 'khor ba'o /
NK054(yi)001:10383: nang na'ang rdo rje'i gdung zlum gyi steng gi mthong
NK054(yi)001:10384: ka bum pa'i rming gi rdo rje'i gdung zlum yod
NK054(yi)001:10385: pa'i steng shod kyi bar ka bas brgyan te /
NK054(yi)001:10386: shar na 'khor lo'i ka ba gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:10387: lhon rin po che'i ka ba gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:10388: nub na pad+ma'i ka ba gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:10389: byang na ral gri'i ka ba gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:10390: nam mkha'i la rdo rje'i gdung bzhi bsnol ba'i rtse mo ka ba brgyad kyis bteg pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10391: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan //
NK054(yi)001:10393: slob dpon kha shas kyis lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bkod pa'i ngo bo yin zhes pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:10394: yang la las lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi cha
NK054(yi)001:10395: byad can gyi sprul pa'i 'phro 'du mang po gzhal
NK054(yi)001:10396: yas khang gi nang na ling long phyed pa yang
NK054(yi)001:10398: seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
NK054(yi)001:10400: 'dir rang byung gi ye shes la 'bras bu'i chos
NK054(yi)001:10401: thams cad rdzogs pa'i rtags su 'khor lo'i dbus su
NK054(yi)001:10402: rin po che'i khri'i bar na /
NK054(yi)001:10403: thugs mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su seng ge brgyad kyi khri /
NK054(yi)001:10404: sku stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su shar du glang po che brgyad kyi khri /
NK054(yi)001:10405: yon tan rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su lhor rta brgyad kyi khri /
NK054(yi)001:10406: gsung dbang bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su nub tu rma bya brgyad kyi khri /
NK054(yi)001:10407: phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su byang du shang shang te'u brgyad kyi khri /
NK054(yi)001:10408: sems can de dag brgyad du snang ba ni theg
NK054(yi)001:10409: pa brgyad nas bgrod nas mthar thug rdzogs pa chen
NK054(yi)001:10412: de la lha rnams bzhugs pa'i rten no //
NK054(yi)001:10413: nyi zla pad+ma rin po che //
NK054(yi)001:10415: nyi ma ni rang rig pa nyid thabs ma 'gag
NK054(yi)001:10416: pas gdul bya'i rgyud la ma rig pa sel ba
NK054(yi)001:10417: dang / nyon mongs pa skems nas mi gnas par byed pa'i las so //
NK054(yi)001:10418: zla ba ni gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la nyon
NK054(yi)001:10419: mongs pa'i tsha bas gdung ba bsil bar mdzad pa'o
NK054(yi)001:10420: // pad+ma ni 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du gdul bya'i don mdzad kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10421: mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dang bral ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10422: rin po che'i khri ni yid bzhin nor bus rtogs pa med kyang dgos pa skong ba bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:10423: thugs rang byung gi ye shes phyogs 'dzin gyi rtog pa med kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10424: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyis dgos pa skong ba'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10425: gdan de dag gtso bo lnga la lnga sogs te
NK054(yi)001:10426: rin po che'i khri sems can pad+ma zla ba nyi
NK054(yi)001:10427: ma'o // de ni 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dbus dang lnga'o //
NK054(yi)001:10428: sems dpa'i gnas glo 'bur bzhi gru chad bzhi dang brgyad la /
NK054(yi)001:10429: rin po che'i khri chung re re'i thog tu pad+ma nyi ma sum brtsegs so //
NK054(yi)001:10430: lha snam la shar nub dang po gnyis su kun
NK054(yi)001:10431: bzang yab yum gyi gdan pad zla nyi ma sum
NK054(yi)001:10432: brtsegs re re'o // mtshams bzhi lho nub gnyis dang
NK054(yi)001:10433: drug tu thub pa drug gi gdan pad+ma rkyang pa
NK054(yi)001:10434: brtsegs re re'o // re re'o // sgo bzhir sgo
NK054(yi)001:10435: ba bzhi'i gdan nyi ma re re'i thog tu bdud
NK054(yi)001:10436: bzhi'i ngo bo ro re re'o //
NK054(yi)001:10438: 'dir yang mngon rtogs dang sbyar te /
NK054(yi)001:10439: de la yang slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i rin chen d+r+wa chung gi bzhed pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:10440: gnyags dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ra'i bzhed dang /
NK054(yi)001:10441: shin+tam gar+b+hasa mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs me long lta bu'i bzhed pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:10442: rgyud phyi ma rtog pa'i d+r+wa ba bsal ba'i bzhed
NK054(yi)001:10443: pa la sogs pa zur mi 'dra ba mang yang
NK054(yi)001:10444: / 'dir slob dpon pad+ma'i bzhed pa kho na ste /
NK054(yi)001:10445: rgyu'i yi ge a dkar po gzhal yas khang gi
NK054(yi)001:10446: nang gi nam mkha' la gnas pa nyid las sngar
NK054(yi)001:10448: mthun pa'i ak+sha sngon po gcig 'phros te /
NK054(yi)001:10449: nam mkha' na de gnyis gnas pa'i rten 'brel las yig 'bru rnams byung ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:10450: dper na ngur mo dang rdo'i rten 'brel las me byung ba bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:10451: yig 'bru gnyis thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rten 'brel las yig 'bru'i tshogs byung ste /
NK054(yi)001:10452: ak+sha gnyis kyi rgyu rkyen gyis tha drang log gnyis byung dbus kyi gdan thog tu bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:10457: de yang log pa rnams yab kyi cha yin pas g.yas su bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:10458: ka dang tsa gnyis shar gyi glo 'bur /
NK054(yi)001:10459: kha dang tsha gnyis lho'i glo 'bur /
NK054(yi)001:10460: ga dang dza gnyis nub kyi glo 'bur /
NK054(yi)001:10461: g+ha dang dz+ha gnyis byang gi glo 'bur /
NK054(yi)001:10462: nga shar gyi sgo ba'i gdan thog /
NK054(yi)001:10463: nya lho'i sgo ba'i gdan thog /
NK054(yi)001:10464: pa dang ya gnyis shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad /
NK054(yi)001:10465: pha dang wa gnyis lho nub mtshams kyi gru chad /
NK054(yi)001:10466: ba dang ra gnyis nub byang mtshams kyi gru chad /
NK054(yi)001:10467: b+ha dang la gnyis byang shar mtshams kyi gru chad /
NK054(yi)001:10468: ma nub phyogs kyi sgo ba'i gdan thog /
NK054(yi)001:10469: i +ai gnyis shar lho mtshams dang lho phyogs kyi pad+ma'i gdan thog /
NK054(yi)001:10470: u +au gnyis lho nub mtshams dang nub byang mtshams kyi pad+ma'i gdan thog /
NK054(yi)001:10471: e ee gnyis byang dang byang shar gyi pad+ma'i gdan la /
NK054(yi)001:10472: o oo gnyis byang phyogs kyi sgo ba'i gdan la /
NK054(yi)001:10473: sha drang po shar sgo'i nga'i mchan /
NK054(yi)001:10474: sha log po lho sgo nya'i mchan /
NK054(yi)001:10477: de nas k+sha shar phyogs kyi gdan sum brtsegs la /
NK054(yi)001:10478: a nub kyi gdan sum brtsegs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10479: de ltar bkod nas yig 'bru rnams las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros /
NK054(yi)001:10480: sems can gyi ngag gi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:10482: tshur 'dus yig 'bru zhe gnyis la thim /
NK054(yi)001:10483: 'od du zhu ba las phyag mtshan zhe gnyis su rgyur te /
NK054(yi)001:10485: 'chad pa pos shes par byas nas rgyas par bya la /
NK054(yi)001:10486: phyag mtshan las 'od zer spros te sems can gyi yid kyi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:10488: tshur 'dus phyag mtshan la thim 'od du zhu ba las sku phra mor gyur /
NK054(yi)001:10489: de las 'od zer spros sems can gyi lus kyi sgrib pa sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:10491: tshur 'dus sku phra mos la thim /
NK054(yi)001:10492: so so'i snying po brjod pas so so'i sku gsal ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:10493: yang na yi ge'i 'phro 'dus kyang bskul /
NK054(yi)001:10496: don gsum ka byas nas phyag rgya las bskyed sngags
NK054(yi)001:10497: brjod pas sku rdzogs par bskyed pa dang gnyis so
NK054(yi)001:10498: // bzhugs tshul bzhugs gnas bcas par bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10499: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK054(yi)001:10501: rigs lnga'i yab lnga ni rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung ste /
NK054(yi)001:10502: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i mnyam bzhag chen po la bzhugs pa'i tshul du /
NK054(yi)001:10503: zhabs g.yas pa'i bol g.yon pa'i barla thog tu bton pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10504: thabs mdzad pa ji ltar mdzad kyang shes rab las ma g.yos pa'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10505: g.yon pa shes rab kyi zhabs g.yas pa'i barla thog tu bol bton pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10506: shes rab las ma g.yos bzhin du thabs kyi mdzad pa cir yang mdzad pa'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10507: de'i shugs la yum lnga ni brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung ste /
NK054(yi)001:10508: yab kyi rgyab tu zhabs kyi mthil gnyis sbyar ba pad+ma'i skyil krung du /
NK054(yi)001:10510: gnyis su med pa'i rol pa ji ltar mdzad kyang shes rab dbyings las ma g.yos pas /
NK054(yi)001:10511: mtha' gnyis kyi skyon gyis ma gos pa pad ma lta bur ston to //
NK054(yi)001:10514: zhabs g.yas pa gdan la mar brkyang /
NK054(yi)001:10515: g.yon pa skyil krung ma 'gul ba lta bu ste /
NK054(yi)001:10516: 'gro don mdzad pa ma rdzogs pas 'gro ba'i don la bzhengs la khad lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10517: de yang zhabs g.yas pa thabs ma 'gag pas 'gro don ji ltar mdzad kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10518: g.yon pa chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo ba'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10519: yum rnams ni shes rab ste /
NK054(yi)001:10520: chos kyi dbyings las g.yo 'gul mi mnga' ba'i rtags su bzhugs pa kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:10521: zlas drang ba'i dbang gis lha kun gyi bzhugs tshul bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10522: rgyud kyi rang bzhin gab sbas can yin pa'i dbang gis dngos su mi gsal yang /
NK054(yi)001:10523: bshad rgyud kun nas ston pa thub pa drug ni
NK054(yi)001:10524: 'gro ba drug gi don la rgyun du gshegs bzhud
NK054(yi)001:10525: mdzad pa'i rtags su pad+ma'i gdan la bzhengs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10526: khro bo yab yum brgyad ni /
NK054(yi)001:10527: phyi nang gi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rtags su brkyang bskul gyis bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:10528: zhal yang phyir gzigs pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10529: kun bzang yab yum gnyis ni mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung kho na las /
NK054(yi)001:10530: kun tu bzang mo pad+ma'i skyil krung zhes 'chad par yang gada'o //
NK054(yi)001:10533: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dag //
NK054(yi)001:10534: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10535: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dbus dang lnga la /
NK054(yi)001:10537: rgyal mo yum lnga dbyer med du bzhugs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10538: 'dir dkyil 'khor la sku lnga tshang ba'i dbang gis /
NK054(yi)001:10539: lnga po longs sku ste dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin la bzhag pa kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:10540: g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //
NK054(yi)001:10542: sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhugs gnas bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:10543: de nas slob dpon bi ma la'i srol gyis /
NK054(yi)001:10544: nang gi sems dpa' bzhi gtso bo'i g.yas shar lho
NK054(yi)001:10545: mtshams kyi gru chad nas brtsams te gru chad bzhi
NK054(yi)001:10548: shar gyi glo 'bur nas g.yas skor du glo 'bur bzhi la bzhugs par bzhed pas /
NK054(yi)001:10549: shar gyi glo 'bur la mthong ba mig gi rnam shes gnas su dag pa sa'i snying po /
NK054(yi)001:10550: 'og nas btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas zer bas /
NK054(yi)001:10551: mig gi rnam shes kyi yul gzugs gnas su dag
NK054(yi)001:10552: pa lha mo l+aa s+ye ma sa'i snying po'i btsun
NK054(yi)001:10553: mo'o // lho'i glo 'bur la snom pa sna'i rnam
NK054(yi)001:10554: shes gnas su dag pa byang chub sems dpa' nam
NK054(yi)001:10555: mo'o // mkha'i snying po'o // yul dri gnas su dag pa lha mo m+aa l+ye ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:10556: nub kyi glo 'bur la thos pa rna ba'i rnam
NK054(yi)001:10557: shes gnas su dag pa spyan ras gzigs dang yum
NK054(yi)001:10558: g+airti ma'o // byang gi glo 'bur la myong ba
NK054(yi)001:10559: lce'i rnam shes gnas su dag pa phyag na rdo
NK054(yi)001:10560: rje dang lha mo gar ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:10561: gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //
NK054(yi)001:10563: shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la mthong byed mig
NK054(yi)001:10564: gi dbang po dag pa byams pa dang btsun mo
NK054(yi)001:10565: d+h+au pe ma'o // lho nub tu gru chad la
NK054(yi)001:10566: thos byed rna ba'i dbang po dag pa sgrib sel
NK054(yi)001:10567: dang lha mo me tog ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:10568: nub byang gru chad la snom byed sna'i dbang po dag pa kun bzang dang mar me ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:10569: byang shar gru chad la myong byed lce'i dbang po dag pa 'jam dpal dang dri chab ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:10570: tshogs smos pa ni yum bzhi po bsdu ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10571: bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //
NK054(yi)001:10573: shar lho mtshams su lha'i thug pa dkar po /
NK054(yi)001:10574: lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi thub pa sngon po /
NK054(yi)001:10575: lho nub tu mi'i thub pa ser po /
NK054(yi)001:10576: nub byang du yi dwags kyi thub pa sngon po /
NK054(yi)001:10577: byang du dud 'gro'i thub pa ser nag /
NK054(yi)001:10578: byang shar ru dmyal ba'i thub pa mthing nag /
NK054(yi)001:10579: kun kyang sprul pa'i sku'i cha lugs can no //
NK054(yi)001:10580: 'di la gdul bya dang mthun par bsgom pa yang yod de /
NK054(yi)001:10581: bshad rgyud sgyu 'phrul bla ma nas 'di bzhin du bshad pas 'thad do //
NK054(yi)001:10582: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
NK054(yi)001:10583: bya ba dang ni gnas par bstan //
NK054(yi)001:10585: mdun ni shar phyogs te gdan sum brtsegs kyi steng du /
NK054(yi)001:10586: yid rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa las 'khor 'das kyi byed pa po yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:10587: de gnas su dag pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK054(yi)001:10588: rgyab nub phyogs su chos bya ba mo gnas su
NK054(yi)001:10589: dag pa kun tu bzang mo bzhugs tshul yab dang
NK054(yi)001:10590: mthun / sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni //
NK054(yi)001:10591: zhes pa shar sgo lho sgo nub sgo byang sgo bzhi la /
NK054(yi)001:10593: nang du nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i kro bo shar du gshin rje gshed /
NK054(yi)001:10597: btsun mo'i tshogs ni bzhi ste /
NK054(yi)001:10601: byang du dril bu ma dang bzhi yab yum dang ldan par gnas so //
NK054(yi)001:10603: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
NK054(yi)001:10605: mi bskyod pa'i rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan chos kyi
NK054(yi)001:10606: dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi
NK054(yi)001:10607: rang rtags g.yas rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa
NK054(yi)001:10608: / rnam par snang mdzad me long lta bu'i ye
NK054(yi)001:10609: shes kyis gdul bya'i rgyud la chos kyi 'khor lo
NK054(yi)001:10611: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtog pa med kyang
NK054(yi)001:10612: dgos 'dod re ba skong ba'i rtags su rin chen
NK054(yi)001:10614: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mtha' gnyis kyi skyon
NK054(yi)001:10615: gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su snang ba mtha' yas
NK054(yi)001:10616: pad+ma / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don gnyis
NK054(yi)001:10617: cig car rdzogs pa'i rtags su don yod grub pa
NK054(yi)001:10618: pad+ma / ral gri / dril bu 'bar zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:10619: dril bu ni sgra mthar stong pas dbyings kyi cha ste /
NK054(yi)001:10620: g.yon dang po thams cad dril bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10621: yum gyis kyang g.yon thams cad rang rtags dril bu 'dzin la /
NK054(yi)001:10622: g.yas shes rab thabs dang mi 'bral ba'i rtags su yab la 'khyud pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10623: de la slob dpon pad+ma'i bzhed kyis rigs lnga zhal gsum phyag drug bzhed de /
NK054(yi)001:10624: jo bo gnubs kyis kyang de ltar bshad /
NK054(yi)001:10625: sh+ain+tam gar+b+ha'i bsdus 'grel las kyang bshad /
NK054(yi)001:10626: spar khab las kyang bshad pas /
NK054(yi)001:10627: ye shes re re'ang sku gsung thugs sam rnam par
NK054(yi)001:10628: thar pa gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags su dbu gsum
NK054(yi)001:10629: / re re'ang ye shes lnga lnga dang de dag
NK054(yi)001:10630: rang bzhin dbyings dang drug rdzogs pa'i rtags su phyag
NK054(yi)001:10631: / drug / zhal ni sku mdog bstan pa'i skabs su gsal /
NK054(yi)001:10632: phyag mtshan ni mi bskyod pas g.yas gral rim bzhin du rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che /
NK054(yi)001:10633: g.yon gral rim bzhin du dril bu pad+ma ral gri'o //
NK054(yi)001:10634: rnam snang g.yas 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che /
NK054(yi)001:10638: snang mtha' pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas /
NK054(yi)001:10639: dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon /
NK054(yi)001:10640: don grub ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas /
NK054(yi)001:10641: dril bu pad+ma rin chen g.yon /
NK054(yi)001:10642: phyag mtshan de dag kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer 'bar ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10643: de dag ye shes dang sbyar ba'i don rtags kyang shes par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10645: ut+pala klu shing la sogs mtshan //
NK054(yi)001:10646: zhes pa ut+pala ni byang shar mtshams kyi 'jam dpal gyi phyag mtshan te /
NK054(yi)001:10647: klu shing ni shar lho mtshams kyi byams pa'i phyag
NK054(yi)001:10648: mtshan de gnyis smos pas sogs khongs su drug po
NK054(yi)001:10649: bsdu ba ste / bshad rgyud sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa nas //
NK054(yi)001:10650: rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar //
NK054(yi)001:10651: la sogs pa brgyad ka gsal por ston te /
NK054(yi)001:10652: shar phyogs kyi sa'i snying pos rin po che'i myu gu bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10653: gdul bya'i rgyud la byang chub kyi myu gu bskyed par byed pa'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10654: lhor nam mkha'i snying pos ral gri bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10655: gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa gcod pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10656: nub tu spyan ras gzigs kyis pad+ma dkar po bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10657: gdul bya la gsung gi sgo nas chos bstan pas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10658: byang phyag rdor gyis rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10659: gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa ye shes lngas sbyong ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10660: shar lho'i byams pas klu shing gun+d+he bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10661: klu shing ni gra ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:10662: klu gti mug che bas gdul bya'i gti mug gi rgyud sbyong ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10663: gun+d+he ni ril pa spyi blugs te /
NK054(yi)001:10664: bram ze'i rigs gtsang sbra'i chas yin pas byams pa bram ze'i rigs yin pa'i rtags mtshon pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:10665: gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10666: lho nub sgrib sel gyis 'khor lo bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10667: gdul bya'i rgyud la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10668: nub byang kun bzang gis rin po che'i snye ma bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10669: gdul bya rnams yang dag pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro //
NK054(yi)001:10670: byang shar 'jam dpal gyis ut+pala bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10671: ut+pala yal ga shin tu mang bas ral gri dang
NK054(yi)001:10672: 'dra bas don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur
NK054(yi)001:10673: pa'o // 'dab ma zhib la mang ba ni kun
NK054(yi)001:10674: rdzob tu gdul bya'i rgyud gang la gang 'dul mkhyen
NK054(yi)001:10675: pa'o // pa'o // mdzes tshul zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:10676: phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi'i yum ston te /
NK054(yi)001:10677: sa snying gi yum sgeg mos phyag na me long bsnams pas sgeg tshul mdzad do //
NK054(yi)001:10678: m+aa l+ye mas rin po che'i phreng ba smin mtshams
NK054(yi)001:10679: kyi thad kar 'dren pa'i tshul mdzad pa nam snying
NK054(yi)001:10680: gi yum mo // glu ma phyag g.yas pas pi
NK054(yi)001:10681: wam 'dzin cing g.yon pas skad 'dren pa spyan ras
NK054(yi)001:10683: n+airti mas gar bskor ba'i thal mo'i bar na zhal zas bsnams pa phyag na rdo rje'i yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:10684: mtshams kyi sems dpa' bzhi'i yum ni /
NK054(yi)001:10687: d+h+au pe ma spos bsnams pas sna'i dbang po mnyes par byed pa byams pa'i yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:10688: push+pe ma me tog gi gzhong bu bsnams pas dbang
NK054(yi)001:10689: po kun mnyes par byed pa sgrib sel gyi yum
NK054(yi)001:10690: mo // mar me ma mar me bsnams pas mig
NK054(yi)001:10691: gi dbang po mnyes par byed pa kun bzang gi
NK054(yi)001:10692: mo // yum mo // dri chab ma dri'i dung chu bsnams pas 'jam dpal gyi yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:10693: yo byad ni bshad pa bzhi po phyag gis 'dzin pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10694: thub drug dang sgo ba'i phyag mtshan ni /
NK054(yi)001:10695: 'di'i dkyus su med kyang bshad rgyud rgyas pa las /
NK054(yi)001:10696: thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK054(yi)001:10697: mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no //
NK054(yi)001:10699: der gsal bas lha'i thub pa pi wam bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10700: lha rol mo la dga' bas yid 'dren par byed pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10701: lha ma yin gyi thub pas go chad dang mdung bsnams te /
NK054(yi)001:10702: lha ma yin 'thab pa la dga' bas de'i yid 'dren par byed pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10703: mi'i thub pas par bu dang gseg shang bsnams te bcom ldan 'das dngos so //
NK054(yi)001:10704: yi dwags kyi thubs pas rin po che'i sgrom bu
NK054(yi)001:10705: 'dzin te dgos 'dod 'byung bas yi dwags tshim par
NK054(yi)001:10706: byed pa'o // byol song gi thub pas po ti
NK054(yi)001:10707: 'dzin te chos kyis byol song rnams kyi ma rig
NK054(yi)001:10709: dmyal ba'i thub pas me chu gnyis 'dzin te tsha ba'i dmyal ba la chus bsil bar byed /
NK054(yi)001:10710: grang ba'i dmyal ba la mes dro bar byed pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10713: n+ri mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon //
NK054(yi)001:10715: gshin rje gshed pos phyag g.yas kyis thod dbyug 'phyar /
NK054(yi)001:10716: stobs po ches dbyug pa'i mgo bo rdo rjes mtshan pa 'dzin /
NK054(yi)001:10717: rta mgrin gyis thod rlon gyi dbyug pa'i yu ba la sbrul 'khril ba 'dzin /
NK054(yi)001:10718: bdud rtsi 'khyil bas rgya gram gyi dbyug pa 'dzin /
NK054(yi)001:10722: lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta hoh /
NK054(yi)001:10724: shar gyi sgo ma lcags kyu /
NK054(yi)001:10725: lho'i sgo ma zhags pa ma /
NK054(yi)001:10727: dril bu ma byang gi sgo ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:10728: kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro //
NK054(yi)001:10730: mnyam bzhag mdzad pa las sor mo rnams cung bkyed pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10731: de'i thog tu rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa gcig langs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10734: pang du mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya la chos 'byung
NK054(yi)001:10735: gi phyag rgya lag pa'i nang phar la lta ba'o
NK054(yi)001:10736: // zhabs gnyis kyang pad+ma'i skyil krung zhes te /
NK054(yi)001:10737: mnyam pa'i skyil krung dngos phyag len la mdzad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10738: mthing ga zhes pa la sogs pas kha dog bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:10739: mthing ga ni mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po
NK054(yi)001:10740: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye
NK054(yi)001:10741: shes cir yang mi g.yo ba'i rtags su sngon po'o
NK054(yi)001:10742: // dkar po ni me long ye shes skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su rnam snang dkar po'o //
NK054(yi)001:10743: mnyam pa nyid ye shes che ba'i ye shes kyis rgyas pa'i rtags su rin 'byung ser po'o //
NK054(yi)001:10744: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mtha' gnyis kyi skyon
NK054(yi)001:10745: gyis ma gos shing mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdus pa'i
NK054(yi)001:10746: rtags su snang ba mtha' yas le brgan no //
NK054(yi)001:10747: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes gdul bya'i don thams
NK054(yi)001:10748: cad lhun gyis grub cing bdag gzhan gyi don cig
NK054(yi)001:10749: car rdzogs pa'i rtags su don grub mtshon sna lnga
NK054(yi)001:10750: gcig tu 'dres pa'i mdog ljang gu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10752: slob dpon pad+ma'i srol gyis sgo ba yab yum ma gtogs pa de /
NK054(yi)001:10756: byang dang byang shar ljang 'byams su bzhed /
NK054(yi)001:10757: sna tshogs zhes pa'i tshig de bshad rgyud kyi bzhed
NK054(yi)001:10758: pas sems dpa' rnams sku mdog 'gyur bar 'dod pa
NK054(yi)001:10759: dang / sgo ba'i sku mdog yin no skad /
NK054(yi)001:10762: shar lho'i sems dpa' dkar ser /
NK054(yi)001:10763: lho nub kyi sems dpa' dmar ser /
NK054(yi)001:10764: nub byang gi sems dpa' ljang ser /
NK054(yi)001:10765: byang shar gyi sems dpa' dkar ser /
NK054(yi)001:10766: yum rnams ni yab kyi kha dog dngos yin /
NK054(yi)001:10768: lha min thub pa sngon po /
NK054(yi)001:10770: yi dwags thub pa sngon po /
NK054(yi)001:10771: byol song thub pa ser nag /
NK054(yi)001:10772: dmyal ba'i thub pa mthing nag go //
NK054(yi)001:10773: sgo ba ni lugs gang ltar yang 'dra ste /
NK054(yi)001:10778: nag po'i cha ni ye shes kyi ngang las gdul
NK054(yi)001:10779: bya'i dbang gis las drag po kho na la ci
NK054(yi)001:10782: kun tu bzang po nam mkha' mdog /
NK054(yi)001:10784: yab kun tu bzang po ni rig pa'i ye shes
NK054(yi)001:10785: kyis kyang mi 'gyur ba'i rtags su sku mdog sngon
NK054(yi)001:10786: po / kun tu bzang mo ni sku mdog dkar
NK054(yi)001:10787: po ste chos kyi dbyings la cis kyang gos pa
NK054(yi)001:10789: kun tu bzang po yab yum gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:10790: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad bkod nas /
NK054(yi)001:10791: rgyud gzhan na ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pa la /
NK054(yi)001:10792: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' la bzhugs pa mi 'gal lam zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:10794: 'dir tha mal pa'i dus na yid kyi shes pa
NK054(yi)001:10795: gsal la mi 'gag pa nyid 'khor ba'i chos thams
NK054(yi)001:10796: cad kyi byed pa po yin te /
NK054(yi)001:10797: yid kyi yul chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas
NK054(yi)001:10798: dbyer med pa'i ngo bo kun gzhi'i rnam par shes
NK054(yi)001:10799: pa nyid gang du yang ma grub pa cir yang
NK054(yi)001:10800: mi 'gag par 'char ba nyid las gzung 'dzin kha
NK054(yi)001:10801: bltas te / 'khrul pa cir yang 'char ba'i brid
NK054(yi)001:10802: mkhan lta bu byas pas khams gsum gyi chos su
NK054(yi)001:10803: snang ba de gnas su dag pas yid rang byung
NK054(yi)001:10805: yid dag pas 'khrul pa gtan nas ma dmigs pas kun gzhi'i rnam shes gnas su dag ste /
NK054(yi)001:10806: me long g.ya' dag na gsal ba mthar phyin pa dang 'dra bas /
NK054(yi)001:10807: kun gzhi'i rnam shes dag nas rnal ma don gyi kun gzhi mngon du gyur te /
NK054(yi)001:10808: dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa 'bras bu chos sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:10809: kun tu bzang po yab yum la chos sku zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan yang de yin /
NK054(yi)001:10810: chos sku la dbye ba med kyang rig pa'i ye shes la mi 'gag pa'i rtags su kun bzang /
NK054(yi)001:10811: chos kyi dbyings mi 'gag pa'i rtsal kun tu bzang mo /
NK054(yi)001:10812: lha spyi de gnyis kyi mkha' la gsal ba lta bu bas kun tu bzang po shar du bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:10813: kun tu bzang mo nub tu bzhugs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10815: mnyen lcugs 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //
NK054(yi)001:10818: mnyen pa ni phyag gi sor mo rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:10819: lcugs pa ni phyag zhabs lcugs pas gar yang bsgyur du btub pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10820: yang na lcugs pa ni sku'i sked pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10821: gzhu'i changs bzung lta bu zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:10822: rang gi lus kyi sor bzhi'i tshad skabs phyed pas cis kyang bsgyur du btub pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10823: 'khril ba ni thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa ste dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:10825: gong gi bshad pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan pas
NK054(yi)001:10826: gdul bya gang la'ang de kho na'o phyogs su dgongs
NK054(yi)001:10827: pa lta bu'o // gzhon tshul ni lo bcu drug pa'i sha rgyas pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10828: gsal ba ni kha dog rnams gzhan gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa so so na gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10829: dper na gangs la nyi ma shar ba lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10830: 'tsher ba ni kha dog so so na skyon gyis
NK054(yi)001:10831: ma gos shing gsal ba de la so so na
NK054(yi)001:10832: gsal ba'i 'od 'bar bas mig gis blta bar mi
NK054(yi)001:10833: nus te / gangs la nyi ma shar ba lta bu 'am /
NK054(yi)001:10834: nyi ma la lta ba lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10835: lhun sdug pa ni yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas
NK054(yi)001:10836: gdul bya gang gi'ang yid du 'ong nas gtan mi
NK054(yi)001:10838: gzi byin che ba ni yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa mthar phyin pas /
NK054(yi)001:10839: gdul bya rnams zil gyis gnon zhing dbang du sdud pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10840: de ltar sku'i mtshan nyid de dag don dang sbyar na /
NK054(yi)001:10841: nying lag mnyen pa ni phrag dog dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10842: yan lag lcugs pa ni nga rgyal dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10844: gzhon tshul ni gti mug dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10845: ldem pa ni zhe sdang dag pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10846: gsal ba ni ye shes kyi ngo bo mtha' dang bral ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10847: 'tsher ba ni mtha' bral gyi ye shes de 'dzin pa can gyi blo'i yul ma yin pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10848: lhun sdug pa ni rang byung gi ye shes phyogs
NK054(yi)001:10849: 'dzin thams cad ma spangs ngang gis dag cing mnyam
NK054(yi)001:10850: pa nyid kyi ngang la gdul bya thams cad kyi
NK054(yi)001:10851: yid 'dren pa'o // gzi brjid che ba ni rang
NK054(yi)001:10852: byung gi ye shes kyi ngang la 'khor 'das kyi
NK054(yi)001:10853: chos thams cad ma dmigs shing brlag pa'i mtshan nyid
NK054(yi)001:10854: kyi dbang gi gdul bya thams cad zil gyis gnod
NK054(yi)001:10858: 'od zer bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu /
NK054(yi)001:10860: de yang rgyu'i theg pa nas ni smin mtshams dang /
NK054(yi)001:10861: zhal dang thugs ka dang gnas nges pa can nas 'phro bar bshad la /
NK054(yi)001:10862: 'bras bu'i skabs 'dir ni de las 'das te /
NK054(yi)001:10863: ba spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer
NK054(yi)001:10864: bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu 'byung zhes brjod
NK054(yi)001:10865: pas / drug ni dkar ba la sogs pa'i kha dog drug go //
NK054(yi)001:10866: bcu ni spro ba'i gnas phyogs bcu ste /
NK054(yi)001:10867: grangs ni bye ba phrag kyang bldab mar byas pas grangs med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:10869: zhes pa khro bo rnams kyi sku la me ri
NK054(yi)001:10870: 'bar ba g.yas g.yon du 'phros pa mtshams bzhir 'brel
NK054(yi)001:10871: ba ste / gzhal yas khang gi nang thams cad khyab cing 'khyil ba yang /
