NK054(yi)001:10872: me'i dbyings rdo rje rtse lnga pa kho nar snang nas de thams cad 'brel ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:10873: me ni rang byung gi ye shes yin la /
NK054(yi)001:10874: rang byung ye shes nyid ye shes lngar snang ba'i rtags su rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10875: de gdul bya'i ngo la ye shes lngar snang zhing
NK054(yi)001:10876: don du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyi rang byung
NK054(yi)001:10877: ye shes ngang las ma g.yos pa'i rtags /
NK054(yi)001:10878: phyi rol du 'khor ba'i me ri 'dres pas bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:10879: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi //
NK054(yi)001:10880: zhes pa rang bzhin nyid gzhi'i skabs su rtogs tshogs
NK054(yi)001:10881: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas
NK054(yi)001:10882: mtha' dbus med par rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i ngang
NK054(yi)001:10883: la / rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil
NK054(yi)001:10884: 'khor chos dbyings dang mnyam pas mtha' dbus med pa
NK054(yi)001:10885: nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa mthar phyin pa
NK054(yi)001:10887: gdul bya'i rkyen gyis bsgyur bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
NK054(yi)001:10888: lo phyi nang gi 'dod pa tha dad pa dang
NK054(yi)001:10889: / thun mong gi gzugs sku la sogs pa ston
NK054(yi)001:10890: pa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'o
NK054(yi)001:10891: / // de lta rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa
NK054(yi)001:10892: de kho na nyid kyi rjes su rnal 'byor pa
NK054(yi)001:10894: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
NK054(yi)001:10895: yang chos kyi dbyings mtha' klas pa dkyil 'khor bzhi
NK054(yi)001:10896: bcu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid du gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:10897: las sprul pa'i 'phro 'du mang pos 'gro ba'i don
NK054(yi)001:10898: bya bar mos shing bsgom pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10899: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK054(yi)001:10901: yang na de ltar bsgoms pa'i ngang las rnal 'byor
NK054(yi)001:10902: pa'i rig pa'i rtsal gyi yon tan gyis bzhi bcu
NK054(yi)001:10903: rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor grangs bsam gyis mi khyab
NK054(yi)001:10904: pa chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par mos pa'i blos
NK054(yi)001:10905: bsgom mo // de la ni bsam yas dkyil 'khor zhes kyang gsungs so //
NK054(yi)001:10906: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
NK054(yi)001:10907: sku gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa la gnyis kyi mi 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
NK054(yi)001:10908: sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni //
NK054(yi)001:10909: zhes pa spyir sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis las /
NK054(yi)001:10910: sangs rgyas ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa mngon du gyur /
NK054(yi)001:10911: mnyam bzhag la dgongs pa chos kyi sku las mi g.yo /
NK054(yi)001:10912: rjes gdul bya la gzigs pa'i tshe /
NK054(yi)001:10913: sgyu ma bzhin du gdul bya snang ba ma grub pa'i ngang las 'dul ba'i thabs dang /
NK054(yi)001:10914: dus dang mdzad pa'i phrin las rnams su shar ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:10915: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bud+d+ha ni /
NK054(yi)001:10916: mtshan bdun dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ston pa'i rang bzhin spyir bstan pa dang mthun te /
NK054(yi)001:10917: 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i bud+d+ha thams cad dbyer med
NK054(yi)001:10918: pa'i ngo bo khams gsum gyi chos thams cad don
NK054(yi)001:10919: dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i don /
NK054(yi)001:10920: 'khor 'das dbyer med don dam kun rdzoob dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid la /
NK054(yi)001:10921: tshig gi tha snyad la zung 'jug gi sku zhes kyang brjod la /
NK054(yi)001:10922: ngo bo rgyal ba drug pa kun tu bzang po'o //
NK054(yi)001:10923: de la ni sku'i phyag rgya che mchog ces bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:10924: mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas kyi sku phyag chen po la sku lnga lhun gyis grub ste /
NK054(yi)001:10925: smos pa'i zung 'jug gi sku bsam brjod las 'das pa'i ngo bo //
NK054(yi)001:10926: chos thams cad kyi de nyid las 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad kyi rten du gyur pas sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:10927: longs sku ni 'khor 'das dbyer med pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:10928: rig pa chos sku chen po nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las /
NK054(yi)001:10929: dag snang gi sku gnyis kyi bye brag thams cad
NK054(yi)001:10930: 'khrul pa'i snang ba mi 'gag pa'i chos rang snang
NK054(yi)001:10932: rtsa lo'am spro bsdu med par rang snang mi 'gag pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:10933: mi 'gag pa'i longs spyod de 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:10934: de nyid ma byung ma skyes skye ba med pa
NK054(yi)001:10935: rang rig pa chos sku'i ngang la 'das pa'i longs
NK054(yi)001:10936: spyod de / longs spyad bya spyod byed med kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10937: de'i ngang la rgyud chad med pa la tha snyad du longs spyod ces bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10938: de gnyis res mos ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:10939: chu dang gsher ba ltar mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid
NK054(yi)001:10940: la 'da' ba med pa ni 'khor 'das gnyis kyi
NK054(yi)001:10941: longs spyod yul gcig la skad cig ma gcig la
NK054(yi)001:10942: spyad bya spyod byed med par lhun gyis grub pa
NK054(yi)001:10944: mi 'gag pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi rten du gyur pas na sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:10945: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku ni gong du bshad
NK054(yi)001:10946: pa de lta bu'i don la gzhal bya phyi nang
NK054(yi)001:10947: gi chos thams cad sems rig pa nyid rang snang
NK054(yi)001:10949: snang stong gi mtha' dang bral ba ni gong gi don nyid de /
NK054(yi)001:10950: chos thams cad rang rig pa'i mngon sum du bsal
NK054(yi)001:10951: spangs med par mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral bas
NK054(yi)001:10952: kyang / rang snang mi 'gag pa lhun gyis grub
NK054(yi)001:10953: pa'i ngo bor gsal ba ni mngon par byang chub
NK054(yi)001:10954: kyang / pa'i sku'o // dgongs pa de nyid las /
NK054(yi)001:10955: sprul pa'i sku ni gdul bya'i snang ba ste sa
NK054(yi)001:10956: la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'og
NK054(yi)001:10958: sprul sku mtho dman gyi bye brag thams cad chos sku las mi gzhan bzhin du snang /
NK054(yi)001:10959: snang yang chos sku las ma g.yos pa ni sprul pa zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:10960: de'i gtan tshigs ni ngo bo ma grub bzhin du snang /
NK054(yi)001:10962: glo bur du snang la cir yang 'char ba'i phyir na sprul pa zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:10963: rdo rje sku ni mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis 'gro
NK054(yi)001:10964: don rgyun mi chad par mdzad pa'i dus su dgongs
NK054(yi)001:10965: pa chos kyi sku las mi g.yo bar /
NK054(yi)001:10966: gdul bya'i don gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bas /
NK054(yi)001:10967: 'gyur ba med pa'i don gyi rdo rje'o //
NK054(yi)001:10968: phrin las ji ltar mdzad kyang mdzad pa bskyar mi
NK054(yi)001:10969: dgos par skad cig ma la lhun gyis grub kyang
NK054(yi)001:10970: 'dul byed 'du shes zad pas der 'dzin gyi rtog
NK054(yi)001:10972: de ni 'dul byed kyi don 'joms pa'i don gyis rdo rje /
NK054(yi)001:10973: mi 'gyur ba dang 'joms pa gnyis dbyer mi phyed pa'i don gyis rdo rje ste /
NK054(yi)001:10974: de nyid chos skur lhun gyis grub pas yon tan thams cad kyi rten du gyur pas sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:10975: ston pa kun tu bzang po'i sku zung 'jug gi
NK054(yi)001:10976: ngo bo nyid ni sku lnga lhun gyis grub pas
NK054(yi)001:10977: sku phyag rgya chen po las kyang mchog tu gyur
NK054(yi)001:10978: pa zhes bya'o // de lta bu'i lhun grub kyi
NK054(yi)001:10979: ye shes sems dpa' de ni 'bras bu'i yon tan
NK054(yi)001:10980: thams cad kyi gazhi'am rtsa ba lta bu ste /
NK054(yi)001:10981: mdor bsdu na phyi nang gi chos thams cad snang
NK054(yi)001:10982: stong gnyis su med pa lhag pa chos sku nyid
NK054(yi)001:10984: de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang //
NK054(yi)001:10985: zhes pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhi sems kyi chos
NK054(yi)001:10986: nyid ma bcos pa de nyid rtogs pa mthar phyin
NK054(yi)001:10987: pa'i chos sku / rang gsal gyi ngo bo nyid
NK054(yi)001:10988: du bzhugs pas na de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:10989: zhes kyang bya ste chos sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:10991: thun mong gi sangs rgyas ltar mnyam bzhag dang rjes
NK054(yi)001:10992: thob dngos por ma grub bzhin gdul bya gzigs pa
NK054(yi)001:10993: dang / de'i dus dang 'dul ba'i thabs dang mdzad
NK054(yi)001:10994: pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa 'du shes kyi rgyud
NK054(yi)001:10995: kyis bzung nas bsgrub pa lta bu ma yin te
NK054(yi)001:10996: dang / / dper na me long g.ya' dag pa mthar phyin na /
NK054(yi)001:10997: rkyen lta ba po dang 'dzom pa'i dus su gzugs brnyan shar ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:10998: ngo la dris khebs pa la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad sel ba rnams dus gcig la rdzogs kyang /
NK054(yi)001:10999: me long la der 'dzin gyi rtsol ba med pa bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:11000: rten gyi gang zag gi las kyi sgrib pa dag /
NK054(yi)001:11001: shes bya'i sgrib pa phra rags rnams dag nas yang
NK054(yi)001:11002: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK054(yi)001:11003: dus su / tha snyad tshig sbre ba'i dbang du byas na /
NK054(yi)001:11004: sems rang thog tu phyin ces bya ba yang de yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:11005: sems nyid chos skur gsal nas de nyid rang snang
NK054(yi)001:11006: mi 'gag pa me long g.yas dag pa dang 'dra
NK054(yi)001:11007: bar / gdul bya dbang po'i bye brag so so dang 'dzom pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:11008: gdul bya'i don thams cad lhun gyis grub pa thams
NK054(yi)001:11009: cad mkhyen pa la btsal ba'i g.yo ba mi mnga'
NK054(yi)001:11010: ba'o // kyang ni snang ba mi 'gag pa'i mgo 'dren no //
NK054(yi)001:11011: yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang //
NK054(yi)001:11013: 'khor ba las yang dag par thar pa ni mthong ba'i lam mngon du byas pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:11014: de la ni spang bya spong byed yod pas thar pa zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11015: yang dag pa zhes mi bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11016: bsgom lam dang mthar lam du yang dag pa gnyis zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:11017: zag med kyi lta ba la dam par 'dzin pa dag bsgom pa la dam par 'dzin pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:11018: zag med kyis shes par bya ba'i don yin pa las /
NK054(yi)001:11019: lam mtha'i dus sgrib pa rags la shes bya'i sgrib pa rags pa zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11020: der bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis goms goms pa'i stobs kyis je phra je phrar song ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:11021: bud+d+ha dang bla ma'i gdams ngag dang /
NK054(yi)001:11022: ji tsam dag pa bzhin du sa lam gong nas gong du skyed du song ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11023: sa bcu rgyun gyi tha ma la lta bsgom dbyer
NK054(yi)001:11024: med bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin phra ba'i phra ba
NK054(yi)001:11025: mnyam pa nyid la ldang dka' ba tsam /
NK054(yi)001:11026: da lta'i rnal 'byor gyi blos mi reg pa tha snyad brjod pa tsam yin pas so //
NK054(yi)001:11027: de lta bu'i yang dag pa'i thar pa gnyis ston
NK054(yi)001:11028: pa'i slob dpon ni gzugs sku dang bya ba longs
NK054(yi)001:11029: sku chen po ste 'og min na bzhugs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11032: de mthong ba'i skal ba med pa'i khams gsum gyi
NK054(yi)001:11033: 'gro ba drug gi sems can ma lus pa thams
NK054(yi)001:11034: cad 'dul ba'i ngo bo ni lha mi'i theg pa
NK054(yi)001:11037: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pas rim pa bzhin du
NK054(yi)001:11038: gong ma gong ma la sbyor nas gsang sngags su
NK054(yi)001:11039: zhugs te 'bras bu la sbyor ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11041: mthun par byas pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste ris
NK054(yi)001:11042: drug so so dang mthun pa'i ston pa'i mtho dman
NK054(yi)001:11044: sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba'i skabs su bshad pa dang mthun no //
NK054(yi)001:11045: mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11046: ston nyid sgyu ma mig yong tshul //
NK054(yi)001:11047: zhes pa kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:11048: chags tshul drug gi 'jig rten mthar thug pa med
NK054(yi)001:11049: pa'i gdul bya thams cad la sku gnyis kyi mdzad
NK054(yi)001:11050: pa snang ba bstan tsam nyid ni snang tshul gyi
NK054(yi)001:11051: dpe / sgyu ma mig yor tshul zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11052: sgyu ma ni rgyu sgyu ma'i rdzas dang /
NK054(yi)001:11053: rdo dang shig bu la sogs pa la /
NK054(yi)001:11054: rkyen sgyu ma'i sbyor sngags btab pas /
NK054(yi)001:11055: sgyu ma'i rta dang glang po che dang /
NK054(yi)001:11056: bud med kyi tshogs su snang bas lta ba po'i
NK054(yi)001:11057: mig gi dgos pa skong bar byed cing chags sdang
NK054(yi)001:11058: bskyed pa'i bya ba byed kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11059: ngo bo la grub pa med pa bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:11060: 'dir sprul pa'i sku snang ba yang thams cad mkhyen
NK054(yi)001:11061: pa'i lhun grub kyi ye shes gang du yang ma
NK054(yi)001:11062: grub / cir yang mi 'gag par snang ba'i sgyu
NK054(yi)001:11063: la sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis bstangs pa
NK054(yi)001:11064: grub / dang / rkyen gdul bya'i las mtho dman
NK054(yi)001:11065: gyi dbang gis longs sku dang sprul sku'i mtho dman
NK054(yi)001:11066: gyi bye brag rnams snang nas /
NK054(yi)001:11067: gdul bya'i blo'i dgos pa skong ste rim gyis 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11068: ngo bo sems nyid kyi ngang la ma grub pa'i dpe bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:11069: mig yor ni grib ma ste lus la brten te grib ma byung bas /
NK054(yi)001:11070: blo shed ma bye ba'i byis pa dag dga' ba
NK054(yi)001:11071: dang skrag pa sna tshogs byed kyang ngo bo la
NK054(yi)001:11072: ma grub pa bzhin gong du bstan pa'i rgyu rkyen
NK054(yi)001:11074: bud+d+ha'i sprul sku sna tshogs bdag tu 'dzin pa dang
NK054(yi)001:11075: bcas pa'i stobs kyis snang ba ste blo ngos khrid
NK054(yi)001:11076: pa'i lam sna tshogs byed kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11077: sems nyid kyi ngang la ma dmigs so //
NK054(yi)001:11078: de ltar min pa'i gzugs sku gnyis nang du yang lhag /
NK054(yi)001:11079: gcig gis sprul sku kha mig rna ba can 'gro
NK054(yi)001:11080: ba'i rgyud ltar rang rgyud du snang bar lta ba
NK054(yi)001:11082: tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med //
NK054(yi)001:11083: ces pa rmi lam sgyu ma mig yor gyi tshul du snang ba nyid na /
NK054(yi)001:11084: dbyings las g.yos pa med ces pa //
NK054(yi)001:11085: sprul pa'i sku'i bye brag mdzad pa sna tshogs su snang ba nyid na /
NK054(yi)001:11086: sems rang byung gi ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK054(yi)001:11087: dbyings las g.yo bya g.yo byed kyi rtsol ba rdul
NK054(yi)001:11088: phra rab tsam yang med de /
NK054(yi)001:11089: sems mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings so //
NK054(yi)001:11090: 'o na ngo bo de med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i stong pa nyid las snang bas /
NK054(yi)001:11091: stong pa nyid la snang bya snang byed ma dmigs
NK054(yi)001:11092: pa'i dbang gis rtsol bar byas song bar dogs pa
NK054(yi)001:11093: las / ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i //
NK054(yi)001:11094: zhes pa mnyam pa nyid sems rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:11095: shes kyi ngang las ma dmigs kyang snang ba mi
NK054(yi)001:11098: chos thams cad yul sems snod bcud mi 'dra ba sna tshogs rnams snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:11099: de yang blo'i rim pa dang mthun pa bzhin du snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:11100: gdul bya'i las kyi snang ba kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:11102: de tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la //
NK054(yi)001:11104: de ltar ma 'gag pa sprul sku snang ba de'i tshe /
NK054(yi)001:11105: gdul bya 'gro ba drug na ris mi mthun pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11106: 'gro drug re re'i nang na yang dbang po mtho dman gyi bye brag mi mthun pa mang ste /
NK054(yi)001:11109: gdul bya de lta bu la /
NK054(yi)001:11110: so sor 'dra bar snang ba ni //
NK054(yi)001:11111: zhes pa gdul bya so so la rang gi blo rtog dang mthun pa'i ston pa snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:11112: lha la tshangs pa dang brgya byin lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11113: mi la 'khor los sgyur ba dang sh+aakya thub pa lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11114: lha ma yin la thag bzang ris lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11115: yi dwags la kha 'bar ma lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11116: byol song la yi dam brtan lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11117: dmyal ba la chos kyi rgyal po lta bur snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:11118: de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang //
NK054(yi)001:11119: zhes pa de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings chos kyi sku la snang bya snang byed dam /
NK054(yi)001:11120: g.yo bya g.yo byed bral yang /
NK054(yi)001:11121: gdul bya rang gi bsags pa'i las mtho dman gyi
NK054(yi)001:11122: dbang gis 'dul byed kyang rang blo dang mthun par
NK054(yi)001:11123: snang ngo // rgyas par bshad pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11124: dper na me long chu zla bzhin //
NK054(yi)001:11125: zhes pa dper na me long g.ya' dag pa gzugs brnyan gyi rgyun du zhugs pa la /
NK054(yi)001:11126: lta ba pos bltas pas mthun par snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:11129: bem po la bem po de bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:11130: de bzhin nyid chos sku las ma g.yos par mthun par snang ba /
NK054(yi)001:11131: byang chub sems dpa' la longs sku /
NK054(yi)001:11132: 'gro drug dag pa la sh+aakya thub pa lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11133: ma dag pa la mthun snang du bya dang ri bong yan chad do //
NK054(yi)001:11134: 'gro 'ong med par khyab pa ni chu zla'i dpe ste /
NK054(yi)001:11135: dper na nam mkha' la zla ba gcig pa la
NK054(yi)001:11136: chu tha dad pa ci yod kyi nang na zla
NK054(yi)001:11137: ba shar te / 'gro 'ong bral bar nam mkha'i
NK054(yi)001:11138: zla ba snang ba dang chu nang gi zla ba
NK054(yi)001:11139: ba shar te / dus mtshungs so // de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:11140: du 'dul byed kyang 'gro 'ong bral te gdul bya'i
NK054(yi)001:11141: mdun du skad cig la snang ste 'gro 'ong mi
NK054(yi)001:11142: mnga' ba ni gdul bya'i sems nyid chos sku yin
NK054(yi)001:11143: ba shar te / dus mtshungs so // pas phyir ro // de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la //
NK054(yi)001:11144: zhes pa dpe gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i 'dul byed gdul bya la snang ba'i tshul ni /
NK054(yi)001:11145: 'gro drug thams cad la zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11146: spyi khyab tu bstan te 'gro drug thams cad spyi khyab la /
NK054(yi)001:11147: sdig spong gzugs ni thub pa drug ste de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:11148: 'gro drug gi nang na mi lta bu la sdig spongs gzugs su rnam par bstan zer ba /
NK054(yi)001:11149: mi dge ba bcu spong zhing dge ba bcu la bkod pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o //
NK054(yi)001:11150: dge tshul ni nyan thos kyi rten gyi gang zag
NK054(yi)001:11151: rnams la de'i blo dang mthun pa'i dgra bcom pa
NK054(yi)001:11152: skyes bu zung bzhi dang ya brgyad do //
NK054(yi)001:11153: rang rgyal gyi rigs can rnams gcig pu na bsgom pas 'bras bu la sbyor ba yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:11154: bse ru ni gcig pur 'dug pa'i cha byad do //
NK054(yi)001:11156: dgar ba'i tshig ste bshad pa gong ma gsum las so //
NK054(yi)001:11158: 'og ma gsum las blar gyur pa gzhan don gtsor byed pas mchog go //
NK054(yi)001:11160: gdul bya'i blo'i rim pa bzhin gang la gang mos su ston te /
NK054(yi)001:11161: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can la sprul pa'i sku sh+aakya thub pa nyid lta bur snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:11162: kri ya'i rigs can la rigs gsum mam sh+aakya thub pa lta bur snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:11163: yo ga'i rigs can la rnam snang ngam rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur snang ngo //
NK054(yi)001:11164: de bzhin du gsang sngags rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11165: longs skus chos ston tshul ni /
NK054(yi)001:11166: 'og min bla med gnas mchog na //
NK054(yi)001:11167: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:11168: 'og min ni khams gsum gyi blar gyur pa ste
NK054(yi)001:11169: gnas gtsang ma rigs lnga'i ya tha 'og min no
NK054(yi)001:11170: // bla med ni khams gsum gyi blar gyur pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11171: lam pa zag med kyi gnas so //
NK054(yi)001:11172: gnas gtsang ma rigs lnga las mchog tu gyur pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11173: rnam snang bzhugs pas mchog go //
NK054(yi)001:11175: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul //
NK054(yi)001:11176: ces pa spyir thams cad mkhyen pas gdul bya'i ngo la snang ba 'dir /
NK054(yi)001:11178: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bzung ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11179: dngos ni rnam par snang mdzad longs sku chen po ste /
NK054(yi)001:11181: ston pa'i ngos nas 'di la 'di snang bar bya ba'i rtog pa mi mnga' yang /
NK054(yi)001:11182: lhun grub kyi ye shes cir yang 'char ba la me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar /
NK054(yi)001:11183: gdul bya zag med kyi lam pa rnams la ston
NK054(yi)001:11184: pa'i ngo bo chos sku las ma g.yos kyang rnam
NK054(yi)001:11185: snang gi tshul du snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11187: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la //
NK054(yi)001:11189: spyi lam lnga la byang chub kyi lam lnga yod kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11190: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' mthong lam pa yan chad dang /
NK054(yi)001:11191: sems dpa' bsgom lam pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11192: byang chub chen po mthar lam pa dang gsum la ni rnams zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11193: la ni de dag chos ston pa'i yul lo //
NK054(yi)001:11195: de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste /
NK054(yi)001:11196: zhes pa sprul pa'i sku'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin
NK054(yi)001:11197: du gsung dbyangs yan lag gsum brgya drug cu'i sgo
NK054(yi)001:11198: nas tshig gis bajoda pa mi mnga' ba la ni
NK054(yi)001:11199: gsung mchog mi smra ste zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11201: sku yis chos rnams 'jam bar ston //
NK054(yi)001:11204: mdo sde rang gzhung gi chos ston tshul ni /
NK054(yi)001:11206: de bzhin gshegs pa la las ni spyan phye bas chos ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11207: la las ni btsum pas ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11208: la las ni phyag brkyang pas ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11209: la las ni phyag bskum pas ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11210: la las ni btsun mo dang bcas pas ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11211: la las ni btsun mo med pas chos ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11212: la las ni ser bu'i ngad kyis chos ston to //
NK054(yi)001:11213: la las ni ljon shing gi dri ngad dang gzugs
NK054(yi)001:11214: kyis chos ston to zhes pa la sogs pa ste
NK054(yi)001:11215: / zhing khams kyi mdzad pa rnams kyis /
NK054(yi)001:11216: ting nge 'dzin gong nas gong du rtsal rdzogs shing
NK054(yi)001:11217: shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong ba chos nyams su myong
NK054(yi)001:11218: ba'i ngo bo'o // gsang sngags kyi gzhung 'dir ni
NK054(yi)001:11219: 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i rang byung gi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:11220: ston pas kun tu bzang po'i ngang las yul dang
NK054(yi)001:11221: yul can med pa rig pa nyid sku /
NK054(yi)001:11222: sku nyid rig pa sku bem bem po gcig la
NK054(yi)001:11223: rig pa gsal gsal po gcig nang na yod pa
NK054(yi)001:11224: ma yin te / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK054(yi)001:11225: kyang rig par gsal bas gnyis can mi mnga' ste
NK054(yi)001:11226: ma yin te / / 'on kyang 'khor byang chub
NK054(yi)001:11227: sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo la lta ba'i ngos nas
NK054(yi)001:11228: dbyer med yin pa tsam shes kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11229: nyams myong gi ngos nas ston pa dang 'khor so sor yod /
NK054(yi)001:11230: 'khor gyi shes bya'i sgrib pa bsal bya bsal byed
NK054(yi)001:11231: yod pas ston pa la re ba dang bcas pa'i
NK054(yi)001:11232: 'khor gyi ngos nas 'brel ba'i ngo bo'o //
NK054(yi)001:11234: sku yi chos rnams mjal bar ston //
NK054(yi)001:11235: ces ston pa'i thugs rig pa sku dang dbyer med pa nyid /
NK054(yi)001:11236: gdul bya la ye khyab chen por bzhugs pas mi khyab pa'i dus med pa /
NK054(yi)001:11237: chu dang gsher ba dag 'dra bar gdul bya dang mi phyed de /
NK054(yi)001:11238: 'on kyang gdul bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ston pa'i sku la bltas pas /
NK054(yi)001:11239: rang rgyud mtho dman gang la gnas pa de bzhin du go zhing rtogs nas /
NK054(yi)001:11240: shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong bar byed /
NK054(yi)001:11241: sa lam gong nas gong du 'phel nas 'bras bu bud+d+ha la sbyor bar byed pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11242: chos rnams 'jal bar byed ces pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11243: 'khor gyi sgrib pa dag tshul ni /
NK054(yi)001:11244: me long bzhin bstan pa yi tshul //
NK054(yi)001:11246: dper na me long la bltas pas ngo'i skyon dang dri khebs thams cad rtogs nas /
NK054(yi)001:11247: skyon de dag bsal ba ltar ston pa'i sku la
NK054(yi)001:11248: bltas pas ston pa'i byin rlabs 'khor gyi rig pa
NK054(yi)001:11249: la shar te / rang ngo'i skyon rtogs te bsal ba ltar /
NK054(yi)001:11250: rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis shes bya'i sgrib pa
NK054(yi)001:11251: mthar 'dzin gyi skyon rig nas mthar lam bar du
NK054(yi)001:11252: sgrib pa phra rags thams cad dag par byed pa
NK054(yi)001:11253: ston pa'i sku dang thugs rang la shar nas ting
NK054(yi)001:11254: nge 'dzin gyi skyon thams cad sel bar byed pa
NK054(yi)001:11255: la ni mdog ngan thams cad sel zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11256: ston pa'i sku la bltas pas 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon sel ba 'di la /
NK054(yi)001:11257: gsung sgros gcig la 'khor gyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas /
NK054(yi)001:11258: ston pa'i ljags kyis zhal spyi khebs pa mthong /
NK054(yi)001:11259: des chos thams cad brjod pa dang bral bar rtogs /
NK054(yi)001:11261: de'i don gyis chos thams cad blta bya lta byed med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs /
NK054(yi)001:11262: de la sogs te mtshan dpe rnams la bltas pas
NK054(yi)001:11263: rtogs pa skye bar bshad pa gong ma rnams kyi
NK054(yi)001:11264: gsung sgros so // 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na //
NK054(yi)001:11265: zhes pa 'khor bo d+hi sat+wa rnams kyis de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:11266: gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la bltas
NK054(yi)001:11267: nas bcu pa'i bo d+hi sa t+wa'i /
NK054(yi)001:11268: byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med //
NK054(yi)001:11269: zhes pa byang chub kyi sgrib pa'i ngo bo ni /
NK054(yi)001:11270: byang chub sems dpa' lam pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i
NK054(yi)001:11271: shes bya'i sgrib pa ni rten gyi ngos nas mtshon
NK054(yi)001:11272: pa'o // de nyid las 'bras bu la sgrib pa
NK054(yi)001:11273: ste byang chub ni go 'phang chen po ste chos
NK054(yi)001:11274: pa'o // sku'o // de nyid mngon du mi gsal bar byed pa'i sgrib pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11276: ma rig pas sa bcu pa rang gis kyang mi rtogs te /
NK054(yi)001:11277: sangs rgyas min pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa ste shin tu phra ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11278: 'o na byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar rtogs zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:11279: me long bzhin du sku la snang //
NK054(yi)001:11280: zhes pa me long gis ma smras te bltas pas /
NK054(yi)001:11281: bzhin gyi skyon thams cad sel ba bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:11282: sku la bltas nas zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11283: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpas ston pa'i sku
NK054(yi)001:11284: la bltas pa nyid kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa rang
NK054(yi)001:11285: dag ste / de yang dag tshul ni /
NK054(yi)001:11286: ston pa'i sku ni rig pa rang snang gi sku yin pa gong du bstan pa bzhin pas /
NK054(yi)001:11287: mtha' dang bral ba'i rang byung gi ye shes kyi sku yin pas phyogs 'dzin dang bral la /
NK054(yi)001:11288: byang chub sems dpa'i lus smon lam gyis grub pa
NK054(yi)001:11289: skye 'jig can du 'dug pas kyang don de lta
NK054(yi)001:11290: bu rig pas 'du shes phra ba'i 'dzin pa dang
NK054(yi)001:11291: bral bas sgrib pa rtogs pa dang byang ba dus
NK054(yi)001:11292: gcig go // ston pa'i sku la mnyam par ma
NK054(yi)001:11293: bzhag pa mi mnga' bas mdzad pa thams cad kyang
NK054(yi)001:11295: de nyid rig pa skad cig la rdzogs la /
NK054(yi)001:11296: de'i ngos nas shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba 'du shes dag la /
NK054(yi)001:11297: de'i don gyis mnyam pa chen po mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11298: des na ston pa'i sku la bltas pas /
NK054(yi)001:11299: ston pa'i byin rlabs dang rang gi shes rab gnyis 'dzom pas /
NK054(yi)001:11300: rang rig mnyam pa chen po'i don mngon du 'gyur
NK054(yi)001:11301: bas shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba dag pa ni
NK054(yi)001:11302: / ston pa'i sku la bltas pa'i byin rlabs kyis dag pas sku la snang zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11304: de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byang //
NK054(yi)001:11306: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:11307: ston pa'i sku la bltas pas rtogs pa skye ste shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pa la snyeg go //
NK054(yi)001:11309: sa bcu pa'i byang chub kho na ste gzhan gcad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11311: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes bya'i sgrib
NK054(yi)001:11312: pa rigs shing rtogs par dka' ba rkang dang dbril
NK054(yi)001:11313: nyal ba lta bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi
NK054(yi)001:11314: mthong ba la sgrib pa'i skyon ni /
NK054(yi)001:11315: rim gyis 'byong skad pa rim smos pa ni rags pa'i rim pa ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:11316: phra ba'i rim pa skad cig ma dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa lta bu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11317: gsang sngags kyi sgo nas nas ni dbang gis dag pa le'u gnyis par smos pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:11318: de bas mdo sde nas kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11319: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bud+d+ha'i
NK054(yi)001:11320: sa la nges pa kho nar dbang gis 'gro ste
NK054(yi)001:11321: zhes pas / gsang sngags mdo sde dang thun mong yin pa /
NK054(yi)001:11322: mdo sde'i gzhung las kar gshegs pa las /
NK054(yi)001:11323: byin gyis brlabs gnyis kyis brlabs pas /
NK054(yi)001:11324: byang chub sems dpa' dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs shing dri ba dri'o //
NK054(yi)001:11326: ting nge 'dzin gyis byin rlabs dang /
NK054(yi)001:11327: sku dang zhal phyag gis dbang bskur ba'i byin rlabs so //
NK054(yi)001:11328: byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po pa la ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK054(yi)001:11329: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen
NK054(yi)001:11330: po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba la 'jug
NK054(yi)001:11331: ste / zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:11332: gshegs pa rnams kyis zhal ston to zhes gsungs so
NK054(yi)001:11333: ste / // yang sa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rtog par khong du chud de /
NK054(yi)001:11334: chos kyi sprin gyis thob bo //
NK054(yi)001:11335: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal dang phyag gis dbang bskur ro zhes 'byung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:11336: de la mtshan nyid kyi gzhung du yang sa bcu
NK054(yi)001:11337: mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs bcu'i
NK054(yi)001:11338: bud+d+ha thams cad longs skur snang nas dbang bskur te
NK054(yi)001:11339: / de'i thabs rgyas par bshad pa gzhan du shes /
NK054(yi)001:11340: de nas sa bcu pa dag dbang rim par khong
NK054(yi)001:11341: du chud nas spang bya shes bya'i sgrib pa phra
NK054(yi)001:11342: ba'i phra ba'ang mi gnas par dag pa kho na'o
NK054(yi)001:11343: // de kun tu 'od kyi sa la nges par gnas pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:11344: bla med byang chub yang dag thob //
NK054(yi)001:11346: bla med ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhung gis sam mthar phyin pa kun tu 'od yin pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11349: spang bya thams cad spangs pa mthar phyin pa ni byang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11350: mkhyen pa'i ye shes gnyis rgyas pa mthar phyin pa chub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11351: de ltar mngon du gyur pa'i dus su spang thob
NK054(yi)001:11352: kyi mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i ngo bo
NK054(yi)001:11353: nyid du gyur nas de tsam gyi 'dzin pa yang
NK054(yi)001:11354: mi mnga' ba la ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o
NK054(yi)001:11355: // thob bya 'thob byed med pa'i don mngon du gyur /
NK054(yi)001:11356: 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa thams cad bral /
NK054(yi)001:11357: rig pa rang gsal lhun gyis grub pa la ni tha snyad tsam du thob pa zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11358: 'bras bu thun mong gi sa gsum ni /
NK054(yi)001:11359: chos sku dpag med brjod du med /
NK054(yi)001:11360: ces pa chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rgyu las ma byung /
NK054(yi)001:11362: skye 'jig med pa skye med nam mkha' lta bu'i
NK054(yi)001:11363: don blos 'di lta bu'i zhes dpag tu med cing
NK054(yi)001:11364: / tshig gi tha snyad ji skad brjod kyang don
NK054(yi)001:11365: la reg par mi nus pa'i ngo bo ni chos
NK054(yi)001:11366: / sku'o // de gdul bya la snang ba'i zag
NK054(yi)001:11367: med kyi lam pa rnams kyi ston pa longs spyod
NK054(yi)001:11368: rdzogs pa rigs lnga'i cha lugs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11369: 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnam pa lnga dang ldan zhing
NK054(yi)001:11370: rgyan bdun rdzogs pa ni longs spyod kyi mtshan nyid
NK054(yi)001:11371: do // de nyid che ba'i yon tan thams cad
NK054(yi)001:11372: zad pa med par lhun gyis grub pa ni yid
NK054(yi)001:11373: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra bas
NK054(yi)001:11374: do // rin chen / ma tshang ba med pas na gter zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11375: gdul bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgos pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11376: yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhung gis longs sku ni sprul sku snang ba'i gzhi yin zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:11377: 'gro drug gi dgos pa skong ba'i sprul pa zad pa med pas zad med /
NK054(yi)001:11378: gang la gang dgos ma tshang ba med pas gter /
NK054(yi)001:11380: sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab //
NK054(yi)001:11382: sprul pa ni snang bzhin ma grub pas cir yang 'gyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11383: grangs bye ba ni mang ba'i tshad do //
NK054(yi)001:11384: gdul bya'i blo ngo bzhin du snang bas bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11385: gsang sngags kyis gsum bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11386: thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog /
NK054(yi)001:11388: thabs ni gzhi la gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje
NK054(yi)001:11389: chos thams cad la khyab pa de rtogs pa mthar
NK054(yi)001:11390: phyin pa mngon du byas pas /
NK054(yi)001:11391: de'i don la gdul bya thams cad nyid las mi gzhan zhing /
NK054(yi)001:11392: me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin yul du ma grub par rang snang ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:11393: thugs rje shar ba dang mdzad pa'i phrin las rnams
NK054(yi)001:11394: rig pa skad cig la rdzogs pa ni ma 'gag
NK054(yi)001:11395: pas thabs yin te don de la ni /
NK054(yi)001:11396: gsang sngags kyi lugs kyi gdul bya thams cad nyid las mi gzhan pa ni ji snyed mkhyen pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11397: mkhyen bya mkhyen byed kyi rtogs pa las grol ba ni ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11398: des na mkhyen pa gnyis dus gcig tu rdzogs so //
NK054(yi)001:11400: de ltar gdul bya thams cad nyid las mi gzhan pas bdag nyid chen po'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:11401: yul du mi dmigs te 'du shes thams cad dang bral bas cis kyang gos pa med la /
NK054(yi)001:11402: thabs shes rab dbyer med pa'i sa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11403: kun tu 'od spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bar dmigs pa la ltos na /
NK054(yi)001:11404: sa'i mchog ste mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid gsang sngags kyi kun tu 'od do //
NK054(yi)001:11405: de nyid du skad cig ma de nyid la yi ge 'khor lo'i sa rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:11406: mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs //
NK054(yi)001:11407: zhes pa don de nyid la thun mong gi mtshan dang dpe byad /
NK054(yi)001:11408: phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang ru sbal zhabs //
NK054(yi)001:11409: la sogs pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la yang yod /
NK054(yi)001:11410: sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan dpe yin /
NK054(yi)001:11411: 'dir ni 'og ma gnyis po gang dang yang thun
NK054(yi)001:11412: mong ma yin pa khyad par gyi mtshan dpe ste
NK054(yi)001:11413: / gong du sa mchog mngon du gyur pa ni
NK054(yi)001:11414: 'khor 'das thams cad rang rig pa'i ngo bor lhun
NK054(yi)001:11415: gyis grub pa gdengs chud pas rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:11416: shes ma 'gag pa'i rtsal las me long lta bu
NK054(yi)001:11417: la sogs pa ye shes bzhir shar /
NK054(yi)001:11418: ye shes dmigs pa thams cad dang bral zhing phyogs
NK054(yi)001:11419: su 'dzin pa med pas ye shes bsam gyis mi
NK054(yi)001:11421: de yang me long lta bu'i ye shes gzhi ma
NK054(yi)001:11422: yin pas chos dbyings ye shes mnyam pa nyid so
NK054(yi)001:11423: sor rtogs pa bya grub bzhir shar /
NK054(yi)001:11424: mnyam nyid ye shes gzhi ma las me long lta
NK054(yi)001:11425: bu chos dbyings ye shes kun rtogs bya grub bzhir
NK054(yi)001:11426: shar / shar tshul 'gre bas sor rtogs bya grub ye shes la yang bzhi bzhir shar /
NK054(yi)001:11427: de'i rtsa ba bzhi po ma gtogs pa'i yan lag bzhi cha bzhi la bcu drug /
NK054(yi)001:11428: ye shes bcu drug ma 'gag par snang ba'i rtags su sems dpa' bcu drug /
NK054(yi)001:11429: yul chos kyi dbyings la du ma med kyang ye
NK054(yi)001:11430: shes kyi ngos nas yul dbyings bcu drug ma 'gag
NK054(yi)001:11431: par snang ba'i rtags sems ma bcu drug /
NK054(yi)001:11432: yab yum bcu drug cha gnyis la sum cu rtsa gnyis te /
NK054(yi)001:11433: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan sum bcu gnyis so //
NK054(yi)001:11434: thabs kyi cha sems dpa' bcu drug /
NK054(yi)001:11435: de re re la'ang ye shes lnga lnga dang ldan
NK054(yi)001:11436: pa'i rtags su dbu rgyan rigs lnga lnga yod de
NK054(yi)001:11437: / lnga tsho bcu drug brtsis pas brgyad cu ste dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o //
NK054(yi)001:11439: thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dpe rnams rdzogs na /
NK054(yi)001:11440: thun mong gi mtshan dpe rnams smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:11441: spyod yul kun tu man+da la //
NK054(yi)001:11442: zhes pa yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa ste /
NK054(yi)001:11443: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rig pa'i ye shes su rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:11444: de nyid chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas spyod yul
NK054(yi)001:11445: thams cad ma 'gag pa sku'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs
NK054(yi)001:11446: / de las ma gtogs pa'i tha snyad phra ba'ang
NK054(yi)001:11447: mi gnas pa ni yul dang yul can ma dmigs
NK054(yi)001:11448: pa'i bdag nyid chen por rdzogs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11449: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol //
NK054(yi)001:11451: dgongs pa'i ngo bo skur ma 'gag par snang ba bsod nams kyi tshogs /
NK054(yi)001:11452: tha snyad thams cad dang bral ba ma dmigs pa'i ngo bo ni ye shes kyi tshogs /
NK054(yi)001:11453: de gnyis dbyer med pas snang stong gi phyogs 'dzin dang bral te chen po zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11454: 'dir rgyu las byung ba lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:11455: snang stong dbyer med pa rang byung gi ye shes su gsal bas chen po'o //
NK054(yi)001:11456: de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i don gyis kyang chen po'o //
NK054(yi)001:11457: rdzogs pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11458: rol pa ni yul dang yul can med par rang snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11459: de la sogs pa ni gong ma'i yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyis brjod pa nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:11460: mtha' yas mchog ni sku dang ye shes rang snang
NK054(yi)001:11461: ba'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bgrang ba las 'das
NK054(yi)001:11462: pa bstan pa'o // sku lnga bsdus pa dang bcas pa bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11463: skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku //
NK054(yi)001:11465: chos kyi sku ni gong du bshad pa bzhin rgyu
NK054(yi)001:11466: rkyen dang bral ba'i rang byung gi ye shes skad
NK054(yi)001:11467: cig mas ma gos pa ni skye med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11468: de nyid dus thog mthar mi 'gyur ba'i don gyis g.yung drung zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11469: bla ma gong ma kha shas kyis ri rab kyi
NK054(yi)001:11470: khong pa na g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i gzugs gcig yod
NK054(yi)001:11471: pa de bar gyi bskal pa gcig la mi 'gyur
NK054(yi)001:11473: bla ma bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal nas /
NK054(yi)001:11474: zhang zhung gi skad kyi nam mkha' la g.yung drung zer ba yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:11475: nam mkha' thog mthar mi 'gyur ba ltar mtshon pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11476: sku ni yon tan thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11479: nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas /
NK054(yi)001:11480: zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur //
NK054(yi)001:11482: longs spyod chen po'i sku ni /
NK054(yi)001:11483: nyon mongs pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can no //
NK054(yi)001:11484: de'i zhing ni gnas gsum mo //
NK054(yi)001:11485: der gnas pa'i ngo bo ni rig pa rang byung
NK054(yi)001:11486: gi ye shes sems kyi chos nyid 'khor ba'i chos
NK054(yi)001:11487: thams cad la khyab pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pas
NK054(yi)001:11488: / ma 'gag par snang ba'i yul drug gi spyod
NK054(yi)001:11489: yul du gyur pa thams cad rang snang la rang
NK054(yi)001:11490: rol pa ni 'khor ba'i chos thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:11491: rig pa byang chub sems su lhun gyis grub pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i longs spyod do //
NK054(yi)001:11492: de gnyis dbyer med pa yul gcig la rol pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:11493: de nyid kyi ngang la zad mi shes pa'i gter du gyur ces pas /
NK054(yi)001:11494: gdul bya'i las dang nyon mongs pa sbyong ba'i gnas
NK054(yi)001:11495: sam rten sprul pa'i sku gdul bya ci tsam pa
NK054(yi)001:11496: de tsam du 'dul byed snang ba'i 'byung khungs yin
NK054(yi)001:11498: rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku //
NK054(yi)001:11500: 'khor 'das snang stong snod bcud chos can gyi dngos
NK054(yi)001:11501: po thams cad gang snang yang sems nyid rang rig
NK054(yi)001:11503: chos sems dbyer med pa'i ngang las snang stong dbyer
NK054(yi)001:11504: mi phyed pa nyid kyis chos can gyi dngos po
NK054(yi)001:11505: thams cad de nyid du 'joms shing rang gi ngo
NK054(yi)001:11506: bo nyid gzhig tu med la de gnyis mi phyed
NK054(yi)001:11508: rang rig pa de'i ngang du lhun gyis grub pa 'dzin pa ni 'char ba zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11509: gang gi rig pa rdo rje lta bu'i don de
NK054(yi)001:11510: dang ldan pa ni rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ste
NK054(yi)001:11512: thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku //
NK054(yi)001:11513: zhes pa mngon par byang chub pa'i sku ste /
NK054(yi)001:11514: phung po khams skye mched snang grags kyi chos thams cad dbyer med ces pa /
NK054(yi)001:11515: rang rig pa'i ngang la yul sems snang stong gi 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11516: mnyam pa ni chos thams cad rig par lhun gyis grub pa'i don gyis dngos su grub pa med /
NK054(yi)001:11517: de dag dngos po med pa'i stong pa'i stong pa
NK054(yi)001:11518: nyid kyang dag pa ni mnyam pa zhes bya ste
NK054(yi)001:11519: / don la 'khor 'das thams cad rig par gsal
NK054(yi)001:11520: ba la gnyis 'dzin mi gnas pas de'i ngang la
NK054(yi)001:11522: mi 'dzin pa ye shes su gsal ba ni rang
NK054(yi)001:11523: rig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa mngon par byang
NK054(yi)001:11524: chub pa'i sku'o // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku //
NK054(yi)001:11526: sprul pa'i sku ste gdul bya thams cad 'dul ba'i dus dang /
NK054(yi)001:11530: thams cad ma 'gag par skad cig gcig la mkhyen
NK054(yi)001:11531: pa las mi 'da' bar ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye
NK054(yi)001:11532: shes ma 'dres pa kho nar snang ba'i phyir ye
NK054(yi)001:11535: de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs //
NK054(yi)001:11537: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i don gyis bshad
NK054(yi)001:11538: pa'i sku rnams rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma la sku
NK054(yi)001:11539: lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu mthar phyin pa
NK054(yi)001:11540: zhes bya'o // zhes ston pa kun tu bzang pos
NK054(yi)001:11541: go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa zhes
NK054(yi)001:11542: zhes bya'o // bya'o // dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i che ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:11543: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas /
NK054(yi)001:11544: zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11545: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ni bshad pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:11546: mtha' yas pa ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam pas gzhal du med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11547: mu med pa ni 'di kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:11549: thams cad du ni phyogs so //
NK054(yi)001:11550: dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11551: spyir rtog pa brjod kyis mi lang /
NK054(yi)001:11552: de rang snang ba'i sku dang ye shes brjod kyis
NK054(yi)001:11553: mi lang ba de ston pa kun tu bzang pos
NK054(yi)001:11554: rgyud gsungs pa'i nyi mas dngos po thams cad gsal
NK054(yi)001:11557: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor du
NK054(yi)001:11558: lhun gyis grub pa'i bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil
NK054(yi)001:11559: 'khor grangs brjod kyis mi lang ba 'jig rten gyi
NK054(yi)001:11560: khams thams cad rdul phra rab tu bsil ba'i rdul
NK054(yi)001:11561: snyed du / dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur to zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11562: gdul bya dag pa'i snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11563: le'u bsdu ba'i lo rgyus ni /
NK054(yi)001:11565: de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11566: de nas ni tshig don gnyis ka bshad pa'i rjes thog go //
NK054(yi)001:11568: phun sum tshogs pa'i gtso 'khor 'dzom pa thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:11569: btsun mo'i tshogs kyang de dag gi yum rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:11570: gnyis su med pa ni don dbyings dang ye shes rtags thabs dang shes rab /
NK054(yi)001:11571: lha yab yum gnyis su med par lhan cig pa'i
NK054(yi)001:11572: gtso 'khor de dag nyid kyi thugs la brnag pa'i
NK054(yi)001:11573: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po mtshon pa'i tshig 'og
NK054(yi)001:11575: sku lnga gsung lnga thugs lnga yon tan lnga phrin
NK054(yi)001:11576: las lnga dbyer med pa rdo rje lta bu las
NK054(yi)001:11577: / rang snang mi 'gag par snang ba byung ngo zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11578: a rang bzhin gsal ba'i snying po'i don /
NK054(yi)001:11579: hoh des mtshon par byed pa'i rjod byed kyi tshig ngo mtshar bas dgyes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11581: dmigs bya dmigs byed ma dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab //
NK054(yi)001:11583: 'dir snod bcud kyi chos thams cad rang rig pa
NK054(yi)001:11584: rang byung gi ye shes su gsal ba'i don mngon
NK054(yi)001:11586: dmigs bya'i yul chos kyi dbyings su 'dzin pa sems
NK054(yi)001:11587: ye shes chen po'i ngang la dmigs pa ye shes
NK054(yi)001:11588: nyid kyi rang gi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings yin
NK054(yi)001:11589: pas / dmigs bya'i yul tsam gyi yang tha snyad las dad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11590: dmigs byed ni rig pa'i ye shes te /
NK054(yi)001:11591: chos thams cad rig pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i bdag
NK054(yi)001:11592: nyid la yul dang yul can med pas ye shes
NK054(yi)001:11595: dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid lhun gyis grub rig pa
NK054(yi)001:11596: rang gsal du grub pas yul dang yul can tha
NK054(yi)001:11597: snyad tsam yang ma dmigs te /
NK054(yi)001:11598: spyod yul dang bral ba rang gsal ba ni mi dmigs zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11599: don de la ni rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11600: lung a nu yo ga'i dbyings dang ye shes tsam
NK054(yi)001:11601: du yang mtshon pa las 'das pa la ma 'dres
NK054(yi)001:11602: yongs rdzogs tsam du yang 'dzin pa med pa ni
NK054(yi)001:11604: don de la ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11605: ched byas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid rang gsal
NK054(yi)001:11606: la gyi ngo bo nyid la gzhi rten bral bas
NK054(yi)001:11608: nam mkha' nam mkha' bsam du med pa'i dgongs pa la ni /
NK054(yi)001:11610: ye shes rang rig dkyil 'a khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11611: de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo la rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:11612: shes ni chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs yin
NK054(yi)001:11613: la / chos kyi dbyings ni snod bcud kyi chos
NK054(yi)001:11614: thams cad kyi bdag nyid pas de rang snang ba'i
NK054(yi)001:11615: snod bcud kyi chos phung po khams dang skye mched
NK054(yi)001:11616: rtog pa'i tshogs rnams 'bras bu theg pa'i skabs 'dir
NK054(yi)001:11617: la / / gnyen pos ma bcos par ma dmigs pa rtogs pa rang byung gi ye shes /
NK054(yi)001:11618: ye shes lnga'i 'khor dang bcas par gsal la /
NK054(yi)001:11619: skabs 'dir rang snang tsam mi 'gog pa'i dbang gis
NK054(yi)001:11620: rang snang ba tsam rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK054(yi)001:11621: su lhun gyis grub pa'ang yin pa'i don rig pa
NK054(yi)001:11623: de gnyis kyang res mos tsam phan tshun ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:11624: chu dang gsher ba ltar mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs nas /
NK054(yi)001:11625: thams cad der gsal ba las rang la rang snang
NK054(yi)001:11626: ba ma gtogs pa'i gzhan pa med pas rang rig
NK054(yi)001:11627: ces bya'o // de nyid ma 'gag pa rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal la /
NK054(yi)001:11628: ma dmigs pa'i ye shes bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal ba dbyer med pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11629: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
NK054(yi)001:11630: sna tshogs brjod mi lang zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11631: chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab tshad de kho nar gyur
NK054(yi)001:11632: pa me long g.ya' dag dang 'dra ba las gdul
NK054(yi)001:11633: bya las sna tshogs pa'i dbang gis rang rang gi
NK054(yi)001:11634: blo dang mthun pa'i gsang sngags phyi nang gi dkyil
NK054(yi)001:11635: 'khor dang sku gnyis kyi mdzad pa cir yang 'char
NK054(yi)001:11636: ba ni sna tshogs zhes bya la /
NK054(yi)001:11638: gdul bya brjod kyi mi lang ba khams gsum pa
NK054(yi)001:11639: dang lam pa thams cad kyi ngos nas brjod pa'o
NK054(yi)001:11640: // mnyam dang mi mnyam zhes pa la sogs /
NK054(yi)001:11641: mnyam pa ni dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid
NK054(yi)001:11642: kyi don mngon du gyur pa sangs rgyas rang ngo
NK054(yi)001:11643: la / chos kyi sku las 'khor ba ma dmigs pas mnyam pa nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:11644: mi mnyam pa ni chos thams cad ye nas de
NK054(yi)001:11645: ltar yin kyang lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pas
NK054(yi)001:11647: dper na skyes bu yengs pa dang 'dra bar bde sdug sna tshogs myong ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11648: 'o na der lam pa ma 'dus so zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:11649: zag pa med pa yan chad 'das par bsdu /
NK054(yi)001:11650: de man chad gzung 'dzin du bsdu /
NK054(yi)001:11652: sems nyid rig pa'i dbang gis 'khor 'das thams cad la khyab kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11653: khyab bya khyab byed med pa'i ngo bo la ni khyab med ces bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:11654: mya ngan 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
NK054(yi)001:11655: nyid yin kyang 'dir lta bu'i zhes ris su mi
NK054(yi)001:11656: phyed pa'o // 'khor ba'i chos thams cad la khyab kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11657: lhan skyes kyi dbang gis gzung 'dzin kho na'i ngo bo las zur tsam yang mi mthong ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11659: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad de'i ngang las skad cig kyang ma 'das pa'i ngo bo ni /
NK054(yi)001:11660: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin la thams cad
NK054(yi)001:11661: la khyab pa'i ngos nas chos kyi dbyings zhes bya
NK054(yi)001:11662: / 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'dzin pa'i tha snyad dang bral bas mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:11663: rtogs ma rtogs las 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad snang bas lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:11664: mdor na ston pa kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo
NK054(yi)001:11665: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
NK054(yi)001:11666: kyis gdul bya mnyam dang mi mnyam kun la ngo
NK054(yi)001:11668: snod bcud kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK054(yi)001:11669: dbyings las ma gtogs pa mtha' gnyis su song ba
NK054(yi)001:11671: de lta bu de gtan tshigs ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:11672: ye shes kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med //
NK054(yi)001:11674: dngos po snod bcud kyi chos thams cad kyi rang
NK054(yi)001:11675: bzhin ye nas gnyen pos ma bcos lam gyis ma
NK054(yi)001:11676: bsgrubs rgyu rkyen dang bral nas gdod ma nas sems
NK054(yi)001:11677: kyi chos nyid dngos po thams cad dang bral yang
NK054(yi)001:11678: / rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyi sku dang ye
NK054(yi)001:11679: shes kyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par rang
NK054(yi)001:11680: gsal ba las mthar phyin pa'i ngo bo yang dag
NK054(yi)001:11681: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir /
NK054(yi)001:11682: gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub pa'i kun tu
NK054(yi)001:11683: bzang po'i ngo bo la gdul bya'i dbang gis sku
NK054(yi)001:11684: dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang snang ba las
NK054(yi)001:11685: 'byung 'jug dang rtsa lam dang spro bsdud med pa
NK054(yi)001:11686: la ni / rnam 'phro zhes tha snyad du 'dogs so //
NK054(yi)001:11688: dkyil 'khor dang mdzad pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang ba rnams /
NK054(yi)001:11689: me long gi gzugs brnyan lta ba po'i rkyen gyi lta ba bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:11690: gdul bya'i las dang dbang po'i rim pa mtho dman ji ltar snang yang 'du shes kyi rgyud dam /
NK054(yi)001:11693: dngos po rang rgyud pa phra ba'ang med par bstan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11695: mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i mdzad pa de lta bus mnyes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11696: gzhung dngos su bsdu ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:11698: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags zhes pa bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11699: de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad ye
NK054(yi)001:11700: shes lngar lhun gyis grub pa rang gsal ba ni
NK054(yi)001:11701: yul dang yul can med kyang ngo bo nyid du
NK054(yi)001:11702: gyur pa'o // dmigs byed ces par /
NK054(yi)001:11703: don de nyid rdzogs chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul yin pas bsdu'o //
NK054(yi)001:11707: bsdu ste snod bcud kyi chos thams cad ting nge
NK054(yi)001:11708: 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ye shes lnga'i ngo bor spyod
NK054(yi)001:11709: pa la yul yul can bral ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11710: dpag med bsam mi khyab ces byas par /
NK054(yi)001:11711: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11712: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ye shes lnga'i ngang
NK054(yi)001:11713: las blos dpag tu med cing bsam bya bsam byed
NK054(yi)001:11714: dang bral ba'o // ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor zhes par /
NK054(yi)001:11715: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
NK054(yi)001:11719: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'og gzhi 'byung ba rnams gzhal yas khang gdan gtso 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:11720: sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan cha bsam yas lhun grub rnams /
NK054(yi)001:11721: ye shes rang rig rang snang gi dkyil 'khor du gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11722: sna tshogs brjod mi lang zhes par /
NK054(yi)001:11723: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi //
NK054(yi)001:11724: zhes pa'i tshig gnyis bsdus te /
NK054(yi)001:11725: ye shes rol pa rang snang ba lhag pa ting
NK054(yi)001:11726: nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yi gdul bya sna tshogs
NK054(yi)001:11727: kyi ngo la dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su snang ste
NK054(yi)001:11728: / snang tsam nyid na rang byung gi ye shes
NK054(yi)001:11729: bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang bas spyod
NK054(yi)001:11730: yul yongs su dag pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:11731: chos thams cad dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub ces bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11733: sku yi phyag rgya mchog ni //
NK054(yi)001:11734: zhes pa'i bar tshig gsum bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11735: sku lnga lhun grub kun tu bzang po'i rig pa chos sku las ma g.yos kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11736: longs sku snang ba dag pa'i snang ba 'ba' zhig go //
NK054(yi)001:11739: zhes pa tshig gnyis bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11740: 'khor ba 'gro drug gi snang ba las sprul sku sna tshogs par snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11742: ston nyid sgyu ma mi g.yor tshul /
NK054(yi)001:11744: chos sku las ma g.yos par sgyu ma mig yor gyi dpes ma 'gag par snang /
NK054(yi)001:11745: gdul bya'i dbang gis snang yang chos sku las ma g.yos pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11747: tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med //
NK054(yi)001:11749: sku'i tshul ma 'gag par snang yang snang stong gnyis su med pa gnyis su ma song ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11751: ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i //
NK054(yi)001:11752: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig lnga bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11753: sems nyid kyi ngang las ma g.yos kyang /
NK054(yi)001:11754: dbyings kyi sgras gdul bya'i las 'phro bzhin sku dang mdzad pa mi 'gag par 'char ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11755: ye nas kun gsal zhes par /
NK054(yi)001:11756: skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku //
NK054(yi)001:11757: la sogs pa bsdu ste khams gsum gyi chos thams cad sku lngar lhun gyis grub par gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11759: dper na me long chu zla bzhin nas /
NK054(yi)001:11760: gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin //
NK054(yi)001:11762: 'gro ba 'dren pa'i 'dul byed gdul bya'i ngo bzhin 'phro ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11764: 'og min bla med gnas mchog nas //
NK054(yi)001:11765: sku gsum gyi ngo bo rnams bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:11766: gdul byar snang ba'i longs sku dang /
NK054(yi)001:11767: mthar phyin pa'i sku gsum ji ltar snang yang mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las ma g.yos pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11768: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
NK054(yi)001:11770: rdo rje lta bur mi phyed pa'i chos thams cad
NK054(yi)001:11771: kyi de kho na nyid rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying
NK054(yi)001:11772: po ston pa'i rjod byed kyi tshig ston pa'i byin
NK054(yi)001:11773: rlabs kyis rang snang ba nyid gdul bya go phye
NK054(yi)001:11774: ba'i ched du'o // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK054(yi)001:11777: stod kyi tshig bzhi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang /
NK054(yi)001:11778: bar lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi
NK054(yi)001:11779: bcu rtsa gnyis rnal 'byor pa'i blo ngo bzhin du
NK054(yi)001:11780: / smad rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu
NK054(yi)001:11781: mthar phyin pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo mdzad
NK054(yi)001:11782: pa'i phrin las bcas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug
NK054(yi)001:11784: le'u bdun pa la rgyud gsum las /
NK054(yi)001:11786: smad 'bras bu mthar phyin pa gsung gi rgyud /
NK054(yi)001:11787: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las /
NK054(yi)001:11788: stod lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:11789: lam pa gang gis spyod yul na stod phyag rgya gcig pa yan chad kyi spyod yul /
NK054(yi)001:11790: smad mthar lam pa'i spyod yul lo //
NK054(yi)001:11791: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang du byas na /
NK054(yi)001:11792: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:11793: de las kyang gsung gi dkyil 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:11794: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las sngags te /
NK054(yi)001:11795: de yang gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11797: spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i lam rim dang /
NK054(yi)001:11800: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa rnams la sngags dgos pas de bstan to //
NK054(yi)001:11802: drug pa yan chad kyi mtshams thag sbrel ba bshad zin /
NK054(yi)001:11803: drug pa dngos dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa
NK054(yi)001:11804: la sngags kyi las kyi rgyu mtshan rnams sngon du
NK054(yi)001:11806: de'i phyir na le'u bdun pa phyung ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11807: bdun pa'i skabs 'dir zur lugs kyis gsang sngags la bshad pa nyes pa'i skyon brgyad bshad de /
NK054(yi)001:11808: gsang sngags dang mtshan nyid bsres nas bshad na /
NK054(yi)001:11809: sngags khyad par gyi don la gol bas rdo rje theg pa na babs kyi bshad pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11810: yo ga phyi nang bsres nas bshad na /
NK054(yi)001:11811: bsnyen bsgrub kyi don las gol bas 'brog 'chol ba'i bshad pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11812: mi mthun pa'i tshig don bsdebs ma shes na /
NK054(yi)001:11813: shes rab long ba'i bshad pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11814: rtog ge ba'i the tshom gyi gegs sel ma shes na /
NK054(yi)001:11815: mdzangs pa lce ldum gyi bshad pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11816: 'brel tshul rnam pa gnyis bshad ma shes na /
NK054(yi)001:11817: rang dga' yug pa'i bshad pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11818: spyi dang khyad par gyi dgos ched med na don phyal ba'i bshad pa dang brgyad do //
NK054(yi)001:11819: bshad tshul ma nor ba la gsum ste /
NK054(yi)001:11821: dam tshig rnam grangs kyis bshad /
NK054(yi)001:11822: phrin las chog bsdebs kyis bshad pa dang gsum mo //
NK054(yi)001:11825: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11826: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni le'u drug pa'i rjes thog go //
NK054(yi)001:11827: don gyi de ma thag pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11828: rnal 'byor dbang thob dam tshig dang ldan /
NK054(yi)001:11829: sgrub pa la 'jug pa'i bya ba thams cad rdzogs par byas nas 'di bzhin 'jug pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11830: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:11831: phun sum tshogs pa'i gleng gzhi kun tu bzang po'i
NK054(yi)001:11832: rig par dbyer med pa'i lha yab yum thams cad
NK054(yi)001:11833: do // de dag thams cad kyi sku rdo rje lta bu /
NK054(yi)001:11836: sku gsung thugs mi phyed pas kyang rdo rje lta bu las /
NK054(yi)001:11837: go phye ba'i don du sngags rnams rang shar ba la phyung ngo zhes brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:11838: de yang dang po mchog bsgrub kyi dbang du byas na /
NK054(yi)001:11839: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rgyu'i yi ge las 'og gzhi bskyed pa rnams sngon du song /
NK054(yi)001:11840: bzhugs gnas pho brang bskyed pa'i sngags ni /
NK054(yi)001:11841: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11842: b+h+r+aum ni bskyed pa'i sa bon dngos te /
NK054(yi)001:11843: de yang b+h+r+aum ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i snying po yi ge 'bru gcig pa zhes te /
NK054(yi)001:11844: bud+d+ha de dang po lam bsgrub pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:11845: dang po lam la 'jug nas byang chub kyi spyod pa mdzad pa'i dus na /
NK054(yi)001:11846: re zhig gnas kyis phongs nas skyo ba skyes te smon lam btab pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11847: bdag ni nam zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dus na /
NK054(yi)001:11848: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho brang du gyur cig /
NK054(yi)001:11849: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gzhal yas khang du gyur cig /
NK054(yi)001:11850: ces smon lam btab pa mthar phyin nas /
NK054(yi)001:11851: smon lam kho na bzhin mngon du gyur pa ste des na yi ge b+h+r+aum dang /
NK054(yi)001:11852: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:11853: gzhal yas khang gsum dbyer med par shes par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:11854: bskyed thabs ni rgyu'i yi ge las b+h+aum spros /
NK054(yi)001:11855: ri rab kyi kha la phog /
NK054(yi)001:11856: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:11857: b+h+r+aum las cig car du bskyed kyang rung /
NK054(yi)001:11858: spro bsdu byas kyang rung le'u drug pa'i gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par bsgom mo //
NK054(yi)001:11861: de yang 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs na /
NK054(yi)001:11862: kun tu bzang po'i thugs ni 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK054(yi)001:11863: sna tshogs rang byung gi ye shes su dag pa'i
NK054(yi)001:11864: thugs rig pa nyid gzhal yas khang du snang ba
NK054(yi)001:11865: yin / rnal 'byor pa'i gnas skabs na snod bcud
NK054(yi)001:11866: kyi chos sna tshogs rnal 'byor pa rang sems nyid
NK054(yi)001:11867: snang bas dngos por ma grub ste /
NK054(yi)001:11868: rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i sems nyid gzhal yas khang du snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11869: lha bskyed pa'i sngags la rigs lnga yab yum bskyed pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:11870: h'u badz+ra d+h+rika la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:11871: 'dir lha bskyed pa'i sa bon yang yi ge 'khor lor bshad pa'i yig 'bru rnams so so'am /
NK054(yi)001:11872: yang na 'dir bshad pa'i +aa h'u la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams te /
NK054(yi)001:11873: yig 'bru rnams gdan thog tu bkod zin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:11874: sngags brjod pas cig car du bsgom pa'am /
NK054(yi)001:11875: yang na yig 'bru la phyag mtshan /
NK054(yi)001:11876: phyag mtshan la sku bskyed pa'i dus su sngags brjod pa ste de dag gang yang rung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:11877: h'u ni rtsa ba'i yi ge'o //
NK054(yi)001:11880: rdo rje 'dzin pa thugs kyi rigs mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11882: rtsa ba'i yi ge ste yi ge dang po kun 'gre /
NK054(yi)001:11885: rgyal ba 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par snang mdzad do //
NK054(yi)001:11889: rin po che'i rigs rin chen 'byung ldan no //
NK054(yi)001:11891: a ra ni gsung gi rigs /
NK054(yi)001:11893: pad+ma 'dzin pa snang ba mtha' yas so //
NK054(yi)001:11895: pradz+ny+aa ni shes rab mtshon pa'i ral gri /
NK054(yi)001:11897: las kyi rigs don yod grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11902: shwa r+ai ni dbang phyug ste mi bskyod pa'i yum kun tu bzang mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:11906: rnam snang gi yum spyan ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11908: mo ha ni sdud pa chu'i khams /
NK054(yi)001:11910: rin 'byung gi yum m+aa ma k+ai'o //
NK054(yi)001:11914: mtha' gnyis 'dzin pas mtha' gnyis sreg par byed pa yum gos dkar mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:11918: mtha' gnyis kyi skyon gyis mi gos pa don grub kyi yum dam tshig sgrol ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11919: nang gi sems dpa' yab yum brgyad ni /
NK054(yi)001:11920: k+sh+aim hi r+aa dza ya zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:11922: r+aa dza ya sa'i snying po'o //
NK054(yi)001:11925: gar+b+ha snying po de dngos so //
NK054(yi)001:11927: pad+ma 'dzin pa ste spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
NK054(yi)001:11928: dzim ku ru p+aa na h+r+ai /
NK054(yi)001:11929: phyag na rdo rje'i sgra don no //
NK054(yi)001:11931: h'u l+aa s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK054(yi)001:11934: sa ma ya s+t+wam dam tshig las mi 'da' ste l+aa s+ye ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11935: t+r+aam m+aa le sa ma ya hoh m+aa le phreng ba /
NK054(yi)001:11936: sa ma ya hohdama tshig gis mnyes pa ste lha mo phreng ba ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11937: h+r+aih g+airti r+aa go&a hoh g+airti dbyangs mkhan ma /
NK054(yi)001:11938: r+aa go&a ho chags pa'i bdag nyid ma h+aa mo bi wam ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11941: r+aa ga y+aa mi chags pa'i bdag nyid gar mkhan ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11942: phyi ma sku'i sems dpa' ya yum brgyad ni /
NK054(yi)001:11943: mee d+h+aa ra ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:11945: bram ze'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs kyi phyag mtshan 'dzin pas byams pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:11946: th+l+him nis+sa ram b+h+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:11947: sgrib pa sel bar byed pa dngos so //
NK054(yi)001:11948: h'u sa r+aa dz+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:11949: gnyis 'dzin zhi ba'i rgyal po ste kun tu bzang po'o //
NK054(yi)001:11950: m+aum sh+r+ai +aa r+aa ga ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:11952: +aa chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rtogs pa /
NK054(yi)001:11953: r+aa ga thugs rjes sems can la chags pa ste 'jam dpal lo //
NK054(yi)001:11955: dzah d+h+au pe pra we sh+aa /
NK054(yi)001:11956: d+h+au pe pra we sh+aa bdug spros 'thor ba ste bdug spos ma dngos so //
NK054(yi)001:11958: bush+pe ni me tog ma ste me tog 'thor bas ye shes 'bebs pa ste me tog ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11959: bam d+ai pa su gi r+ai /
NK054(yi)001:11961: su gi r+ai ni gsal bar byed pa ste mar me ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:11964: tsit+ta ni rig pa tshim par byed pa ste dri chab ma'i sngags so //
NK054(yi)001:11973: ta kri ta mthar byed kyang 'gre ste lho'i stobs po che'o //
NK054(yi)001:11974: h'u pad+ma n+ta kri ta phata /
NK054(yi)001:11975: pad+ma mthar byed de rta mgrin no //
NK054(yi)001:11976: h'u pra dz+ny+aa na ta krita phata /
NK054(yi)001:11977: shes rab mthar byed de bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:11979: ma h+aa badz+ra d+h+aa ra ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa ri dza l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK054(yi)001:11983: d+h+aa ra ni 'dzin pa'am gzungs te rdo rje'i gzugs so //
NK054(yi)001:11990: shar gyi sgo ba'i yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:11991: ma h+aa rat+na d+h+aa ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK054(yi)001:11992: gzhan gong dang 'dra ba la rat+na d+h+aa ra rin
NK054(yi)001:11993: po che'i rigs kyi yum mam gzungs zhes bya ste
NK054(yi)001:11994: lho'i khro mo'o // ma h+aa pad+ma d+h+aa ra ma
NK054(yi)001:11995: h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata
NK054(yi)001:11996: lho'i khro mo'o // / pad+ma d+ha ra pad+ma'i yum
NK054(yi)001:11997: mam gzungs bya ba lta bu nub kyi khro mo'o
NK054(yi)001:11998: lho'i khro mo'o // / // ma h+aa karma d+h+aa
NK054(yi)001:11999: ra ma h+aa kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni
NK054(yi)001:12000: lho'i khro mo'o // / // h'u phata / karma
NK054(yi)001:12001: d+h+aa ra las kyi yum mam las kyi gzungs so
NK054(yi)001:12002: lho'i khro mo'o // / // h'u phata / // byang phyogs kyi khro mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:12007: badz+ra tsit+ta rdo rje thugs kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo /
NK054(yi)001:12008: h'u gsum sku gsung thugs gsum dang ldan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12011: badz+r+ai b+ha dra sa man+ta a /
NK054(yi)001:12016: mtshan ma med pa las mi 'da' ba kun tu bzang mo ste /
NK054(yi)001:12017: a gsum chos kyi dbyings sku gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
NK054(yi)001:12021: mu ne thub pa ste kun 'gre /
NK054(yi)001:12023: s+w+aa h+aa gdul bya'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtha' rten lha'i thub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12025: h'u drum lha ma yin gyi thub pa /
NK054(yi)001:12027: prem yi dwags kyi thub pa /
NK054(yi)001:12029: ye dmyal ba'i thub pa rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:12030: de la sngags de dag gis bskyed pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12032: mchod pa'i rnam grangs rnams 'bul ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:12033: las gang byed kyang mtha' rten 'gyur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:12034: bsnyen pa bya ba ste bdag gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa thams cad la 'gro bas /
NK054(yi)001:12035: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las na sngags zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12036: sngags 'di dag gi sgo nas mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK054(yi)001:12037: tshogs gsog pa'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor du bya ba
NK054(yi)001:12038: dang / yi dam nar mar bya ba gnyis yod pa las /
NK054(yi)001:12039: dang por skad cig mi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo
NK054(yi)001:12040: rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag
NK054(yi)001:12042: gdan pad zla nyi ma sum brtsegs la rigs lnga ye shes lngas dbang bskur /
NK054(yi)001:12043: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab /
NK054(yi)001:12044: rang nyid kyi thugs ka nas b+h+r+aum 'phros mdun du 'od du zhu ba las /
NK054(yi)001:12045: mdun du gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa rgyas par bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12046: de nas rang rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi
NK054(yi)001:12047: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa zhi ba dang mthun
NK054(yi)001:12048: / sa ma ya hoh la sogs pa'i yab yum gnyis kyi brdas bskul ma mdzad /
NK054(yi)001:12049: yab yum gnyis su med par rol pa'i lhag pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12050: byang chub sems yum gyi mkha' la 'phros pa las
NK054(yi)001:12051: / yum gyi mkha' gzhal yas khang gi ngo bo tsam du byin gyis brlabs /
NK054(yi)001:12052: yang byang sems cha gcig yum gyi mkha' las 'phros
NK054(yi)001:12053: pas b+h+r+aum le brgan gyi kha dog can gcig tu
NK054(yi)001:12054: gyur / dzahzhesa brjod pas b+h+r+aum de mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12055: b+h+aum bi shwa bi shud+he zhes brjod par bya /
NK054(yi)001:12056: yang gsang gnas nas byang chub sems kyi cha las h'u dang m+aum gnyis bton /
NK054(yi)001:12057: mdun gyi gzhal yas dbus kyi thog tu bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12061: mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi sku rgyan dang bcas pa wal gyis gyur /
NK054(yi)001:12062: dzah sa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bton /
NK054(yi)001:12065: thugs kar h'u thim pas sku brtas par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12066: de las sprul pa phyogs bcur spros nas 'phags pa mchod /
NK054(yi)001:12067: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis sems can gyi don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12068: rang skal gyi phrin las rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang /
NK054(yi)001:12069: nam mkha' la dngos por 'dzin pa dag par byas nas /
NK054(yi)001:12070: mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi rtsa ba'i sku la 'dus te skur gsal gdab /
NK054(yi)001:12071: zhes nas nam mkha'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan rgyas
NK054(yi)001:12072: par yod pa'i dbus kyi lte ba la bzhugs su
NK054(yi)001:12073: gsol / yang byang sems cha gcig las dang l+aam gnyis su gyur /
NK054(yi)001:12075: l+aam dwe sha ra ti'i sngags brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12076: rnam snang yab yum gyi skur wal gyis bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12077: dzahzhesa brjod pas yum gyi mkha' nas nam mkha' la bton /
NK054(yi)001:12078: sngar bzhin yi ge gsum gyis brtan par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12079: de las sprul pa phyogs bcur spros /
NK054(yi)001:12080: 'phags pa mchod cing thugs dam bskul /
NK054(yi)001:12081: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis 'gro don byas ste /
NK054(yi)001:12082: rang skal gyi phrin las gzugs kyi phung po dang /
NK054(yi)001:12084: slar 'dus pas rtsa ba'i sku la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12086: mdun gyi gzhal yas khang gi shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng gdan rdzogs pa la bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12087: yang yum gyi mkha' la byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12089: m+aam mo ha ra ti'i sngags brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12090: rin 'byung yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12092: 'bru gsum gyis sku brtan par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12095: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kun la 'agre'o //
NK054(yi)001:12096: rang skal gyi phrin las tshor bar 'dzin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12097: chur 'dzin pa sbyangs nas slar 'dus rtsa ba'i sku la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12098: rin 'byung yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12099: mdun gyi gzhal yas kyi lho'i rtsibs steng du gdan rdzogs pa la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12100: yang byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12101: +aam +aa ro lika p+aam r+aa ga ra ti brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12102: snang ba mtha' yas yab yum gyi skur bskyed dzahs mkha' la bton /
NK054(yi)001:12104: sprul pa 'phros 'phags pa mchod 'gro don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12106: rang skad kyi phrin las 'du shes kyi phung po dang mer 'dzin pa dag par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12107: slar rtsa ba'i sku la 'dus snang ba mtha' yas yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12108: gzhal yas kyi nub kyi rtsibs la rang gi gdan la bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12109: yang byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12111: t+aam badz+ra ra ti brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12112: don grub yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12116: rang skal gyi phrin las 'du byed dang rlung 'dzin dag par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12117: slar rtsa ba'i sku la 'dus don grub kyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12118: byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gdan la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12119: yang byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12121: h'u l+aa s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12122: sa snying yab yum gyi skur bskyed dzah sa bton 'bru gsum gyis brtan /
NK054(yi)001:12123: sprul pa 'phros 'phags pa mchod 'gro don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12124: rang skal gyi phrin las yul gzugs 'dzin dang /
NK054(yi)001:12125: mig gi rnam shes kyi gzung 'dzin dag par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12127: sa snying yab yum gyi skur gsal shar phyogs kyi glo 'bur la bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12128: yang byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12130: t+r+aam m+aa le sa ma ya hohzhesa pas /
NK054(yi)001:12131: nam snying yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12133: sprul pas 'phags pa mchod 'gro don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12134: rang skal gyi phrin las rna ba'i rnam shes dang yul sgra 'dzin sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12135: slar rtsa ba'i sku la 'dus skur gsal gdab /
NK054(yi)001:12137: yang byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12138: h+r+aih ha h'u pad+ma pa da ma /
NK054(yi)001:12139: h+r+aihg+ai rti r+aa go&a hohzhesa pas /
NK054(yi)001:12140: spyan ras gzigs yab yum gyi skur bskyed dzahbatona 'bru gsum gyis brtan /
NK054(yi)001:12141: sprul pas 'phags pa mchod 'gro don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12142: rang skal gyi phrin las sna'i rnam shes dang yul dri sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12144: spyan ras gzigs yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12145: nub phyogs kyi glo 'bur la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12146: yang byang sems cha gcig las /
NK054(yi)001:12147: dz+aim ku ru pa na hrih /
NK054(yi)001:12148: +aam n+airti r+aa ga y+aa mi zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12149: phyag rdor yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12152: rang skal gyi phrin las lce'i rnam shes ro 'dzin sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12153: slar 'dus rtsa ba'i sku la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12154: phyag rdor yab yum gyi skur gsal gdab /
NK054(yi)001:12155: byang gi glo 'bur la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12157: mee d+h+aa ra ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:12158: dzahd+h+au pe pra we sha zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12159: byams pa yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12162: rang skal gyi phrin las mig gi dbang po dang
NK054(yi)001:12163: 'das pa dang dpyid la dngos por 'dzin pa sbyangs
NK054(yi)001:12165: byams pa yab yum gyi skur gsal gdab /
NK054(yi)001:12166: shar lho'i gru chad la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12168: th+l+him nis+sa ram b+ha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:12169: h'u push+pe a be sha zhes sgrib sel yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12173: rang skal gyi phrin las rna ba'i dbang po dang da ltar dbyar du 'dzin pa sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12174: slar 'dus sgrib sel yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12175: lho nub kyi gru chad la bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12177: h'u s+w+aa r+aa dza ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:12178: bam d+ai pa su gi r+ai zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12179: kun bzang yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12183: rang skal gyi phrin las sna'i dbang po dang ma byon pa dang ston du 'dzin pa sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12185: kun bzang yab yum gyi skur gsal gdab /
NK054(yi)001:12186: nub byang gi gru chad la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12188: m+aum sh+r+ai +aa r+aam ga ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK054(yi)001:12190: 'jam dpal yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12193: sprul pas 'phags pa mchod 'gro don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12194: rang skal gyi phrin las lce'i dbang po dang phyis 'byung ba dang dgun du 'dzin pa sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12197: byang shar gyi gru chad la bzhugs su gsol lo //
NK054(yi)001:12199: h'u ya m+aa n+ta krita phata /
NK054(yi)001:12200: badz+ra d+h+aa ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai n+ai h'u phata ces pas /
NK054(yi)001:12201: gshin rje gshed yab yum bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12205: rang skal gyi phrin las lus kyi rnam shes dang rtag lta sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12207: gshin rje gshed yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12211: rat+na d+h+aa ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai n+ai h+aum phata ces pas /
NK054(yi)001:12216: rang skal gyi phrin las lus kyi dbang po dang chad par lta ba sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12218: stobs chen yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12222: pad+ma d+h+aa ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai n+ai h'u phata ces pas /
NK054(yi)001:12227: rang skal gyi phrin las lus kyi yul gyi reg bya dang bdag lta sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12229: rta mgrin yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12233: karma d+h+aa ra ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai n+ai h'u phata ces pas /
NK054(yi)001:12234: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12237: sprul pa 'phros pas mchod don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12238: rang skal gyi phrin las byang chub sems reg shes dang mtshan mar lta ba sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12240: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12243: h'u h'u h'u badz+ra tsit+ta h'u zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12247: sprul pa 'phros pas mchod don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12248: rang skal gyi phrin las shes pa thams cad kyi
NK054(yi)001:12249: rjes su rgyu zhing yul la gsal bar gcod pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12253: gzhal yas khang gi shar gyi lha snam gyi rang gdan la bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12255: a a a badz+r+ai b+ha dra sa man+ta a zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12256: kun tu bzang mo'i skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12259: sprul pa 'phros pas mchod don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12260: rang skal gyi phrin las yul chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas thams cad sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12263: nub kyi lha snam rang gdan la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12265: mu ne krem s+w+aa h+aa zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12270: rang skal gyi phrin las lha 'i 'jig rten dang phrag dog sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12275: mu ne h'u t+r+aum s+w+aa h+aa zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12276: lha ma yin gyi thub pa'i skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12280: rang skal gyi phrin las lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang nga rgyal sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12282: lha ma yin gyi thub pa'i skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12285: mu ne srum s+w+aa h+aa zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12286: mi'i thub pa shaka thub gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12290: rang skal gyi phrin las mi'i gnas dang ser sna'i 'dzin pa dag par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12295: mu ne prem s+w+aa h+aa zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12296: yi dwags kyi thub par gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12300: rang skal gyi phriin las yi dwags kyi 'jig rten dang 'dod chags sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12302: yi dwags kyi thub pa'i skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12305: mu ne k+sham s+w+aa h+aa zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12306: byol song gi thub pa'i sku gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12310: rang skal gyi phrin las byol song gi khams dang gti mug sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12312: byol song gi thub pa'i skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12315: mu ne ye s+aa h+aa zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12318: sprul pa spros mchod don byas /
NK054(yi)001:12319: rang skal gyi phrin las dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang nyon mongs pa zhe sdang sbyangs /
NK054(yi)001:12322: byang shar mtshams la bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12323: yang na lha yab yum kha khar byas nas /
NK054(yi)001:12325: sprul pa thugs ka nas spro /
NK054(yi)001:12326: 'don pa'i thabs rnams gong dang mthun /
NK054(yi)001:12327: yab yum zung dus gcig bton pa ni sngar bshad pa ste de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:12328: yi dam nar mar byed na /
NK054(yi)001:12329: b+h+r+aum le brgan las gzhal yas khang bskyed pa sngar dang 'dra /
NK054(yi)001:12330: yi ge h'u dang m+aum dang cho ga gsum gyis mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12332: yab yum sbyor ba'i brda bsnol mas bskul /
NK054(yi)001:12333: rol pa'i byang sems yum gyi mkha' la babs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12334: mkha' byang sems kyi cha dang pos gzhal yas khang brlab /
NK054(yi)001:12335: ya lan gcig spros pas gdan nyi zla byin gyis brlab /
NK054(yi)001:12336: yang lan gcig spros pas gdan so so la yig 'bru rnams bkod /
NK054(yi)001:12337: yang byang sems lan gcig 'phros pas yig 'bru rnams thugs ye shes lnga dang ldan par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12338: yang lan gcig 'phros pas yum gyi mkha' la b+h+r+aum le brgan gcig tu gyur /
NK054(yi)001:12339: dzahs mdun gyi nam mkha' la bton /
NK054(yi)001:12340: de la b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he'i sngags brjod pas gzhal yas khang gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12341: yum gyi mkha' nas yig 'bru rnams spros pas nam
NK054(yi)001:12342: mkha'i gzhal yas khang gi so so'i gdan thog tu
NK054(yi)001:12343: babs pa las / h+aum badz+ra d+hika /
NK054(yi)001:12344: m+aum d+h+aa t+w+ai shwa r+ai brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12345: dbus kyi h'u m+aum las mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12351: rang skal gyi phrin las rnams sngar dang 'dra /
NK054(yi)001:12352: de nas rigs bzhi bskyed tshul gong dang 'dra bas bsdus nas bdag gi phyogs bzhir bkod /
NK054(yi)001:12353: sems dpa' rnams kyang bskyed tshul gong dang 'dra ba las /
NK054(yi)001:12354: bdag gi phyogs phyogs kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa'i thabs gong du bstan pa bzhin /
NK054(yi)001:12355: dmyal ba'i thub pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12356: mchod pa dang gong gi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang
NK054(yi)001:12357: 'di gnyis kyi ye shes bstim pa la sogs pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12359: 'og nas 'chad pa'i dkyil 'khor spyi gzhung dang thun mong bstan to //
NK054(yi)001:12360: l+aa s+ye ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad /
NK054(yi)001:12361: gsang ba'i dbang gi skabs su lha mo bcu drug ltar bshad na /
