NK054(yi)001:12362: nang gi lha mo bzhi la gsang ba'i byang chub sems bzhi dang sbyar na /
NK054(yi)001:12363: smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK054(yi)001:12364: ldang ba byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK054(yi)001:12365: 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK054(yi)001:12366: gnas pa byang chub kyi sems so //
NK054(yi)001:12371: nang gi sem ma bzhi ni /
NK054(yi)001:12372: de la h'u l+aa s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12373: yab yum brdas bskul ba'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:12374: dam tshig gi dus la bab pa'o zhes so //
NK054(yi)001:12375: t+r+aam m+aa le sa ma ya hohzhesa dam tshig gi mnyes par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12376: zhes dam bca' ba lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:12377: h+r+aim g+airti r+aa go&a hohzhesa pas /
NK054(yi)001:12378: bdag nyid chags par bya ba'i yum bdag nyid yin zhes so //
NK054(yi)001:12379: am n+airti r+aa ga y+aa mi zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12381: zhes khas blangs pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:12383: sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12384: bdag ni khyod kyi dam tshig ma'o zhes so //
NK054(yi)001:12386: khyod ni bdag gi dam tshig gi yul lo zhes so //
NK054(yi)001:12388: bdag ni chags pa'i yul zhes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12389: +aam n+airti r+aag y+aa mi zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12390: khyod ni bdag gi chags pa'i gnas yin zhes so //
NK054(yi)001:12391: de ni bskul ba'i brda'i dus su brjod pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12392: dang po rnams yum gyis brjod /
NK054(yi)001:12393: gnyis pa rnams yab kyis brjod pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12394: da ni yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa'i dus na lha mo bzhi dang sbyar ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:12396: l+aa s+ye ni sgeg mo zhes pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12397: chas kyis brgyan pa dang lhar bsgoms nas yan lag byin gyis brlabs /
NK054(yi)001:12399: 'jo 'jo sgeg sgeg 'dra ba ni yul zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12400: skad cig ma dang po la smon pa'i sems zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12401: g.yo ba'i mgo zug pa dang po'o //
NK054(yi)001:12402: skad cig ma gnyis pa la g.yo ba'i sems zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12403: smon pa'i sems stobs su gyur pas chags pa dngos su g.yo ba'i bdag nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:12404: de ni lha mo bzhi la na sgeg mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:12405: m+aa l+ye zhes pa phreng ba ma ste /
NK054(yi)001:12406: phreng ba ni rgyun mi chad par rdog po kha
NK054(yi)001:12407: khar yod pa bzhin 'dir ldang ba'i sems zhes pas
NK054(yi)001:12408: / smon pa'i sems las stobs su gyur te chags
NK054(yi)001:12409: pa dngos su ldang ba la ni sems zhes bya
NK054(yi)001:12410: / la / de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye
NK054(yi)001:12411: shes dngos kyi rgyu yin pas reg pa'i sems zhes
NK054(yi)001:12412: / la / kyang bya'o // skad cig bcu drug
NK054(yi)001:12413: gi cha gong nas gong du 'phel bas phreng bas
NK054(yi)001:12414: / la / kyang bya'o // zhes bya'o // yang
NK054(yi)001:12415: na phreng ba ni 'dren pa'i bdag nyid yin pas
NK054(yi)001:12416: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par 'brel ba'i bdag
NK054(yi)001:12417: / la / kyang bya'o // zhes bya'o // nyid yin no // g+airti zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12418: yab yum 'brel ba'i sgo nas thabs dang shes rab dbyer med de 'jug pa zhes kyang bya /
NK054(yi)001:12419: don nyams su len pas 'jug pa'i sems kyang yin la /
NK054(yi)001:12420: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos rgyu yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:12421: de ltar yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
NK054(yi)001:12422: med pa'i reg pa dngos su nyams su blangs pas
NK054(yi)001:12423: na 'jug pa'i sems dang yang sbyar ro //
NK054(yi)001:12424: 'dir ni g+airti dang sbyar ba ni nyams su myong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byung ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:12425: der ni g+airti glu dbyangs ma'i rang bzhin yin pas de dang sbyar ro //
NK054(yi)001:12428: de ltar sbyor ba la 'jug pa'i sgo nas /
NK054(yi)001:12429: nye ba mthar phyin te yab yum lhag pa byang
NK054(yi)001:12430: chub sems myong ba la ni myong ba zhes bya
NK054(yi)001:12431: ste / myong ba de nyid las mi 'da' bas gnas pa zhes kyang brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:12432: de'i dus su lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes chos
NK054(yi)001:12433: nyid du rtogs pas de nyid thugs ye shes yin
NK054(yi)001:12434: / ye shes de la dkyil 'khor ston pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12436: 'gro don byed pa la sogs 'phro 'du rnams rdzogs pas gar bsgyur ma zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12437: de tsam na chos nyid las ma g.yos par gnas pas gnas pa byang chub sems so //
NK054(yi)001:12439: yab yum dbyer med pa'i dus su dgyes pas mnyes par bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:12440: de la'ang phyi'i lha mo gsum la gnas skabs gsum du 'gro ste /
NK054(yi)001:12442: dang por dzahzhesa pa lcags kyu ste /
NK054(yi)001:12443: lcags kyu'i las ni 'gugs pa yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:12444: thabs shes rab dbyer med la 'jug pa'i tshe yum
NK054(yi)001:12445: gyi dpung pa nas 'dres nas 'gugs pa ste lcags
NK054(yi)001:12448: zhags pa ni 'ching ba'i las yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:12449: stod smad kyi phyag rgya 'ching ba lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:12450: bam ni lcags sgrog ste bsdam pa'i las yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:12451: yab yum zhal dang zhal thugs dang thugs mtshan dang mtshan spros pa bsdams pa ste lcags sgrog ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:12452: hoh zhes pa dril bu ma ste bskyod pa'i bdag
NK054(yi)001:12453: nyid yin pa la yab yum gyi sku bskyod pa
NK054(yi)001:12456: d+h+au pe ni bdug spos ma ste /
NK054(yi)001:12457: spos dri zhim pos sna'i dbang po tshim pa bzhin
NK054(yi)001:12458: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyi rig
NK054(yi)001:12459: pa des kyang yab yum gyi reg pa mnyes shing
NK054(yi)001:12460: tshim par byed pas bdug spos ma dang sbyar ro
NK054(yi)001:12461: // push+pe ni me tog ma ste me tog ni sdug cing mdzes pas rig pa tshim pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12462: yab yum gyi sku rgyan gyis brgyan pa ting nge
NK054(yi)001:12463: 'dzin gyis spras shing sgeg pa de me tog ltar
NK054(yi)001:12464: yab yum gnyis gcig gi yid du gcig mdzes pas
NK054(yi)001:12466: yang na me tog ni 'thor ba yin pa dang 'dra bar /
NK054(yi)001:12467: lhag pa byang cub kyi sems yum gyi mkha' la
NK054(yi)001:12468: spros pa 'thor ba yin pas me tog ma dang
NK054(yi)001:12469: sbyar / d+ai pa zhes pa mar me ma dang sbyar te /
NK054(yi)001:12470: mar mes mun pa sel zhing dngos po gsal bar byed pa ltar /
NK054(yi)001:12471: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i lhag pa byang chub
NK054(yi)001:12472: kyi sems bsnol mar spros pa nyams su myong ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12473: rig pa la yab yum gyi sku snang la rang
NK054(yi)001:12474: bzhin med par gsal bas mar me ma dang sbyar
NK054(yi)001:12475: / gan+d+he ni dri chab ma ste /
NK054(yi)001:12476: dri chab ni lha'i thugs kar bsnyug cing byung ba
NK054(yi)001:12477: ste bskus pas dris reg pa tshim pa nyams su
NK054(yi)001:12478: myong bar byed pa yin la /
NK054(yi)001:12479: 'dir yab yum gnyis su med pa'i bde ba'i ro
NK054(yi)001:12480: sku nyams su bstar ba myong ba'i rig pa tshims
NK054(yi)001:12481: pas dri chab ma dang sbyar ro //
NK054(yi)001:12483: pra we sha zhes pa 'byed pa'i tshig ste /
NK054(yi)001:12485: a we sha zhes pa 'bebs pa'i tshig ste /
NK054(yi)001:12486: byang sems mkha' la phab pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12487: su gi r+ai zhes pa bde ba chen po zhes te /
NK054(yi)001:12488: byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i ro sku nyams su bstar ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12490: bde ba chos nyid du rtogs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12491: thugs ye shes dngos po thams cad kyi 'dzin pa dang bral bas tsit+ta'o //
NK054(yi)001:12492: ye shes pa spyan drang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:12493: e h+ye hi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12495: e h+ye hi rgyas pa'i ngos nas kye kye zhes pa'am 'bod pa'am bskul ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12496: bskul ba'i ngo bo ni b+ha ga w+aan zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12497: bcom ldan 'das te dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:12499: k+aa ru ni k+aa ni thugs rje chen po'o don gyis byon par zhu zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:12501: sku gsung thugs gsum gyi dam tshig gis dgyes par mdzod la byon zhes pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:12502: sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12503: sa ma ya dam tshig ste rnal 'byor pa sku
NK054(yi)001:12504: gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ma thob kyi bar du
NK054(yi)001:12505: bzhugs te / khyod la thugs dam gyi dam tshig yod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12507: de las mi 'da' bar brtan par bzhugs zhes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12509: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'dir bskyed pa dang 'dra ba gcig rang bzhin gyi gnas nas byon te /
NK054(yi)001:12510: me ri 'dab 'byor du bzhugs par bsgom mo //
NK054(yi)001:12511: de la sa ma ya s+t+wam yan chad ni snyan gsan dbab pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12512: spyan drang ba'i dngos gzhi ni /
NK054(yi)001:12514: dkyil 'khor la dam tshig bskul zhing rig pa dbyer med par bya ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:12515: yi ge mo dang h+aam gi bar du gtor ba rnams sdeb ste /
NK054(yi)001:12518: lnga ka des 'gre bas lan lnga brjod de rnal
NK054(yi)001:12519: 'byor pa'i rig pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la
NK054(yi)001:12520: gtad de rig pa dbyer med par bsam mo //
NK054(yi)001:12521: de la spyir sngags ni kun tu bzang po'i zhal nas gsungs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12522: byin gyis brlabs pa'i ngo bo rang snang ba yin pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12523: sgra'i yan lag mang po la 'jug pa yin pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12524: gtan tshigs gsum gyis rang gi blo ngor bde ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12525: sgra tsam du bshad mi rung ste /
NK054(yi)001:12526: rigs lnga dang ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs
NK054(yi)001:12527: yon tan phrin las lnga yin pa tsam du bzhag
NK054(yi)001:12528: go // de ltar rig pa'i me tog dor nas /
NK054(yi)001:12529: ye shes pa la dngos grub gsol ba gdab pa ni //
NK054(yi)001:12530: ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
NK054(yi)001:12532: ni ye shes rnam pa lnga dbyer med pa'i ngo
NK054(yi)001:12533: bo 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang byung
NK054(yi)001:12535: ye shes rnam pa lngar ma 'gag pas stong pa'i mtha' las rgyal /
NK054(yi)001:12536: rang byung gi ye shes las ma g.yos pas dngos po'i mtha' las rgyal //
NK054(yi)001:12537: don de gnyis mtha' gnyis dbang du bsdus pas kyang rgyal po ste /
NK054(yi)001:12538: sku lnga lhun grub rmad byung /
NK054(yi)001:12539: thugs lnga lhun grub rmad byung /
NK054(yi)001:12540: yon tan phrin las gnyis kyang 'gre bas rmad po che /
NK054(yi)001:12541: de lta bu'i don de dus da lta kho na
NK054(yi)001:12542: nyid du bdag rnal 'byor pa dang mnyam par sbyor
NK054(yi)001:12543: ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen por byas pa gong gi
NK054(yi)001:12544: sku gsung thugs lnga las mi 'da' bas kyang phyag
NK054(yi)001:12545: rgya chen po / des rgyas thebs pas kyang phyag
NK054(yi)001:12546: rgya chen po bdag dang lha kho na sbyor cig
NK054(yi)001:12547: ces byin rlabs dbab pa'i bskul ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12548: rig pa'i me tog dor ba'i sngags ni /
NK054(yi)001:12550: rdo rje'i dam tshig sdus shig ces pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12552: rdo rje'i dam tshig brtan par mdzod ces pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12553: badz+ra sa ma ya hoh rdo rje dam tshig gis mnyes pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12554: don la rnal 'byor pas sku gsum ma thob kyi bar du ye shes pa brtan par bzhugs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12557: tshur h+aum gis bstim pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12558: gzhal yas gzhal yas la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12559: lha gtso 'khor rnams so sor ma 'chol bar thim pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12560: bam gyis chu la chu thim pa'am /
NK054(yi)001:12561: mar la mar thim pa bzhin du ye shes dam tshig dbyer med par byas /
NK054(yi)001:12562: hohs dbyer med pa ste rgyas pa'i ngo bor gyur pa bsam mo //
NK054(yi)001:12563: snyan gsan dbab pa nas bstim pa'i bar gyi rim
NK054(yi)001:12564: pa 'di rnams le'u drug pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK054(yi)001:12566: sngags kyi le'ura tshogs gsog pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK054(yi)001:12567: yi dam nar ma'i dkyil 'khor dang gsum thun mong yin par shes par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12568: de dag che ba'i yon tan ni zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12569: zhes pa ston pa kun tu bzang pos go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12571: zhes pa lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor lha sngags bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
NK054(yi)001:12572: las kyi rim pa'i sngags gong du smos pa de
NK054(yi)001:12573: dag brjod pa'am grags pa 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
NK054(yi)001:12574: bcu thams cad / khyab par zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12576: yang na 'gro ba drug gi sems can thams cad kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab /
NK054(yi)001:12577: de re re'i lus la yang rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis khyab /
NK054(yi)001:12578: de'i don du ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang du byas na /
NK054(yi)001:12579: lha zhe gnyis kyi sa bon rtsa mdud la rang grub tu yod pa la khyab ces bya ba /
NK054(yi)001:12580: rgyu de las rkyen sngags rnams brjod pas ye shes rang gnas kyi don gsal ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:12581: rtog pa dag nas lha zhe gnyis su gsal ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12582: dngos po la rig pa la rig par mjal ba
NK054(yi)001:12583: la ni grags pa dang 'dra bas grags so zhes
NK054(yi)001:12584: byas ste blo dman gyi ngo'o //
NK054(yi)001:12585: rab tu grags so zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12586: blo 'bring po'i ngo ste rtogs pa mjal ba snga ma bas stobs su gyur pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12587: kun tu grags so zhes bya ba /
NK054(yi)001:12588: dbang po rab la chos thams cad sku dang ye
NK054(yi)001:12589: shes su phyogs kun nas kun tu gsal ba ma
NK054(yi)001:12590: ni kun tu grags so zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:12591: yang na rtogs pa'i rig pa gcig la g.yo ba
NK054(yi)001:12592: dang thob pa dang brtan pa la gsal bar byas
NK054(yi)001:12593: pa'o // dbang bskrun zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i lo rgyus brjod pa la gnyis kyi /
NK054(yi)001:12594: dang po ni de yang slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas
NK054(yi)001:12595: kyi man ngag gis gong du bshad pa'i sngags kyi
NK054(yi)001:12596: stobs kyis rtogs pa 'phel ba gsum gyi bstan pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12597: don de rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas dngos grub kyi
NK054(yi)001:12598: dbang blang ba'i thabs 'di man chad kyis ston zhes
NK054(yi)001:12599: gsungs te / rnal 'byor pa blo yang rab kyi spyod yul lo //
NK054(yi)001:12600: de yang dbang dang dngos grub thams cad kyi mtshungs
NK054(yi)001:12601: ldan gyi rgyu ye nas rnal 'byor pa la gnas
NK054(yi)001:12602: pa la gnas pa'i rkyen sngags dang ting nge 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:12603: gyis byas nas / don de rang las rang shar
NK054(yi)001:12604: ba la ni dngos grub mngon du gyur pa zhes
NK054(yi)001:12605: gyis byas nas / bya'o // de dag spyi'i khog don no //
NK054(yi)001:12607: tshig gi de ma thag pa ni sngas gsungs pa'i yon tan snang ba la 'brel to //
NK054(yi)001:12608: don gyi de ma thag pa ni le'u drug par dkyil 'khor bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12609: le'u bdun par rkyen sngags bstan nas /
NK054(yi)001:12610: dbang bskur byin brlab rnams 'brel bas de nas zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12611: bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje ni kun tu bzang po'o //
NK054(yi)001:12612: bya ba mo rdo rje ni kun tu bzang mo'o //
NK054(yi)001:12613: de gnyis su med pa ni yab yum moo //
NK054(yi)001:12614: dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad de zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12615: gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pa'i lhag pa
NK054(yi)001:12616: byang chub kyi sems yum gyi mkha' la babs pa
NK054(yi)001:12617: dang / yab yum gnyis ka zhu nas byang sems la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12618: de nas dkyil 'khor kun kyang 'od du zhu ste
NK054(yi)001:12619: de nyid la thim ste 'od phung gcig tu gyur
NK054(yi)001:12622: rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pas kyang dngos grub blang ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12623: thabs la de ltar lag tu blang bar bstan to
NK054(yi)001:12624: // de'i don ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'byung yang dbyings ye shes su 'dus pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:12625: bsgrub pa nyams su blang ba'i dus su bdag sngon
NK054(yi)001:12626: gyi bud+d+ha yin pas bdag gi sras su bder gshegs
NK054(yi)001:12628: rig pa lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems kyi phung po las yig 'brur byung /
NK054(yi)001:12629: de las cho ga gsum gyis kun tu bzang po yab yum gyi skur bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12630: yab yum mkha' gsang byin brlab /
NK054(yi)001:12632: byang sems mkha' la babs pa las /
NK054(yi)001:12633: cha dang po las gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par gyur /
NK054(yi)001:12634: cha gnyis pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor yig 'bru bkod /
NK054(yi)001:12635: yig 'bru de dag ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du yang byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK054(yi)001:12636: dbus kyi h'u dang m+aum gnyis las sngags brjod pas mi bskyod pa yab yum du bskyed /
NK054(yi)001:12637: dzahs bton 'bru gsum gyis brtan pa nas bzung ste
NK054(yi)001:12638: 'od zer bsdus te rtsa ba'i sku la thim pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12639: bar gong du bstan pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12640: mi bskyod pa yab yum bdag kun bzang gi thugs kar thim /
NK054(yi)001:12641: kun bzang yab yum mi bskyod pa yab yum du gyur bar bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12642: de ltar mkhar bskyed pa dang tshur bsdus nas rtsa
NK054(yi)001:12643: ba la thim pa rnams mthun par dkyil 'khor rgyas
NK054(yi)001:12645: bdag gi sras su rgyal ba bskyed pa yin no //
NK054(yi)001:12646: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bskyed pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:12647: mi bskyod pa gtso bo'i thugs ka nas bdag sngon
NK054(yi)001:12648: gyi kun bzang gi cha 'dzin pa lta bu kun
NK054(yi)001:12650: dkyil 'khor nub phyogs kyi sgor cha lugs lha'i cha
NK054(yi)001:12651: lugs 'od kyi ngo bor gnas pa de dkyil 'khor
NK054(yi)001:12652: la g.yon bskor gsum byas brkyang phyag byas nas tsog
NK054(yi)001:12654: dkyil 'khor lha rnams la gsol ba gdab pa ni //
NK054(yi)001:12655: sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni //
NK054(yi)001:12657: bdag sbyor cig gi bar bskul nas lha rnams las
NK054(yi)001:12658: thugs ye shes lnga'i rtags 'od zer lnga gsal ba
NK054(yi)001:12659: rno la myur ba byung bas rang lus la thim
NK054(yi)001:12660: pas lus ngag yid gsum thun mong dang khyad par
NK054(yi)001:12661: gyi sgrib pa rnam sbyangs na /
NK054(yi)001:12662: de'i zhar la lus kyang mi dmigs nas yid kun
NK054(yi)001:12663: gzhi ma skyes pa'i rtags dkar la 'tsher ba me
NK054(yi)001:12664: mar lta bu zhig snang lha rnams kyi thugs ka
NK054(yi)001:12665: nas sku gsung thugs kyi rtags yig 'bru gsum byung
NK054(yi)001:12666: nas 'od la thim pas h'u du gyur /
NK054(yi)001:12667: h'u rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bkyags te /
NK054(yi)001:12668: me tog la bung ba lding ba'i tshul du mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar thim /
NK054(yi)001:12670: de nas byang chub sems thugs kar thim pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12671: rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas yum gyi bka' la babs /
NK054(yi)001:12672: yab yum gnyis ka zhu nas byang chub sems la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12673: lha thams cad zhu nas byang sems la thim /
NK054(yi)001:12674: 'od phung zhig tu gyur pa sngar ltar dngos grub blang ba'i ngo bo yang yin /
NK054(yi)001:12675: yid la h'u dran pa tsam gyis byang sems h'u du gyur /
NK054(yi)001:12676: cho ga gsum gyi mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi skur gsal /
NK054(yi)001:12678: brdas bskul gnyis su med par rol pa'i byang sems
NK054(yi)001:12679: mkha' la babs pa'i cha dang pos gzhal yas khang
NK054(yi)001:12680: du gyur / cha gnyis pas yig 'bru rnams gdan
NK054(yi)001:12681: thog tu bkod nas lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi
NK054(yi)001:12682: dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bskyed pa ni de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:12683: gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12684: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin ye shes lngas dbang bskur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:12685: sku gsung thugs byin brlab bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12686: dbang dang byin brlabs snang tshul ni /
NK054(yi)001:12688: gong du byang sems 'khor la thim pa de nas
NK054(yi)001:12689: phyogs bcur bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa'i de bzhin
NK054(yi)001:12690: gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid chen
NK054(yi)001:12692: bdag nyid chen po zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12693: chos thams cad rang byung gi ye shes su dbyer
NK054(yi)001:12694: med pa'i kun bzang gi go phye ba'i 'khor gyi
NK054(yi)001:12695: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la /
NK054(yi)001:12696: ye shes lnga'i dbang bskur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:12697: sku gsung thugs lnga'i byin rlabs bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'og nas 'byung ba 'di /
NK054(yi)001:12700: thugs dbyer med pa'i mi phyed pa'i don gyis rdo
NK054(yi)001:12701: rje rang snang mi 'gag pa sgyu 'phrul chos kyi
NK054(yi)001:12702: dbyings su mi phyed pa'i d+r+wa ba gzhi de las
NK054(yi)001:12703: snang bas na phyung ngo zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12705: de la gong du kun bzang yab yum byang chub
NK054(yi)001:12706: sems su dbyer med par bstan pa'i gtan tshigs kyis
NK054(yi)001:12707: / rjes 'jug rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba yang /
NK054(yi)001:12708: rnal 'byor pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer spros te phyogs bcu'i bud+d+ha nam mkha' la bsdus /
NK054(yi)001:12709: kun kyang yab yum thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12710: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bdag la dbang bskur ba'o don du gtibs par bsgom la /
NK054(yi)001:12711: de nas sngags brjod pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:12712: ma h+aa sh+au h+ya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes brjod de /
NK054(yi)001:12716: sh+au nya t+aa stong po nyid /
NK054(yi)001:12719: swa b+h+aa wa rnam par dag pa /
NK054(yi)001:12720: +aat+ma ko&a ham nga'i bdag yin zhe'o //
NK054(yi)001:12721: stong pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje ltar mi
NK054(yi)001:12722: phyed pa'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa bdag yin
NK054(yi)001:12724: mi bskyod pa'i gtsug tu b+ha ga w+aan mi bskyod
NK054(yi)001:12725: pa sku mdog sngon po rdo rje dril bu can
NK054(yi)001:12726: pad zla'i gdan la bzhugs pa wal gyis bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12727: phyin ci ma log par gyub par rtogs pa'i dus
NK054(yi)001:12728: na stong pa chen po'i ye shes zhes bya ste
NK054(yi)001:12729: / bdag stong pa chen po'i ye shes yin no ba'i nga rgyal bya /
NK054(yi)001:12730: ma h+aa +aa dar+sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ka & ham zhes brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12733: dpral bar rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo dril bu can bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12734: kun gzhi'i rnam shes dag pa me long lta bu'i
NK054(yi)001:12735: ye shes bdag yin no snyam pa'i nga rgyal bya
NK054(yi)001:12736: / ma h+aa pra t+ya bek+sha na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12737: ltag par snang mtha' dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu can bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12738: pra t+y+aa bek+sha na zhes pa so sor rtogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12739: yid kyi shes pa gnas su dag pa so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes bdag yin no zhes bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12740: ma h+aa sa ma t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma konya ham zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12741: rna ltag g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog
NK054(yi)001:12742: ser po rin po che dang dril bu can bsgom
NK054(yi)001:12743: / sa ma t+aa zhes pa ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ste mnyam nyid ye shes yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:12744: nyon mongs can gyi yid dag pa mnyam nyid ye shes yin no bar bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12745: ma h+aa kri t+ya nush+th+aa na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12746: rna ltag g.yon du don grub ljang gu ral gri dril bu can bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12747: kri t+y+aa nush+th+aa bya ba grub ces pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12748: sgo lnga'i shes pa gnas su dag pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes bdag yin no bar bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12749: de'i dus su dkyil 'khor spyi la dbu rgyan gdags
NK054(yi)001:12750: pa ni rigs lnga la dbu rgyan rigs lnga ste
NK054(yi)001:12751: / rnam snang la rnam snang gis gtso bo byed /
NK054(yi)001:12752: mi bskyod pa mtshog mar bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12754: mi bskyod pa rna ltag g.yon du bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12755: snang mtha' la gtso bo snang mtha' /
NK054(yi)001:12756: mi bskyod pa ltag par bzhugs /
NK054(yi)001:12757: don grub la gtso bo don grub /
NK054(yi)001:12758: mi bskyod pa rna ltag g.yon du bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12759: phyi ma sems dpa' rnams la shar dang shar lho'i
NK054(yi)001:12760: sems dpa' gnyis lha ma yin gyi thub pa dang
NK054(yi)001:12761: bcas pa la rnam snang kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:12762: lho dang lho nub kyi sems dpa' gnyis mi'i thub pa la rin 'byung kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:12763: byang dang byang shar gyi sems dpa' gnyis dud 'gro'i thub pa la don grub kho na'o //
NK054(yi)001:12764: khro bo bzhi lha'i thub pa dang dmyal ba'i thub pa la mi bskyod pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12765: kun tu bzang po yab yum gnyis rigs thams cad
NK054(yi)001:12766: kyi bdag nyid yin pas thams cad kho'i dbu rgyan
NK054(yi)001:12767: du 'ong bsam byas kyang mi sto ste /
NK054(yi)001:12768: rnal 'byor pa'i blo ngo la byed na dngos kun bzang gi gtso bo byas pa'i rigs gazhi'o //
NK054(yi)001:12769: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:12770: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12773: ta th+aa ga ta nge bzhin gshegs pa /
NK054(yi)001:12777: swa b+h+aa wa rnam par dag pa /
NK054(yi)001:12779: don du na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
NK054(yi)001:12780: sku rdo rje chen po rnam par dag pa bdag
NK054(yi)001:12781: yin no zhe'o // sngags brjod pas lha thams cad
NK054(yi)001:12782: kyi spyi bo dung khang gi nang du zla ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12783: gdan la sku rdo rje sku mdog dkar po zhal
NK054(yi)001:12784: gcig phyag gnyis g.yas 'khor lo g.yon dril bu /
NK054(yi)001:12785: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
NK054(yi)001:12786: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo gyis mtshan pa bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12787: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa w+aa ka badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12789: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje
NK054(yi)001:12790: chen po rnam par dag pa bdag yin no ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12791: nga rgyal bya / mgrin par pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi
NK054(yi)001:12792: steng du gsung rdo rje sku mdog dmar po pad+ma
NK054(yi)001:12794: thugs kar pad+ma +aam gis mtshan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12795: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:12797: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje
NK054(yi)001:12798: chen po rnam par dag pa bdag yin no ba'i
NK054(yi)001:12799: nga rgyal bya / thugs kar nyi ma'i thog tu
NK054(yi)001:12800: thugs rdo rje sngon po rdo rje dang dril bu
NK054(yi)001:12801: nga rgyal bya / can / de'i thugs kar rdo rje h'u gyis mtshan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12802: mo sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu
NK054(yi)001:12803: r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham
NK054(yi)001:12804: zhes pa / a nu r+aa ga ni chags pa chen po ste /
NK054(yi)001:12805: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa chen po'i rdo rje bdag yin no zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12806: lte bar rin po che zur brgyad kyi steng du chags pa'i rdo rje sku mdog ser po /
NK054(yi)001:12809: de'i thugs kar rin po che s+w+aas mtshan pa bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12810: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa p+au dza badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12811: p+au dza ni mchod pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12812: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rdo
NK054(yi)001:12813: rje chen po rnam par dag pa bdag yin no
NK054(yi)001:12815: gsang ba'i gnas su chos 'byung gru gsum gyi thog
NK054(yi)001:12816: tu mchod pa'i rdo rje sku mdog ljang gu ral
NK054(yi)001:12817: gri dang dril bu can bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:12818: de'i thugs kar ral gri h+aas mtshan pa bsgom mo //
NK054(yi)001:12819: kun tu bzang pos gong du gsungs pa'i sngags de ltar brjod pas /
NK054(yi)001:12821: chos thams cad ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs
NK054(yi)001:12822: yon tan phrin las lnga'i ngang du thim par gyur
NK054(yi)001:12823: / gsal bar gyur ni thugs ye shes rtogs par gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12825: thugs ye shes rtogs pa gong nas gong du 'bar bar gyur to //
NK054(yi)001:12826: yang na bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ye shes lnga dang
NK054(yi)001:12827: sku gsung thugs lngar dbyer med pa la ni thim
NK054(yi)001:12828: pa zhes bya'o // gsal bar gyur ni /
NK054(yi)001:12829: lha bzhi bcu'i sku'i yon na phun sum tshogs pa gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12831: kha dog dang 'od 'bar ba de nyid ye shes kyi ngo bor lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12832: yang na thim par gyur pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:12833: ye shes lnga'i dbang rgyun mi chad par bdag ye
NK054(yi)001:12834: shes lnga dang dbyer med pa la ni thim pa
NK054(yi)001:12835: zhes brjod do // gsal bar gyur ni /
NK054(yi)001:12836: lha gsum gyis sku gsung thugs gzi byin can du byas pa ni gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12838: yon tan phrin las gnyis kyi gzi byin dang ldan pa la 'bar zhes brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:12839: rang bzhin gsung gi dkyil 'khor la /
NK054(yi)001:12840: skye med don gyi gsung ni /
NK054(yi)001:12841: e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK054(yi)001:12843: e ma hoh zhes pa ngam zhing ngo mtshar ba ste /
NK054(yi)001:12845: sgra dang ming tshig las 'das te /
NK054(yi)001:12846: sgra dang ming tshig ma 'gag par snang ba de
NK054(yi)001:12847: dag kyang chos sku'i ngang du dbyer med par dam
NK054(yi)001:12848: pa'i don gyis e ma hoh ngo mtshar zhes pa
NK054(yi)001:12849: / skye med don gyi gsung gang du'ang ma grub
NK054(yi)001:12850: smra brjod las 'das pa nyid rang snang mi 'gag
NK054(yi)001:12851: pa'i gsung cir yang snang la /
NK054(yi)001:12852: snang ba de nyid kyis so so'i dgos pa skong
NK054(yi)001:12853: la de lta na'ang skye med kyi don las ma
NK054(yi)001:12856: sgra'i bye brag sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang
NK054(yi)001:12857: de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dad la mi 'gag
NK054(yi)001:12858: pa'i don gyis brda ston cing don nyams su myong
NK054(yi)001:12859: bar byed pa ni rmad du byung ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:12860: de'i chos de su la mnga' na /
NK054(yi)001:12861: tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing spangs mkhyen lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12862: bud+d+ha phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing dus bzhir gshegs pa
NK054(yi)001:12863: kun gyi skye med don gyi gsung thugs la brnag
NK054(yi)001:12864: pa kho na'o // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das //
NK054(yi)001:12865: zhes pa skye med don gyi gsung ni /
NK054(yi)001:12866: sgra dang ming dang tshig dang /
NK054(yi)001:12867: phyi nang gi chos las ma gtogs pa'i brjod bya'i
NK054(yi)001:12868: ngo bo zhig gud na 'di 'drar mi phyed pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12869: phyir / brjod pa tha snyad kyis mtshon pa'i sgra dang /
NK054(yi)001:12870: mtshon par byed pa'i ming dang /
NK054(yi)001:12871: rjod bya'i tshig gi tshogs kun gyi tha snyad thams
NK054(yi)001:12872: cad las 'das te ngo bo brjod pa dang bral
NK054(yi)001:12873: ba'o // sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung //
NK054(yi)001:12875: skye med don gyi gsung brjod pa dang bral ba nyid /
NK054(yi)001:12877: brjod pa'i chos sna tshogs ma lus pa nyid /
NK054(yi)001:12878: sna tshogs ni 'khor ba dang lam pa dang 'das pa'i tha snyad thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:12879: sgra ni bem po dang rig pa gnyis 'dus pa rnams te /
NK054(yi)001:12880: don gyi gsung mi 'gag pa las gdul bya rnams
NK054(yi)001:12881: kyi blo ngo dang 'phrod pa gsal bar rang snang
NK054(yi)001:12883: sprul pa'i gsung yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:12884: gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni //
NK054(yi)001:12886: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bud+d+ha'i skye med don gyi
NK054(yi)001:12887: gsung ma bcos pa'i ngo bo spros pa'i mtshan ma
NK054(yi)001:12888: thams cad dang bral ba la ni gcig ces bya'o
NK054(yi)001:12889: // 'on kyang spos bral phyogs gcig pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:12890: rang snang mi 'gag pa'i rtsa gyis skye med don
NK054(yi)001:12891: gyi gsung de brgyud pa dang cig car du mthong
NK054(yi)001:12892: bar bya ba'i thabs su brjod pa tshig gi gsung
NK054(yi)001:12893: yan lag sum brgya drug cu la sogs pa lta
NK054(yi)001:12895: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:12896: bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa /
NK054(yi)001:12897: gong du bstan pa ltar grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12898: ngo bo snang tsam nyid na skye med don gyi
NK054(yi)001:12899: gsung las ma g.yos par bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK054(yi)001:12900: ste / khams gsum gyi chos la ma khyab pa med pas ma 'gag pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12902: dbyer med pa gsum gyi ngo bor bzhugs so //
NK054(yi)001:12903: sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags //
NK054(yi)001:12905: dag snang gi dbang du theg pa rim pa dgu
NK054(yi)001:12906: so so ni tshan du ma 'dres pa mtshon pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12907: ming dang / theg pa so so'i blo ngo bzhin du snang ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:12908: 'gro drug gi skad so so dang mthun pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12909: phyi nang gi chos thams cad kyang tshig gi tha
NK054(yi)001:12910: snyad kyis gtan la phab kyang so so'i blo ngo
NK054(yi)001:12911: bzhin du don dang mthun zhing tshigs so sor gsal
NK054(yi)001:12912: ba la grags zhes brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:12913: thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya'i mchog /
NK054(yi)001:12914: ces pa gsung ni ma 'gag pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12916: don thog tu phebs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:12917: mtshon bya don gyi thog tu phyin pa'i phyir na gsung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:12919: snod bcud kyi chos thams cad ma 'gag par snang bas kyang gsung /
NK054(yi)001:12920: so so'i dgos pa skong zhing don mtshon pas kyang gsung /
NK054(yi)001:12921: theg pa gang gi sgo nas gzhal kyang rang rang
NK054(yi)001:12922: gi brjod bya'i don gyi ngo bo de gtan la
NK054(yi)001:12924: gzhug skye med don gyi gsung 'bras bu snang bas kyang gsung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:12925: de bas na chos thams cad la gsung gi mu
NK054(yi)001:12926: dras khyab cing gsung gi phyag rgya las mi 'da'
NK054(yi)001:12927: ba'o // mchog ni tshig gi gsung ma 'gag /
NK054(yi)001:12928: don gyi gsung ma dmig te dbyer med pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12929: rig pa byin rlabs kyi gsung ni /
NK054(yi)001:12930: rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las //
NK054(yi)001:12931: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:12932: gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum du 'brel ba'i rgyud thams
NK054(yi)001:12933: cad las mchog tu gyur ba ni gsang ba'i snying
NK054(yi)001:12935: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i brjod bya'i don ni gsang ba'i snying po ste /
NK054(yi)001:12936: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po /
NK054(yi)001:12937: bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang //
NK054(yi)001:12939: bde ba chen po sems kyi chos nyid spros pa'i
NK054(yi)001:12940: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba rang snang mi
NK054(yi)001:12943: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgra thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:12944: pad+ma'i ngang gyu na zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:12945: snang yang snang stong dbyer med pa sems nyid kho na'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:12946: sgra lta bu gyur pa ni rtogs pa ste snang
NK054(yi)001:12947: stong gi phyogs 'dzin thams cad bral ba'i rig pa
NK054(yi)001:12948: mngon du gyur pa'i gnas skabs na /
NK054(yi)001:12949: grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra //
NK054(yi)001:12951: grol ba ni 'khor ba las thar pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12952: thar pa ni 'khor bas ma zin te 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:12953: de mngon du byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang /
NK054(yi)001:12954: lam ni tshogs sbyor mthong sgom pa rnams kyi tha snyad thams cad dang /
NK054(yi)001:12955: 'khor ba'i sgra ni bem rig 'dus pa'i sgra mtha' dag go //
NK054(yi)001:12956: ji snyed brjod kyang gsung mchog ste //
NK054(yi)001:12958: gong du bsdus pa'i sgra gsum pa ji skad brjod kyang brjod pa'i dus nyid na /
NK054(yi)001:12959: snang stong dbyer med pa don gyi gsung kho na bas mchog ste /
NK054(yi)001:12960: de nyid rang snang bar bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:12961: theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //
NK054(yi)001:12962: zhes pa theg pa dgu dang /
NK054(yi)001:12963: log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad //
NK054(yi)001:12964: ces pa 'gro drug gi skad ma lus pa thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:12965: byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdu //
NK054(yi)001:12966: zhes byang chub ni go 'phang chen po chos sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:12967: rdo rje chos thams cad byang chub kyi ngang du dbyer med pa don gyi gsung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:12968: thams cad byang chub kyi sems rang snang gi ye
NK054(yi)001:12969: shes chen po snang stong dbyer med pa'i gsung las
NK054(yi)001:12970: ma g.yos shing / mi gnyis pas bsdus zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12971: bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags /
NK054(yi)001:12973: bsdus pa don gyi gsung nyid mi 'gag pa'i rtsal
NK054(yi)001:12974: las gdul bya phyogs bcu rnams su sgra gnyis kyi
NK054(yi)001:12975: bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni grags
NK054(yi)001:12976: zhes bya'o // grags pa nyid ma 'gag par snang
NK054(yi)001:12977: tsam nyid na snang stong gi 'du shes bral ba
NK054(yi)001:12978: la ni ma chags zhes bya /
NK054(yi)001:12979: brjod pa sgra'i bye brag thams cad de'i ngang du dbyer med pa la ni gsung zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:12980: gsung ba nyid na brjod du med //
NK054(yi)001:12982: thams cad mkhyen pas gdul bya'i dbang po mtho dman
NK054(yi)001:12983: gyi ngor theg pa mtho dman gyi bye brag bsam
NK054(yi)001:12984: gyis mi khyab pa zhig gsungs kyang /
NK054(yi)001:12985: ngo bo la gsung brjod thams cad dang bral bar sems nyid du lhun gyis grub par /
NK054(yi)001:12987: b+ha ga w+aa na gyi mod sde nas kyang /
NK054(yi)001:12988: ngas ni chos tshig gcig kyang ma gsungs zhes pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:12989: gsung gi las la gnyis kyi /
NK054(yi)001:12991: brjod med de bzhin sna tshogs sgra //
NK054(yi)001:12993: skye med don gyi gsung brjod du med pa las
NK054(yi)001:12994: mi 'gag par rang snang ba gong du bstan pa
NK054(yi)001:12995: de bzhin / 'khor 'das lam pa'i sgra gong du bshad pa bzhin sna tshogs snang /
NK054(yi)001:12997: kun la grags shing so sor 'jal //
NK054(yi)001:12998: zhes pa lam pa rnams la rang gi dbang po
NK054(yi)001:12999: mtho dman gyi bye brag gi blo dang mthun par
NK054(yi)001:13000: mtho dman kun las grags shing mtshon bya'i don so
NK054(yi)001:13002: 'gro drug la yang rang gi skad dang mthun par grags shing don so sor 'jal bar byed /
NK054(yi)001:13003: tshig gcig gis don so sor 'jal bar byed pa'i dpe ni /
NK054(yi)001:13004: dper na de bzhin sprid sangs bzhin //
NK054(yi)001:13006: b+ha ga wa na gyi ring la nad pa zhig yod /
NK054(yi)001:13008: sman pa zhig gi sman byed pa nad yun ring bas ma sos te /
NK054(yi)001:13009: so sor bsam pa gsum byung /
NK054(yi)001:13010: nad pas kyang zas nor zad shi na'ang rung snyam /
NK054(yi)001:13011: bud med kyis nad yun ni ring /
NK054(yi)001:13012: kho bdag shi na 'ang nga bdag la mi bdag po zhig dang 'phrad snyam /
NK054(yi)001:13013: sman pas kyang da kho'i mchan du 'dug yun ring bas rnyed pa ma rnyed /
NK054(yi)001:13014: kho shi na nga bdag logs su rnyed pa tshol bsam pa'i dus byung ba'i tshe /
NK054(yi)001:13015: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba sgo
NK054(yi)001:13016: drung du byon nas bsam pa gsum mkhyen nas sprid
NK054(yi)001:13017: pa zhig bsang bas de la so sor go ba
NK054(yi)001:13019: rin chen srog dang ma bral na //
NK054(yi)001:13020: sgyu ma'i nor ni gsog tu yod //
NK054(yi)001:13023: phyi nas cir 'gyur cha med kyi //
NK054(yi)001:13024: snga ma legs par gsol dang rung //
NK054(yi)001:13027: nor gyi mchog ni snying rje yin //
NK054(yi)001:13029: gsum ka so sor 'bad pas nad pa sos par gyur skad /
NK054(yi)001:13030: gsung sgra gcig la don so sor go ba'i brda yi /
NK054(yi)001:13031: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig pa'i sgra yis 'gro ba ris drug dang /
NK054(yi)001:13032: lam pa mtho dman thams cad kyis so so'i don rig pa la 'jal bar go ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13033: de ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin //
NK054(yi)001:13034: zhes pa sgra gcig gis don thams cad go ba'i
NK054(yi)001:13035: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung de ni lam pa las
NK054(yi)001:13036: blang gyur pa 'bras bu'i gsung yin pas mchog /
NK054(yi)001:13037: gsung gi brjod pa thams cad de las 'phros shing
NK054(yi)001:13038: der 'dus pas mtha' gnyis las rgyal bas kyang rgyal
NK054(yi)001:13039: po / thams cad 'dus pas kyang rgyal po yin /
NK054(yi)001:13041: theg pa mtho dman bsam yas kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13043: theg pa tho dman rim pa dgu'i nang tshan mi
NK054(yi)001:13044: 'dra ba bsam yas pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid
NK054(yi)001:13045: kyi gsung las tshig kyang ma gsungs te /
NK054(yi)001:13046: brjod du med pa'i ngang las don gyi gsung me
NK054(yi)001:13047: long g.ya' dag pa dang 'dra bar rkyen gyis cir
NK054(yi)001:13048: yang 'char bya 'char byed kyi rtsol ba med /
NK054(yi)001:13049: dpe de bzhin don gyi gsung ma 'gag pa cir
NK054(yi)001:13050: yang 'char ba'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs kyang gsung
NK054(yi)001:13051: bya gsung byed kyi rtsol mi mnga' yang /
NK054(yi)001:13052: gdul bya'i thabs su so sor thos //
NK054(yi)001:13054: gdul bya nyan thos pa la rang blo dang mthun pa'i thabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa thos /
NK054(yi)001:13055: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs su /
NK054(yi)001:13056: rang rang gi gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos te /
NK054(yi)001:13057: theg pa phyi nang rnams gdul bya'i blo la snang ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13058: de bas na lung las kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13059: ston pa de bzhin nyid 'ba' zhig las gsung bya gsung byed med kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13060: de bzhin nyid phyogs gcig pa'i spros bral lta bu ma yin te /
NK054(yi)001:13061: dag ma dag gi sgra'i bye brag thams cad de bzhin nyid la rdzogs /
NK054(yi)001:13062: de bzhin nyid la lhun gyis grub /
NK054(yi)001:13063: de bzhin nyid ma 'gag par snang ba'i dpes bstan pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:13064: de nyid don gyi gsung du bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13065: ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang //
NK054(yi)001:13067: bde bar gshegs pas don mtshon par byed pa'i bstan
NK054(yi)001:13068: pa rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa ma lus pa thams
NK054(yi)001:13069: cad rjod byed kyi tshig gi tha snyad kun brjod
NK054(yi)001:13070: pa ma 'gag par snang yang don gyi gsung de
NK054(yi)001:13071: bzhin nyid ston pa'i dgongs pa chos sku skye ba
NK054(yi)001:13072: med pa'i ngang las tshig gcig kyang gsungs pa med
NK054(yi)001:13073: de rtsol ba bral ba'i phyir ro //
NK054(yi)001:13074: yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung //
NK054(yi)001:13075: zhes pa rig pa'i gsung ni /
NK054(yi)001:13076: rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes gang du'ang
NK054(yi)001:13077: ma grub pa cir yang snang ba'i ngo bo yin
NK054(yi)001:13078: pa ste / de'i phyir na yi ge med pas smra brjod dang bral te /
NK054(yi)001:13079: ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang //
NK054(yi)001:13080: zhes pa sprul pa'i gsung bzhin tshig gi brjod mi mnga' ba'i ngo bo'o //
NK054(yi)001:13081: 'o na gdul bya'i don ched dam zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:13082: thugs rje'i gsung gi byin rlabs kyis //
NK054(yi)001:13084: de ni thugs rig pa nyid spros pa dang bral
NK054(yi)001:13085: ba'i 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la bsgos pas
NK054(yi)001:13087: de'i ngo bo nyid la ni tshig gis brjod pas mi reg pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13088: 'on kyang rig pa khyab pa chen po nyid las chos thams cad dang sgra ril /
NK054(yi)001:13089: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang bdag nyid chen por lhun
NK054(yi)001:13090: gyis grub pa'i byin rlabs ni yang snang ba ste
NK054(yi)001:13091: / 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal //
NK054(yi)001:13092: zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje mi 'gag
NK054(yi)001:13093: pa'i rtsal las spyir na brda sprod par byed pa'i
NK054(yi)001:13094: chos thams cad kyang yin la /
NK054(yi)001:13095: mdor na theg pa rim dgu'i gdul bya rnams kyi
NK054(yi)001:13096: so so'i blo mi 'dra ba sna tshogs kyi don
NK054(yi)001:13097: so sor brda sprad pas gsal ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13098: gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog /
NK054(yi)001:13099: ces pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dgos pa skong ba gsal ba tsam nyid na /
NK054(yi)001:13100: gsung brjod pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rig pa
NK054(yi)001:13101: spros pa dang bral ba rdo rje lta bu las
NK054(yi)001:13102: ma g.yos par snang stong gi mtha' dang bral bas
NK054(yi)001:13103: mchog go // de la ni tshig gi tha snyad
NK054(yi)001:13104: du kun tu bzang po'i gsung zhes kyang brjod de
NK054(yi)001:13105: mchog go // / gsung lnga lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13106: de bzhin gsung gi 'gro don rnams //
NK054(yi)001:13107: zhes pa gong du thugs rje'i gsung mi 'gag par bstan pa de bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:13108: thams cad mkhyen pa rang ngo la gdul bya so
NK054(yi)001:13109: so la tshig so sor brjod pa med bzhin du
NK054(yi)001:13110: / gdul bya'i ngo la brjod par snang ba'i gsung
NK054(yi)001:13111: theg pa rim pa dgu yis 'gro don rnams lhun
NK054(yi)001:13112: / gyis grub ste / de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos kyang //
NK054(yi)001:13113: zhes pa skye med don gyi gsung spros pa med
NK054(yi)001:13114: pa'i ngang las gsung bya gsung byed kyi rtsol ba
NK054(yi)001:13116: dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:13117: zhes pa brag ca'i sgra ni 'bod mkhan gyis tshig
NK054(yi)001:13118: gi tha snyad cig bzlas pa rnams gsal por thos
NK054(yi)001:13119: kyang brag la de dag gi rtsol ba med pa
NK054(yi)001:13120: bzhin du / gnyis su med pa'i rang rig pa
NK054(yi)001:13121: thugs rje chen po'i gsung la brjod bya rjod byed
NK054(yi)001:13122: kyi rtsol ba ma dmigs kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13123: gdul bya dbang po mtho dman gyi bye brag gis
NK054(yi)001:13124: rang blo dang mthun par theg pa dgur snang ba'o
NK054(yi)001:13125: // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK054(yi)001:13126: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13127: 'dir gsung gi le'u stod lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:13128: smad 'bras bu mthar phyin pa gsung lnga'i 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:13129: rnal 'byor pa'i shes bya nyams su blang bya gnyis
NK054(yi)001:13130: ngo bo la so sor brjod pa med bzhin du
NK054(yi)001:13131: / gdul bya la brjod pa ltar snang ba ni 'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor te /
NK054(yi)001:13132: de'ang gdul bya'i ngos nas bsam gyis mi khyab kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13133: 'dir gsung lngar bsdus te bstan pa ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor bsdu'o //
NK054(yi)001:13134: gsang sngags kyi le'u zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13135: sngags lam dang 'bras bu'i yon tan thams cad sngags las snang bas /
NK054(yi)001:13136: gzhal yas khang nas bzung ste /
NK054(yi)001:13137: lha rnams kyi sngags dang dbang bskur ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:13139: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la sogs pa'i sngags rnams bstan pa ste bdun pa'i bshad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13141: // da ni le'u brgyad pa la 'jug ste /
NK054(yi)001:13142: de yang gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum las lam /
NK054(yi)001:13143: rgyud kyi dngos po bcu las phyag rgya /
NK054(yi)001:13144: dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis las lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thugs kyi dkyil 'khor /
NK054(yi)001:13145: le'u stod lam pa phyag rgya gcig pa yan chad kyi spyod yul /
NK054(yi)001:13146: le'u smad snang ba rnam par 'byed pa zag med kyi lam pa'i spyod yul lo //
NK054(yi)001:13148: chos gtan la dbab pa'i le'u na theg pa thams cad gsang sngags su bsdus /
NK054(yi)001:13149: le'u bzhi par gsang sngags kyi bsgrub pa nyams su len pa'i yig 'bru bstan /
NK054(yi)001:13150: lnga pas zhar byung bsgrub pa bstan /
NK054(yi)001:13151: drug pas yig 'bru las sku'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan /
NK054(yi)001:13152: bdun pas de bskyed pa'i rkyen sngags bstan /
NK054(yi)001:13153: brgyad pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgya bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:13154: phyag rgya la yang bzhi ste /
NK054(yi)001:13157: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK054(yi)001:13158: 'phro 'du phrin las kyi phyag rgya dang bzhi'o //
NK054(yi)001:13159: sku phyag rgya chen po la gnyis te /
NK054(yi)001:13160: ma skyes pa chos kyi sku'i phyag rgya dang /
NK054(yi)001:13161: ma 'gag pa gzugs kyi sku'i phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13162: de la yang rgyas par ni /
NK054(yi)001:13163: dgongs pa 'dus pa dang gsal bkra'i yi ger bkod pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:13164: rang bzhin lhun grub kyi sku phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK054(yi)001:13165: rang bzhin lhun grub mtshon pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK054(yi)001:13166: lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi sku phyag rgya chen po'o //
NK054(yi)001:13167: rang bzhin lhun grub ni rigs lnga la sogs pa'i sku'o //
NK054(yi)001:13168: rang bzhin lhun grub mtshon pa ni ris su bris
NK054(yi)001:13169: pa lugs su blugs pa 'bur du gtod pa rnams
NK054(yi)001:13170: so // lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13171: chos kyi phyag rgya la bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya ni yig 'bru bsgom pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13172: brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya ni sngags bzla ba la sogs pa ngag gi brjod pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13173: thugs kyi phyag rgyal bsam pa thugs kyi phyag rgya /
NK054(yi)001:13174: bca' ba thugs kyi phyag rgya /
NK054(yi)001:13176: 'phro 'du phrin las kyi phyag rgya ni kun la 'gro ste /
NK054(yi)001:13178: le'u brgyad pa la gsum gyi lo rgyus kyi tshul gyis mdor bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13180: zhes bya ba tshig gi de ma thag pa ni le'u bdun pa'i rjes so //
NK054(yi)001:13181: don gyi de ma thag pa ni spyir ni bskyed
NK054(yi)001:13182: pa'i rim pa mthar phyin nas yan lag lnga lha
NK054(yi)001:13183: lnga bcu'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te phan
NK054(yi)001:13184: yon 'byung ba ni phyag rgya spros pa tshogs bsgrub
NK054(yi)001:13185: dang 'brel lo // sgos su dkyil 'khor bskyed rim
NK054(yi)001:13186: bsgom pa'i dus su ye shes bstims nas mchod pa
NK054(yi)001:13187: 'bul ba ste phyag rgya gar tshogs dang 'brel lo
NK054(yi)001:13188: dang 'brel lo // // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13189: thams cad dbyer med pa'i rgyal ba kun tu bzang pos so //
NK054(yi)001:13190: yan lag thams cad ces pa /
NK054(yi)001:13191: 'dir lus kyi yan lag lnga ni mgo bo la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK054(yi)001:13192: rtog pa'i yan lag ni phung po khams skye mched rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:13193: dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13194: yan lag dkyil 'khor lnga ru ye nas lhun gyis grub pa ni rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ste /
NK054(yi)001:13195: de yang sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las /
NK054(yi)001:13196: rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK054(yi)001:13197: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun //
NK054(yi)001:13198: rigs lnga bde gshegs yab yum gyi //
NK054(yi)001:13199: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
NK054(yi)001:13200: zhes pas phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga rigs
NK054(yi)001:13201: lnga yab yum nyi ma dang zer ltar khams dang
NK054(yi)001:13202: skye mched lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor de ltar
NK054(yi)001:13203: ye nas yin pa de la rnal 'byor pas shes
NK054(yi)001:13204: nas / lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
NK054(yi)001:13205: du bsgom pa ni rtog pa'i yan lag ye nas
NK054(yi)001:13206: lhun grub yin pa rnal 'byor pa'i blo la lhag
NK054(yi)001:13207: pa ting nge 'dzin du lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13208: lus kyi yan lag dang rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas
NK054(yi)001:13209: pa'i dkyil 'khor ye nas lhun grub yin pa ni
NK054(yi)001:13211: dbu mig rna ba sna lce la //
NK054(yi)001:13212: zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste //
NK054(yi)001:13214: lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la //
NK054(yi)001:13215: h'u zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste //
NK054(yi)001:13216: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis /
NK054(yi)001:13217: yan lag rigs lnga so so'i dkyil 'khor yin te /
NK054(yi)001:13218: mgo lus kyi spyi yin pas dbang po rnams kyang
NK054(yi)001:13219: tshang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lhun gyis grub
NK054(yi)001:13220: / lag pa g.yas pas skyon sel zhing yon tan
NK054(yi)001:13221: legs par byed de rdo rje rigs dang chos mthun
NK054(yi)001:13222: pas rdo rje rigs lhun gyis grub /
NK054(yi)001:13223: lag pa g.yon pas dgos pa thams cad dam du 'dzin par byed de /
NK054(yi)001:13224: rin chen rigs kyi bud+d+ha'i yon tan 'byung bas rin chen rigs lhun gyis grub /
NK054(yi)001:13225: rkang pa g.yas pas dang po 'dor zhing pha rol
NK054(yi)001:13226: gyi gnas slebs par byed pa las kyi rigs lhun
NK054(yi)001:13227: gyis grub / rkang pa g.yon pas mchong ba'i tshe
NK054(yi)001:13228: dam du brtan par byed pas pad+ma'i rigs lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:13229: gyis grub / grub / de ltar ye nas yin pa la lhun gyis grub pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13230: rtog pa zhe gnyis lhar byin gyis rlob pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:13231: yan lag lnga rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa gnyis te /
NK054(yi)001:13232: yin tshul gyi don shes nas rig pa la lon pa ni lta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13233: rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgoms te /
NK054(yi)001:13234: goms pas ched du ma byas pas brtsal ba mi
NK054(yi)001:13235: mnga' bzhin du snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting
NK054(yi)001:13236: nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:13237: gzung 'dzin gyi snang ba ma dmigs te /
NK054(yi)001:13238: thams cad lha'i snang ba min pa ma dmigs pas /
NK054(yi)001:13239: lha'i dkyil 'khor du gsal ba ni lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13240: de ltar ston pa'i le'u 'di ston pas go ba'i 'khor gyi ched du brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:13241: phyag rgya'i nges tshig dang rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya thun mong du bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13242: dang por rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ste /
NK054(yi)001:13243: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba mngon rdzogs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13245: gong gi yan lag gnyis kyi rtog pa thams cad /
NK054(yi)001:13247: der 'dzin gyi shes pa kun rdzob kyi cha med bzhin du mi 'gag par 'char ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:13248: snang ba bzhin du ma grub pa sgyu ma lta bu don dam pa gnyis /
NK054(yi)001:13250: dbyer med pa chu dang gsher ba bzhin dbyer med pa ni rang bzhin gyi gnas tshul lo //
NK054(yi)001:13253: gnas tshul gyi don de rang rig pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13254: thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya //
NK054(yi)001:13255: zhes pa snod bcud bem rig yul lnga la sogs
NK054(yi)001:13256: pa thams cad rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ngo bo nyid
NK054(yi)001:13257: du lhun gyis grub pa la 'da' ba med pa
NK054(yi)001:13258: ni rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ste /
NK054(yi)001:13259: de las mi 'da' zhing de'i rgya thebs pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13260: yin pa'i don de nyid lung dang bla ma'i stobs
NK054(yi)001:13261: kyis rtogs pas rig pa gzhi nyid du lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:13262: grub nas de'i ngang las mi 'da' ba ni lta
NK054(yi)001:13263: ba'i phyag rgya'o // de ltar bsgoms nas rang rig
NK054(yi)001:13264: pa'i mngon sum du gyur pas rtog pa gnyis po
NK054(yi)001:13265: thams cad yan lag lnga'i rtog pa lha lnga bcu'i
NK054(yi)001:13267: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rtog pa lha bzhi bcu
NK054(yi)001:13268: rtsa gnyis la sogs par rang snang ba ni gnas
NK054(yi)001:13269: pa'i don mngon du byas pas lhag pa'i phyag rgya
NK054(yi)001:13270: zhes bya ste / zag pa med pa'i lam yan chad kyi yul lo //
NK054(yi)001:13271: gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi //
NK054(yi)001:13274: theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i gzhung phyag rgya yang
NK054(yi)001:13275: gzhan las 'phags par bstan pa ste snying po yan
NK054(yi)001:13277: phyag rgya ni thog ma'i mu na chos thams cad
NK054(yi)001:13278: bshad pa'i don de'i rgyas thebs shing de las mi
NK054(yi)001:13280: mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge //
NK054(yi)001:13282: sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs kyis lag pa g.yas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13283: de'i sor mo lnga la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sran chung tsam lnga'i steng du /
NK054(yi)001:13288: srin lag la +aamh mathe'u chang la h+aam /
NK054(yi)001:13289: rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge //
NK054(yi)001:13290: zhes pa lag g.yon rin chen rigs kyi sor mo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sran chung tsam la /
NK054(yi)001:13296: lnga gnyis zung du sprad pa las //
NK054(yi)001:13298: lnga gnyis ni lag pa g.yas g.yon te /
NK054(yi)001:13299: de yang lag pa g.yas pa ni thabs sam kun rdzob bam ye shes so //
NK054(yi)001:13300: g.yon pa ni shes rab bam don dam pa'i dbyings so //
NK054(yi)001:13302: dbyer med pa chos sku'i ngo bo ste don phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu'o //
NK054(yi)001:13303: rtags phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rigs lnga yab
NK054(yi)001:13304: yum dbyer med pa las phyag rgya rnams 'byung ba'i
NK054(yi)001:13305: rgyu'o // lnga gnyis zung du sprad pa las /
NK054(yi)001:13306: g.yas g.yon gyi sor mo'i yi ge lnga tsho gnyis ni bcu ste /
NK054(yi)001:13307: thal mo sbyar nas yab yum zung du bsdebs pa ni sprad pa zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13308: de ni phyag rgya thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin
NK054(yi)001:13309: pas phyag rgya gang bca' na yang 'byung ba'i rgyu
NK054(yi)001:13310: yin no // lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu ni /
NK054(yi)001:13311: thal mo de nyid la rting pa phye ste /
NK054(yi)001:13312: dang m+aum gnyis rtse sbyar te //
NK054(yi)001:13314: lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo la yod pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:13315: g.yon pa'i gung mo la m+aum yod pa gnyis rtse sprad /
NK054(yi)001:13316: g.yas pa'i gung mo la h'u dang g.yon pa'i mdzub
NK054(yi)001:13317: mo'i rtse mo la l+aam yod pa rtse sprad de
NK054(yi)001:13318: / m+aum gnyis ma gtogs pa'i 'bru brgyad kyi sor mo rnam bsnol te rtse sprad pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13319: rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag yid gsum dus gsum gyi
NK054(yi)001:13320: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba
NK054(yi)001:13321: chen po ni chos sku ste sbyin pa'i rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13322: rigs lnga yab yum gyi phyag rgya ni /
NK054(yi)001:13323: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan //
NK054(yi)001:13325: lag pa g.yas pa gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur la ni 'bru bzhir sbas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13327: lag pa'i rgyab thugs kar klan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13328: h'u bsgreng ni gung mo'i rtse mo na h'u yod pa brkyangs te bsgreng ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13330: gung mo'i rtse mo'i h'u 'od du zhu ba las
NK054(yi)001:13331: rdo rje rtse lnga la 'od 'bar bar gyur par
NK054(yi)001:13332: bsam pa ste phyag rgya bcing ba dam tshig gi
NK054(yi)001:13333: phyag rgya / rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK054(yi)001:13334: rdo rje'i lte ba la h'u bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13335: zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //
NK054(yi)001:13336: zhes pa zla ba ni g.yon pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13338: zhes pa ni sor mo rnams gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur byas te /
NK054(yi)001:13339: 'bru sbas te dril bu dang bcas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13340: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten //
NK054(yi)001:13342: yum la 'khril zhing 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis brten pa ni yum la sku mnyes pa lta bu'o //
NK054(yi)001:13343: 'khyud pa'i tshul du byas pa ni phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13344: yum dngos su bsam pa las kyi phyag rgya ste yab yum 'khril ba'i tshul lo //
NK054(yi)001:13345: 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa ni lag pa g.yon pa g.yas pa bzhin byas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13346: m+aum ni gung mo ste bsgreng ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13347: de'i rtse mor m+aum 'od du zhu bas dril bu 'od 'bar ba bsam pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13348: bsam pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13349: gung mo bsgreng ba ni bca' ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13351: zhes pa lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo lnga las yab la 'khril ba'i tshul du bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13352: de ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13353: btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta //
NK054(yi)001:13354: zer ba yab la btud de zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis yab la blta ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13355: yab yum gnyis kyi phyag rgya bca' ba'i dus su sku gsal gdab pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13356: sku phyag rgya chen po ni spyir shes par bya ste 'agre'o //
NK054(yi)001:13357: rnam snang yab yum gyi phyag rgya ni lag pa
NK054(yi)001:13358: g.yas pa'i 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa
NK054(yi)001:13359: ni lag rgyab brang la klan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13360: mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i rtse mor +amo las 'khor lo 'od 'bar ba bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13362: zla brtul ni g.yon bskum pa ste khu tshur bcas
NK054(yi)001:13363: ba dril bu gsil zhing 'khril ba yum la 'khyud
NK054(yi)001:13364: pa'i tshul gyis chos yum la brten /
NK054(yi)001:13365: phyag rgya rnams kyi bshad pa mi bskyod pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13366: yum gyi phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yon pa'i 'bru
NK054(yi)001:13367: bzhi khu tshur bcangs te sbas nas thugs kar bkan
NK054(yi)001:13369: l+aam mdzub mo bsnol ba'i rtse mor l+aam la dril bu 'od 'bar ba bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13370: nyi ma lag pa g.yas pa 'bru sor mo lnga las yab la 'khril ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13371: yab la btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis yab la blta /
NK054(yi)001:13373: lag pa g.yas pa'i 'bru bzhi sbas pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13374: khu tshur bcangs nas thugs kar bkan /
NK054(yi)001:13375: s+w+aa g.yas pa'i mthe bong bsgreng ba'i rtse mor s+w+aa
NK054(yi)001:13376: las rin po cher gyur pa las s+w+aas mtshan pa
NK054(yi)001:13377: bsgom / zla ba g.yon pa ste 'bru sbas khu tshur bcangs nas dril bu gsil ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13378: 'khril bas yum la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis chos yum la brten //
NK054(yi)001:13379: de'i yul ste lag pa g.yon pa'i 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa gong bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:13380: m+aam mthe bong bsgreng ba'i rtse mor m+aam las dril bu 'od dang bcas pa bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13381: nyi ma g.yas pa'i 'bru sor mo lnga las yab la 'khril ba'i tshul lo //
NK054(yi)001:13382: yab la btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis yab la blta /
NK054(yi)001:13383: snang mtha' yab yum gyi mu dra ni lag pa
NK054(yi)001:13384: g.yas pa 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa
NK054(yi)001:13385: sngar dang 'dra / +aam srin lag bsgreng ba'i rtse
NK054(yi)001:13386: mor +aam las pad+ma 'bar ba 'od dang bcas pa
NK054(yi)001:13388: zla ba g.yon brtul ba 'bru sbas khu tshur gyis
NK054(yi)001:13389: dril bu gsil zhing yum la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis
NK054(yi)001:13391: yum gyi phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yon pa'i 'bru
NK054(yi)001:13392: bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa yab ltar brten
NK054(yi)001:13393: / p+y+aam srin lag bsgreng ba'i rtse mor p+y+aam las dril gsil 'od 'bar bar bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13394: nyi ma g.yas pa 'bru lnga las yab la 'khril /
NK054(yi)001:13395: yab la btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta /
NK054(yi)001:13396: don grub yab yum ni g.yas 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan pa sngar dang 'dra /
NK054(yi)001:13397: h+aam mathe'u chung bsgrengs pa'i rtse mor h+aam las ral gri 'od 'bar ba h+aam gis mtshan par bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13399: khu tshur bcang ba dril bu gsil zhing yum la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis yum la brten /
NK054(yi)001:13400: de'i yum ni 'bru bzhi sbas thugs kar bkan pa sngar dang 'dra /
NK054(yi)001:13401: t+aam mathe'u chung bsgreng ba'i rtse mor t+aam las dril gsil 'od 'bar ba bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13402: nyi ma g.yas 'bru sor mo lnga las yab la 'khril ba'i tshul du 'khril /
NK054(yi)001:13403: dbu btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis yab la blta /
NK054(yi)001:13404: sems dpa' yab yum gyi phyag rgya ni /
NK054(yi)001:13405: ut+pala ni byang shar mtshams kyi 'jam dpal lo //
NK054(yi)001:13406: klu shing ni shar lho mtshams kyi byams pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13407: sogs khongs su sems dpa' gzhan ma rnams bsdus te /
NK054(yi)001:13409: rin chen myu gu sa snying /
NK054(yi)001:13414: rin chen snye ma kun bzang /
NK054(yi)001:13416: gzugs mdzes me long l+aa s+y+ae ma //
NK054(yi)001:13417: rin chen phreng ba m+aa le ma //
NK054(yi)001:13418: pi wam gar mchod de nyid de //
NK054(yi)001:13424: byug pa gan+d+he ma sogs khongs su gong ma rnams bsdus pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13425: yang na spar khab bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13426: yum rnams las yab la 'khril ba'i tshul dang /
NK054(yi)001:13427: yab rnams chos yum la brten pa'i tshul /
NK054(yi)001:13428: yab yum gyi dbu rnams yab kyis yum la 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul dang /
NK054(yi)001:13429: yum rnams yab la 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul lo //
NK054(yi)001:13430: gong du rigs lnga'i sku phyag rgya chen po bshad pa bzhin du /
NK054(yi)001:13431: yab yum thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril ba'o //
NK054(yi)001:13432: sems dpa' yab yum gyi phyag rgya bcings pa 'di rnams rgyas pa na /
NK054(yi)001:13433: sor mo g.yas g.yon gyi bzhi bzhi la sems dpa'
NK054(yi)001:13434: yab yum bzhi bzhi bkod nas ngag tu brjod pa
NK054(yi)001:13435: tshig re re brjod nas phyag rgya bcing ba'am /
NK054(yi)001:13436: rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo nas /
NK054(yi)001:13437: tshigs bzhi bzhi phyag mtshan rnams dngos su bca' ba 'byung ba gang rung zhig gis bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:13438: 'dir phyag mtshan rnams smos pas rngam glog bzhin byas na legs gsungs pas /
NK054(yi)001:13439: phyag len yang de bzhin mdzad do //
NK054(yi)001:13441: man chad kyi lha rnams kyang rgyas par 'byung ngo //
NK054(yi)001:13442: sgo ba yab yum bstan te /
NK054(yi)001:13443: sgo bzhi na khro bo chen po bzhi bzhugs pa'i mu dra ni /
NK054(yi)001:13445: thod dbyug ste gshin rje gshed pa'i phyag mtshan gdengs
NK054(yi)001:13446: pa mi gzhan la 'phyar ba'i tshul du byed pa'o
NK054(yi)001:13447: // rdo rje gnon ni rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa bsnams pa ste lho'i stobs po che'o //
NK054(yi)001:13448: thod sbrul chen po gnon ni thod rlon gyi dbyug
NK054(yi)001:13449: pa la sbrul dkris pa rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o
NK054(yi)001:13450: // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon ni rgya
NK054(yi)001:13451: gram gyis mtshan pa'i dbyug pa ste bdud rtsi 'khyil
NK054(yi)001:13452: // ba'o // sgo ma'i phyag rgya ni /
NK054(yi)001:13453: lcags kyu shar gyi sgo ma /
NK054(yi)001:13457: sgo bzhir gnas pa'i yab yum de dag kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13458: gcig la gcig 'dud pa'i tshul dang dbyer med par 'khril ba ni gong ma bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:13459: thub pa drug 'gro ba drug 'dul ba'i ston pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:13460: 'dul pa'i thabs kyi rtags nang rtags phyi ru shar ba phyag rgya sna tshogs rig pa med kyang /
NK054(yi)001:13461: mdor bsdu na drug tu 'dus te /
NK054(yi)001:13462: lha'i thub pa pi wam la sogs pa drug le'u drug par bstan pa bzhin no //
NK054(yi)001:13463: theg pa 'di nyid kyi skabs su lha thams cad
NK054(yi)001:13464: thams dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin yin
NK054(yi)001:13465: pa la / thub pa drug 'gro drug gi ston pa yin pas /
NK054(yi)001:13466: 'gro drug zag bral gyi skus 'dul bas /
NK054(yi)001:13467: yum dngos su ma dmigs pas na yum dmigs med ces bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13468: 'on kyang theg pa 'di dang mi 'gal bar chos
NK054(yi)001:13469: kyi dbyings kyis thams cad du khyab par bzhugs pas
NK054(yi)001:13471: chos kyi dbyings las sna ba'i don gyis yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:13473: kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro //
NK054(yi)001:13474: zhes pa mnyam bzhag la sor mo rnams 'od 'phro ba bzhin te /
NK054(yi)001:13475: don rtags le'u drug par bshad zin /
NK054(yi)001:13476: yum kun tu bzang mo ni 'khor 'das thams cad
NK054(yi)001:13477: kyi yum du gyur kyang mnyam gzhag ni mnyam gzhag
NK054(yi)001:13480: mnyam gzhag las mthe bong gnyis ngo sprad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13481: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK054(yi)001:13483: kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya ni /
NK054(yi)001:13484: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba ma lus pa
NK054(yi)001:13485: thams cad mdzad pa dang bcas pa yin pas gcig
NK054(yi)001:13487: yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam //
NK054(yi)001:13489: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya byang chub mchog go //
NK054(yi)001:13490: yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid //
NK054(yi)001:13492: phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyur smos pa de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:13494: phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni //
NK054(yi)001:13496: phung po dang 'byung ba dang khams dang skye mched
NK054(yi)001:13497: rnams lha yab yum gyi ngo bo nyid ye nas
NK054(yi)001:13498: yin pa de sku gsung thugs kyi mu dra lta
NK054(yi)001:13500: de ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom nas goms pas mthar phyin /
NK054(yi)001:13501: snang grags kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rang sar dag
NK054(yi)001:13502: nas sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis
NK054(yi)001:13503: grub pa'i tshogs la mnga' brnyes nas /
NK054(yi)001:13504: thabs dang shes rab 'byor ldan na //
NK054(yi)001:13506: snang ba lhar ma 'gag pa ni thabs /
NK054(yi)001:13507: rang bzhin med pa ye shes su lhun gyis grub pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13509: thabs dang shes rab dbye med par 'byor ba rig
NK054(yi)001:13510: pa la gsal ba mthar phyin pa ni ldan pa
NK054(yi)001:13511: zhes bya ste / na zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13513: ma bskyod ma bsgul zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13514: lus ngag yid gsum gyis ci yang ma byas pa'i btang snyoms chen por bzhugs pa dang /
NK054(yi)001:13515: rkyen gyi sgo nas bskyod bsgul thams cad kun /
NK054(yi)001:13516: phyag rgya chen po ngang du gnas //
NK054(yi)001:13518: sku ma 'gag pa sku phyag rgya chen po las 'da' ba med /
NK054(yi)001:13519: brjod pa thams cad gsung phyag chen po las 'da' ba med /
NK054(yi)001:13520: dran rtogs thams cad thugs phyag rgya chen po las
NK054(yi)001:13521: 'da' ba med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos mi nyams
NK054(yi)001:13523: phyag rgya mchog gi ngang la gnas zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13524: snang ba rnam par 'byed pa la bslab pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13525: yan lag gnyis pa rtogs pa'i yan lag rnams zung
NK054(yi)001:13526: zhig ste rnam shes phung po dang 'byung ba nam
NK054(yi)001:13527: mkha' gnyis la yang rtog pa bzhi bcu yod pa'i
NK054(yi)001:13528: phyir / yab yum la lha bzhi bcu bsgom ste /
NK054(yi)001:13529: yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan //
NK054(yi)001:13530: zhes pa yan lag gi lha bzhi bcu rtsa ba rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gnyis la ldan /
NK054(yi)001:13532: de bsgom pa'i tshul ni bdag nyid mi bskyod pa yab yum du gsal ba'i rtsa ba gnyis so //
NK054(yi)001:13533: de yang yab la yab nyi shu rtsa gsum du bsgom /
NK054(yi)001:13534: yum la yum bcu bdun bsgom pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:13535: yab kyi spyi bor rnam snang /
NK054(yi)001:13536: lkog mar snang ba mtha' yas /
NK054(yi)001:13539: snying gar kun tu bzang po /
NK054(yi)001:13540: mig gi rtsa'i nang du sa'i snying po /
NK054(yi)001:13541: rna ba'i nang du nam mkha'i snying po /
NK054(yi)001:13544: mig gi rtsa'i phyi rol du byams pa /
NK054(yi)001:13545: rna ba'i rgyab tu sgrib sel /
NK054(yi)001:13546: sna la kun tu bzang po /
NK054(yi)001:13548: lag pa g.yas pa gshin rje gshed /
NK054(yi)001:13550: rkang pa g.yon pa rta mgrin /
NK054(yi)001:13553: dpung pa la lha ma yin gyi thub pa /
NK054(yi)001:13555: pus mo la byol song gi thub pa /
NK054(yi)001:13556: mgrin par yi dwags yi thub pa /
NK054(yi)001:13557: rkang mthil du dmyal ba'i thub pa /
NK054(yi)001:13558: yum la thub pa drug ma gtogs pa yum bcu bdun /
NK054(yi)001:13559: yab kyi gnas dang mthun par yum la dgod /
NK054(yi)001:13560: de ltar yan lag bzhi bcu bsgom pa ni thabs kyi lha'o //
NK054(yi)001:13561: de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste //
NK054(yi)001:13563: de nyid ni thabs kyi lha de nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:13564: yan lag spros pa ni 'og nas smos pa rnams so //
NK054(yi)001:13565: spros pa'i nang du nye bar bzung ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:13567: thugs ka bzhi bcur ye shes sems dpa' bzhi bcu bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi lha'o //
NK054(yi)001:13569: zhes pa rtsa ba nyid la sku gsung thugs kyi lha bzhi bcu tshan gsum du 'phros pas /
NK054(yi)001:13570: rtsa gnyis ni rtsa ba rdo rje sems dpa' yab
NK054(yi)001:13571: yum gnyis spros pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin
NK054(yi)001:13572: pas smos pa'o // bzhi bcu rtsa gsum 'phro bar 'gyur //
NK054(yi)001:13574: bzhi bcu po bzhi po de la spyi bor sku'i lha bzhi bcu /
NK054(yi)001:13575: mgrin par gsung gi lha bzhi bcu /
NK054(yi)001:13576: thugs kar thugs kyi lha bzhi bcu ste brgya nyi shu'o //
NK054(yi)001:13577: gong gi thabs shes rab kyi lha brgyad cu dang bsdoms pas nyis brgya ni grangs kyi gzhi ma'o //
NK054(yi)001:13579: bdag po'i lha dbu rgyan lnga lnga bas nam pas lnga tshan nyis brgya la stong yod de /
NK054(yi)001:13580: dbu rgyan kho na'i grangs so //
NK054(yi)001:13581: de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis //
NK054(yi)001:13583: gtso bo mi bskyod pa yab yum la dbu rgyan
NK054(yi)001:13584: gyi lha stong de'i rtsa ba nyis brgya de logs
NK054(yi)001:13585: su yod pa'o // gis zhes pas /
NK054(yi)001:13586: byed pa po ste lha bzhi bcu po kun la bsgom par bstan pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13587: rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du //
NK054(yi)001:13589: rgyal ba ni rigs bzhi po yab yum mo //
NK054(yi)001:13591: rdo rje sems dpa' la bsgom pa ji lta ba bzhin rigs bzhi yab yum la yang bsgom ste /
NK054(yi)001:13592: rigs bzhi yab yum la yang rtsa ba nyis brgya re re /
NK054(yi)001:13593: yan lag dbu rgyan stong stong yod pas bzhi stong ngo //
NK054(yi)001:13595: zhes pa rgyal ba'i mchog ni thams cad kyi rtsa ba kun tu bzang po yab yum ste /
NK054(yi)001:13596: rtsa ba gnyis brgya yan lag dbu rgyan stong /
NK054(yi)001:13598: zhes pa bcu gnyis ni sems dpa' yab yum bcu drug /
NK054(yi)001:13599: sgo ba yab yum brgyad de nyi shu rtsa bzhi /
NK054(yi)001:13600: yab yum gnyis gnyis gcig tu brtsis pas bcud dang gnyis te /
NK054(yi)001:13601: de la yan lag dbu rgyan gyi lha stong tsho bcu gnyis yod do //
NK054(yi)001:13603: zhes pa thub pa drug la yum med pa la
NK054(yi)001:13604: yum chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo yin pas lus
NK054(yi)001:13607: g.yon pa dbyings yum gyi char bgos pa g.yas kyi phyogs la yab rnams bkod /
NK054(yi)001:13608: g.yon gyi phyogs la yum rnams bkod de /
NK054(yi)001:13609: des ye shes sems dpa' dang sku gsung thugs kyi
NK054(yi)001:13610: lha yang 'gre bas dbu rgyan stong tsho drug yod
NK054(yi)001:13611: / de tsho la rtsa ba nyis brgya po ma
NK054(yi)001:13612: brtsis pa'i yan lag dbu rgyan stong tsho nyi shu
NK054(yi)001:13613: rtsa bzhi yod pa la bud+d+ha nyi khri bzhi stong
NK054(yi)001:13614: / bsgom zhes pa'o // de ni phyag rgya spros
NK054(yi)001:13615: pa'i skabs su lam mthar chags pa'i dbang du byas
NK054(yi)001:13616: / bsgom zhes pa'o // pa yin / lam thod
NK054(yi)001:13617: rgal ba'i dbang du ni dngos su bsgom nus te
NK054(yi)001:13618: / bsgom zhes pa'o // pa yin / / tshogs
NK054(yi)001:13619: bsgrub mi dgos par tshe dbang du sbyor ba mi
NK054(yi)001:13621: ba'o // spros pa'i rnal 'byor de'i don gyis thub
NK054(yi)001:13622: pa drug la yum med pas theg pa 'di nyid
NK054(yi)001:13624: don gyi yum chos kyi dbyings gong du smos pa nyid do //
NK054(yi)001:13625: lha rje chu bar pas rtags kyi yum kun tu bzang mor 'dod skad /
NK054(yi)001:13626: lha rje btsad tsa na re /
NK054(yi)001:13627: rtags kyi yum med pa mi sto ste /
NK054(yi)001:13629: mu stegs can la phan gdags phyir //
NK054(yi)001:13630: bde gshegs btsun mo rab tu sbas //
NK054(yi)001:13632: mthar lam gyi snang ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:13633: de la sogs pa bsam mi khyab //
NK054(yi)001:13635: gong ma de dag las su rung nas rnal 'byor
NK054(yi)001:13636: pa rig pa'i rtsal 'byongs pas sogs khongs su bsgom
NK054(yi)001:13637: lam mthar lam yang bsdu ste /
NK054(yi)001:13638: dngos po ril dkyil 'khor du ma gyur pa med de /
NK054(yi)001:13639: stong gsum dkyil 'khor gang ba dang /
NK054(yi)001:13640: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba la
NK054(yi)001:13641: sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rig pa'i rtsal bsam gyis
NK054(yi)001:13643: des 'gro don mdzad tshul gyi mdor bstan na /
NK054(yi)001:13644: phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su //
NK054(yi)001:13646: phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad bsam gyi mi
NK054(yi)001:13647: khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor du ma gyur med pas des
NK054(yi)001:13648: / 'dul ba'i thabs rnams so sor ston //
NK054(yi)001:13650: rig pa rang snang mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las 'gro
NK054(yi)001:13651: ba'i ris rigs so so'i gdul bya dang mthun pa'i
NK054(yi)001:13652: 'dul byed de bzhin du snang ste /
NK054(yi)001:13655: bem po dang rig pa can gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs thams cad du 'char ro //
NK054(yi)001:13656: gzhi de ltar yin na gzhi lha'i 'khor lo la
NK054(yi)001:13657: snang ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor kho nas don byed do
NK054(yi)001:13658: snyam na / rgyas par bshad pa gsung gi theg pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:13659: gong du skus mdzad par bstan pa ni phyogs gcig yin gyi /
NK054(yi)001:13660: theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //
NK054(yi)001:13661: zhes pa theg pa rim pa dgu'i gdul bya rnams
NK054(yi)001:13662: la de bzhin du snang ba don dam nges pa'i
NK054(yi)001:13663: theg pa'o // des 'dul ba'i skal ba med pa rnams la /
NK054(yi)001:13664: phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang //
NK054(yi)001:13665: zhes pa phyin ci log ni mu stegs pa ste /
NK054(yi)001:13666: rtag chad kyi lta ba ston pa'i ston pa gnyis dang /
NK054(yi)001:13668: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin mo rnams
NK054(yi)001:13669: la so so'i mos pa ltar snang bas gcig tu
NK054(yi)001:13672: sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni //
NK054(yi)001:13673: sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa //
NK054(yi)001:13676: res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de //
NK054(yi)001:13677: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
NK054(yi)001:13678: ri dang skye bo thams cad do //
NK054(yi)001:13680: zhi bas 'dul ba la zhi ba /
NK054(yi)001:13681: khro bos 'dul ba la khro bo //
NK054(yi)001:13682: de gnyis kyi rtsa ba dang yan lag gtso bo
NK054(yi)001:13683: dang 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas gdul bya
NK054(yi)001:13684: thams cad la so so'i blo dang mthun par phyogs
NK054(yi)001:13685: kun tu / dus kun tu snang ste rgyun chad pa med do //
NK054(yi)001:13686: lhun grub tu bstan pa dpes bstan pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13687: dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra bar //
NK054(yi)001:13689: dper na gar mkhan gyis 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'dren par bya ba'i phyir /
NK054(yi)001:13690: dag pa bud+d+ha'i cha lugs byang chub sems dpa'i cha
NK054(yi)001:13691: lugs 'gro ba drug so so'i lus 'dra ba skyes
NK054(yi)001:13692: pa bud med bem po rig pa can gang dang
NK054(yi)001:13693: gang gi gzugs byas kyang rang gi lus las ma
NK054(yi)001:13694: g.yos par stangs de dag gis 'gro ba'i yid tshim
NK054(yi)001:13695: par byed / ltad mo pa'i yid tshim yang rang gi lus la god pa med /
NK054(yi)001:13696: de bzhin du gzhan don gyi mdzad pa thams cad cir yang 'char ba ni /
NK054(yi)001:13697: rig pa byang chub sems gzhi ma nges pa las mdzad pa thams cad du 'char te /
NK054(yi)001:13698: 'di mi 'char bya ba'i mthar thug pa med pa
NK054(yi)001:13699: gar mkhan lus las ma g.yos par thams cad du
NK054(yi)001:13700: snang ba bzhin / rig pa rang byung gi ye
NK054(yi)001:13701: shes gang du yang ma g.yos par gdul bya'i ngor
NK054(yi)001:13702: snang ba bzhin / kun kyang 'char / thog mthar
NK054(yi)001:13703: mdzad pa shar nas 'gro don mdzad pa'i dus su
NK054(yi)001:13704: rig pa mnyam pa nyid las bya btsal phra ba'ang
NK054(yi)001:13706: lus la ma god pa'i dape'o //
NK054(yi)001:13707: des na mdzad pa thams cad phyogs 'dzin dang bya btsal mi mnga' bar lhun grub kyi mdzad pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13708: phyag rgya'i rnam grangs mjug bsdu ba dang bcas pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13709: mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni //
NK054(yi)001:13711: 'dir nye bar bsdus te bstan na /
NK054(yi)001:13712: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK054(yi)001:13713: de re re la yang 'phros pa'i rnam grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams las /
NK054(yi)001:13714: nye bar bsdus na sku phyag rgya chen po de
NK054(yi)001:13715: las 'phros pa gong du sangs rgyas nyi khri chig
NK054(yi)001:13717: ma skyes pa chos kyi sku'i phyag rgya sems nyid rang rig pa'i ngang las ma g.yos te /
NK054(yi)001:13718: de las phyag rgya'i rnam grangs bsam gyis mi khyab
NK054(yi)001:13719: pa ji ltar shar ba gcig la dam du 'dzin
NK054(yi)001:13720: nas 'di kho na'o zhes brjod du med de sems
NK054(yi)001:13721: kyi ngang la mi gnas pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13722: 'o na chos sku skye med 'ba' zhig go zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:13723: de nyid du rnam dag phyogs gcig tu 'dzin pa med pas mtshon pa las 'das te /
NK054(yi)001:13725: gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro //
NK054(yi)001:13727: gnyis ni rtog pa'i dbang du byas na kun gzhi
NK054(yi)001:13728: mi 'gag pa'i rtsal las yid rig pa snang ba
NK054(yi)001:13729: gnyis rtog pa bzhi bcu yid dang kun gzhi gnyis
NK054(yi)001:13731: dag pa'i gnas skabs su rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu /
NK054(yi)001:13732: kun bzang yab yum gnyis su 'dus pas gnyis zhes bya'o //
NK054(yi)001:13733: gsum ni gzhi dus su yang yid kun gzhi dbyer med dang gsum /
NK054(yi)001:13734: 'bras bu'i dus su kun tu bzang mo dbyings /
NK054(yi)001:13735: kun tu bzang po ye shes /
NK054(yi)001:13736: de dbyer med pa chos sku'i ngo bo nyid dang gsum las /
NK054(yi)001:13738: rtsa ba thabs dang shes rab dbyer med gsum las /
NK054(yi)001:13739: thabs dang shes rab kyi lha brgyad cu dang /
NK054(yi)001:13740: sku gsung thugs kyi lha gzhi po gsum dang /
NK054(yi)001:13741: rnam par 'phro ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya
NK054(yi)001:13742: stong la sogs par phyag rgya'i grangs ma nges zhes
NK054(yi)001:13743: pa'o // bskyod dang spro ba'ang de bzhin nyid //
NK054(yi)001:13745: bskyod pa ni yan lag lnga las yan lag gi
NK054(yi)001:13746: lha lnga bcu bkod nas yan lag gi bskyod bsgul
NK054(yi)001:13747: thams cad do // spro ba ni gong du bstan
NK054(yi)001:13748: pa ltar bud+d+ha nyi khri bzhi stong bkod nas goms
NK054(yi)001:13749: pa'i dus su snang stong mnyam pa nyid ni /
NK054(yi)001:13750: mdor na phyag rgya thams cad kun //
NK054(yi)001:13751: ces pa gong du bstan pa'i goms pa klong du gyur pa'i dus su /
NK054(yi)001:13752: dbang po lnga'i yan lag gi 'phro 'du thams cad
NK054(yi)001:13753: sku dang ye shes su gsal ba nyid phyag rgya
NK054(yi)001:13754: chen po'i ngang du tha mal pa'i gzung 'dzin dag
NK054(yi)001:13755: pa'o // des na de las mi 'gyur bas na gnas zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:13757: rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya sku dang ye shes su
NK054(yi)001:13758: yin tshul du gnas pa lta ba'i phyag rgya rtogs
NK054(yi)001:13760: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas rig pa la mngon du goms pa'i dus na /
NK054(yi)001:13761: yul drug gi chos cir snang cir byas thams cad bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub /
NK054(yi)001:13762: de'i dus su snang ba sku /
NK054(yi)001:13764: dran rig thugs kho na las mi 'da' ba la gnas zhes bya ste /
NK054(yi)001:13765: de'i dus su de tsam du yang blos 'dzin pa med pa ni /
NK054(yi)001:13767: de la ni lhun grub kyi phyag rgya chen po zhes kyang brjod do //
NK054(yi)001:13768: de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad //
NK054(yi)001:13769: ces pa de skad ni gong du gsung pa'i le'u stod du yan lag spros pa /
NK054(yi)001:13770: le'u smad du rtog pa spros pa /
NK054(yi)001:13771: bar du phyag rgya'i rnam grangs nyams su blang ba de dag sus gsungs zhe na /
NK054(yi)001:13772: dag pa ni 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'du shes dag
NK054(yi)001:13773: pa ste rig pa mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings
NK054(yi)001:13774: so // de tsam du yang 'dzin pa med pa ni mchog go //
NK054(yi)001:13775: dag mchog nyid du lhun gyis grub pa ni kun tu bzang /
NK054(yi)001:13777: tshig rkang 'di ni sdud pa po'i tshig ste /
NK054(yi)001:13778: khungs bshad pa dang mtshams sbyar ba'i tshig go //
NK054(yi)001:13779: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK054(yi)001:13780: yan lag dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas zhes pa /
NK054(yi)001:13782: lus kyi yan lag ni mgo la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK054(yi)001:13783: rtog pa'i yan lag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
NK054(yi)001:13784: lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa ni lus
NK054(yi)001:13785: kyi yan lag rigs lnga'i bud+d+ha lnga bcu'i dkyil 'khor
NK054(yi)001:13787: rtog pa'i yan lag rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK054(yi)001:13788: phyag rgya spros pa ni bud+d+ha nyi khri bzhi stong
NK054(yi)001:13789: gi bar dang bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa
NK054(yi)001:13790: rnams so // le'u brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o //
